attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'classy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'touristy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': True, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'"}
categories: Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Delis, Fast Food, Soup
text:
I don't know what's going on with these reviews, but either you guys have terrible taste in food or you ate a very different sandwich than I did. Potbelly was "meh" at best.

I only went here because I was craving pulled pork and google told me that Potbelly had it. This turned out to be a lie. I got the meatball sub instead. It tasted like a meatball sub. That's literally the best thing I can think of to say about it. 

The place was quiet, the service was fine but not exceptional, the sandwich was mediocre. I can't think of any reason to ever go back. Potbelly now follows the same rules as Subway and Quiznos for me: only eat the food if it's free or if it's 2 in the morning and you're drunk and nowhere else is open.

attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'classy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'touristy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': True, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'"}

text: My family and my new favorite sandwich shop! So far we have visited twice within the last two weeks. The customer service is great! Everyone has a smile on their face and ready to make your order. As a family we have tried the Pizza Sandwich, Meatball, Italian and A Wreck and none have disappointed. All were full of flavor and warm! You pick all of your cindiments, if any. Also what amazed me is that they serve both Pepsi and Coke catering to both cola lovers, which I have never seen. There are also soups, salads, milkshakes, cookies, dream bars and chips to choose from. We will be returning very soon and many more times after that.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'classy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'touristy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': True, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'"}
categories: Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Delis, Fast Food, Soup
text:
I have a few things that I am clear with in terms of the restaurants I often come to.  A simple rule that I follow is #1 if the place is run down or ghetto, in order for me to come again, the food and customer service must be exceptional.  #2 if the building is well taken care of both internal and external, either the service is good, or the food is good, I'll still go.
(If anything is lacking in terms of customer service, food quality, food speed, or the atmosphere, the restaurant must excel in other categories to makeup for what's missing for me to go there. ) 
This place is not lacking at all.  Hence, that's why I come here everyday.

text: Great sub shop!  I was in this part of town and decided to try something new.  I got the Pizza Sandwich, and loaded it with all of the extras.  It's great.  Their toasted sandwiches are a lot like Quizno's, but their ingredients are better.  The shop is clean, bright, and airy, and the staff are friendly and polite.  If you're in the area and thinking about Subway, splurge and spend another dollar for a sandwich that's twice as good.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'classy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'touristy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': True, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'"}

text:
This place is great! I was introduce to this place by a friend of mine for lunch today and I'm so glad I went. The sub I got was truly delicious. 

Make sure you order the "Wreck-Talian". It's a secret menu item but it includes ham, turkey, roast beef and salami. Also ask for mushroom and bacon too! The worker talked me into it and sure did not disappoint me!  I've asked for all the toppings which just equaled an amazing, flavorful sub! I would definitely come here again!

Thank you John for introducing me! I'm a fan! Just a tip, it's a not a sub you can eat politely!

text: I'm a big fan of a nice toasted sandwich and Potbelly does them right. This is a new location on Oracle Road near Target. The subs are a nice size and manageable to eat especially if you are on the run. The Mediterranean and Italian are my favorites. Great friendly and helpful staff make it a quick stop for lunch or dinner.

text: It's my new favorite place for lunch.  The sandwiches are delish!  The staff is extremely friendly, helpful and quick!  Everything is always clean.  I love the decor.  They have a lot of Local Tucson memorabilia from movies (Can't Buy Me Love) to local High Schools.  For being a national franchise the feel is very local and Home-y!

text: I absolutely love this place and I actually forgot to leave them a review. I come here at least once a week. I haven't found a place with the service or toasted subs like they provide. This place was my replacement from the Quiznos that was closed across the street...out of all the options in the one mile radius of me (limberlost and Oracle) .They are always numero Uno!

text: This sandwich place is so delicious. They have really good hot fresh sandwiches (I had the wreck) and yummy shakes and cookies. Also the people are SUPER SUPER nice. They stayed open to make us sandwiches and also gave us cookies for free. The people behind the counter were very friendly.

text:
This was the first Potbelly location I ever came to, and after such a great experience I refuse to go anywhere else! (Esp. the horrible UA location)
Jessica is the best, super nice and friendly- she helped us figure out how everything works and recommended great sandwich options! Awesome customer service. 
This location is clean, quick, and precise! Super accommodating, and helpful. Thank you!!

text: So if the sandwich is good but the wait is too long because they were seriously understaffed... Two ppl working only with a long like.  They get 3 stars.  E for the food and minus 1 for the wait.  But servers were nice and apologetic about it.   Owner if u want to take off put food in front of ppl faster and hire more ppl.   I got the turkey club.   The sandwich was toasted... Reminds me of quiznos...  So the cheese was melted and the French bread was good  But nothing special other than that...

text: Placed a large order for a training class and it was perfect!  Leonard (General Manager) and his team really went above and beyond.  Not to mention the food is delicious!  Thank you!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'classy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'touristy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': True, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'"}
categories: Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Delis, Fast Food, Soup
text: I arrived at this establishment the very second that they advertise opening at for the day and guess what! They were open! Not only that but, they had everything ready and they were prepared for customers! They offered me a pastrami sandwich but I wasn't in the mood for some lightweight-ass sandwich. I needed a hearty meatball sub and I needed it NOW! They made it quickly and made it good as FUCK too! They always do. I had a shitty hangover from drinking almost two entire bottles of Crown Royal the night before by myself and wasn't in the mood for anyone's bullshit so, it was great to see people provide a service that I was in dire need of. Great place to eat and I would highly recommend the meatball sandwich to anyone who is interested in curing a hangover.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'classy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'touristy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': True, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'"}
categories: Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Delis, Fast Food, Soup
text: For a quick sandwich shop potbelly deserves 5 full stars ! The bread tastes freshly baked and gets deliciously crunchy and chewy after it goes thru the toaster . The set up is Quiznos style where you order the style wich and they get the meat and cheese then put it thru the toaster on a conveyor belt and another staff member does the veggies and dressings . I got an Italian and they were nice enough to add balsamic dressing on it for me even though it is for salads primarily . The hot peppers are a must ! They are fresh fresh fresh and not too spicy just delicious . Everything tastes high quality and for the regular sandwich with chips it was only 6$ and change . A great spot for a killer simple sub .

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop

text:
We come here for lunch a couple times a month. The sandwiches are really good and the toppings are fresh. I like that the bread isn't too thick so all you taste is bread and not the filling.

My two favorites are the Mediterranean and the Mushroom Melt.

The people working there are friendly and the restaurant is always clean. They have an option for regular tea and sweet tea along with fountain drinks.

I like the hot peppers and they also sell them in a jar to take home.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'classy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'touristy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': True, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'"}
categories: Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Delis, Fast Food, Soup
text:
I didn't even know they were building this and I drove by and had to stop. When I first arrived customer service was great they greet you right away. They were very helpful recommending what was good. I ordered the chicken buffalo sandwich that comes with blue cheese and ranch. You choose your bread and the white bread was hands down amazing! The whole sandwich was amazing!
Also got the salad with chickpeas and the potbellys vinaigrette. All amazing but need extra dressing for the salad. Then while sitting and eating my meal they gave me a free cookie since they made to many that morning. I had the sugar and its was soft and tasty! Overall this is a great priced place for the quality of food and service. I will definitely be back again and again!

attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'classy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'touristy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': True, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'"}
categories: Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Delis, Fast Food, Soup
text: To be completely honest, the 3 stars I gave this place are solely based off of their customer service, and cleanliness.  As soon as my father and I walked in we were greeted with a few friendly faces, and were politely guided through the process of how to order. I ordered the Wreck, and my dad got the Smoked Ham, and we both got about 3/4 of the veggies they had to offer. Perhaps we had our hopes to high, but we were sadly unimpressed. The sandwich was just so bland. The bread was flaky and didn't have any type of flavor, even that delicious baked flavor others have. Once I started picking it apart, the meat itself was good, but I don't know if it was perhaps the combination or what, but everything together was just not happening. I have read some of the other reviews and realize that they probably have other sandwiches that are good, but we were just so unimpressed that we really don't have any interest in returning.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'classy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'touristy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': True, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'"}
categories: Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Delis, Fast Food, Soup
text:
Who doesn't love Potbelly? This restaurant is nice & large and the employee working was super friendly. I don't think I've ever had a bad Potbelly experience. I usually get an original turkey breast. Note that Potbelly's sandwiches are toasted, so if you're not into that kind of thing, you probably won't love Potbelly. My husband gets the Big Wreck and it's definitely a good sized portion. I love the cookies they have - so gooey and delicious. Their shakes are also super tasty. If you're into mac & cheese theirs looks really good! 
The only downside was that the restroom was super nasty. Ew.

categories: Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Delis, Fast Food, Soup
text:
Had A Wreck sandwich on multigrain bread: Salami, Roast Beef, Turkey, Ham & Swiss Cheese. Got everything on it:  Mayo, Brown Deli Mustard, Hot Peppers, Lettuce, Onion, Tomato, Pickle, Oil, and Italian Seasoning. It is toasted. I ordered light on the mustard and I should have ordered light on the mayo as it was just a tad too much. Regardless, it was an awesome sandwich. I thoroughly enjoyed it. I would give them my repeat business. I do like Firehouse Subs a little better, but Potbelly is one of the better sandwiches around.

The staff was very friendly, too. I enjoyed their cheerfulness and pride in their product.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'classy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'touristy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': True, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'"}
categories: Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Delis, Fast Food, Soup
text:
Walked to this location from my house, and being that we're in Tucson I was hot and ready to sit down in some nice A/C when I got there. I sat close to the menu because I was unsure what to get. I had only been to a Potbelly's once or twice and so I was very unfamiliar with the menu. The first girl I encountered was standing at the order counter staring at me waiting for me to order even though I was sitting down at a table and had not approached the counter yet. She then proceeded to address me from across the order line by shouting "Are you gonna order a sandwich or are you waiting for someone?" to which I responded "Yea i'm gonna order something in a bit" to which she said nothing. I found this a bit irritating because I thought it was fairly obvious I wasn't ready to order by the way I was staring down the menu from a table. I also was hoping she would respond with offering to answer any questions because I wanted to ask about the chicken salad. Luckily after heading to the back she did not return. 

Fortunately, the second employee I had the pleasure of ordering from was a bubbly girl who started off by asking if I had any questions to which I inquired about the chicken salad. She immediately grabbed me a hefty portion on a spoon to sample which turned my experience around a full 180. I was so grateful to taste it before ordering because even though it was a great chicken salad, it was full of both celery and celery salt and I am not a fan of celery (hence the original inquiry). I decided to go with just the chicken sandwich on flatbread which had a toasting process of a minute or two, couldn't tell you exactly how long because the whole duration was filled with pleasant small talk about favorite chicken salads around town. The sweet girl recommended baggins chicken salad which I will definitely be trying in the future. 

When I went to pay at the register, my total was just a few cents past the amount of cash in my hand so I went to pull out a larger bill for her to break but she instead asked if I had the original dollar amount and then just took care of the change for me. After that I had to ask her name because she was so awesome the whole time and really made a positive impact when I needed it. I found out her name is Jessica and she is actually the GM! I told her good for her, with that customer service and positive attitude she better be! 

The sandwich quality was very good, the flatbread was just toasty enough and the avocados were very fresh. Also was really excited that they offer both tea and lemonade because arnold palmers are my go-to!

Super glad to have a great experience since this place is close to my house, I now know it's worth the walk!

text: Friendly staff,  good good.  I loved their broccoli cheddar soup.  Prices were reasonable and the place was clean.  They handled their lunch rush smoothly too.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'classy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'touristy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': True, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'"}
categories: Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Delis, Fast Food, Soup
text: I was pleasantly surprised by this place. I'm not much of a sandwich person and I rarely eat at chains, but we were at Target and I hadn't eaten lunch so we decided to try it out. I didn't want to carb it up too much because I mostly eat clean but they had a skinny pair option with low cal sandwiches and soups (I love soup). I got the turkey Swiss and the lentil kale turkey soup. I loved the soup so much I went back today and got a bowl. The sandwich was nice and toasty and the multigrain bread was thin like I like it. I like their hot peppers. They give it a nice kick. I must say it hit the spot! Also the workers were very nice.

text:
I came here for the first time after reading Kat M.'s review.  I ordered the Italian, and really enjoyed it.  I took the advice to try the whole pickle too.  Very good kosher dill.  Not as intensely flavored as Schlomo & Vito's, but still delicious and crispy.  

Since I only go to S&V for the pickle, it's nice to have an alternate where I can get a great sandwich and a great pickle.  Sadly, I can't find anything at the grocery that even comes close.

text: Good spot to come for lunch. Customer service is friendly, shop is clean and sandwiches are fresh and don't taste overly processed and basic like some other sandwich shops. I tried their grilled chicken sandwich and everything about it was good. You can choose your toppings on the sandwiches also. They have bottled and fountain drinks. Reasonably priced and good food. Good location for groups or solo because there's plenty of space inside.

text: Do you want a traditional Chicago style sandwich with premium meats, killer bacon, hot/sweet peppers and a shaker of herbs! Oh Holy WOW! You've got to try this location, fantastic customer service and MEAT sandwiches! This is amazing good ole meat and cheese sandwiches! Not frilly or a salad between bread slices, a real honest deli style sandwhich! If you haven't tried them, you should! And FYI if you're a real pickle lover, hand over the dollar and get one of their barrel dill pickles! Delicious! Live and eat well!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'classy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'touristy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': True, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'"}
categories: Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Delis, Fast Food, Soup
text:
Boy oh boy, do I love Potbelly's! Enough to have a start of a potbelly myself...

The Potbelly name is actually a credit to the potbelly stove, but either way, their sandwiches are tasty. I am partial to the "Wreck - Signature sandwich! Salami, Angus roast beef, oven roasted turkey, hickory smoked ham with melted Swiss cheese" on wheat bread always... this is my go to sandwich place in town. They are toasted to perfection, and they have the best in-house peppers. (Which you can also buy a jar to take home!) I recommend trying the sandwiches with all the toppings. They recently have added macaroni and cheese to their menu, which is incredible with bacon and the aforementioned hot peppers. They have a really great chip selection as well, and even carry an exclusive Potbelly hot pepper kind! (I have yet to try, but can't wait!) 

You really can't go wrong with anything on their menu, especially as they have a specific section for "lighter" choices, if you're still on that diet train. Well, what're you still reading this for? Go, go go! 

P.S.
This made me hungry.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'classy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'touristy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': True, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'"}
categories: Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Delis, Fast Food, Soup
text: So delighted that Potbelly is now on the West side! As Midwesterners, we are always glad when a taste of home comes to Arizona  (portillos in PHX, etc) and this chain does not disappoint. Potbelly is definitely different than Eegees, subway and the like - delicious bread, toasted meats and cheeses, and don't forget the hot peppers! These sandwiches and milkshakes are so delicious. May I recommend my personal favorite - the Turkey with everything but onions? This location is perfect for the shopping you inevitably need to do at Target, with friendly staff and outdoor seating to boot. Getcha some!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'HasTV': 'False', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'classy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'touristy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': False}", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True'}
categories: Juice Bars & Smoothies, Salad, Ice Cream & Frozen Yogurt, Fast Food, Sandwiches, Food, Restaurants, Soup, Delis
text:
I had only been to this Potbelly once before coming in for my second time today. 

When I came in the store was fairly empty other than two girls and an elderly couple. However, the restaurant seems like it does well during lunchtime. 

I order their new fresco sandwich on whole grain bread and their strawberry smoothie. Everything was fresh and it tasted that way. The red peppers where chopped into little bites, but full of flavor. The chicken was tender and had a nice hint of flavor. The strawberry smoothie was just delicious. It tasted like a strawberry that was just plucked. The smoothie was also fresh and had nice texture.

The decor of this Potbelly is nice. They have wooden and metal tables in a variety of shapes. They also have a real Potbelly stove, which is unlit. I also like how they have lots of fundraisers for some of the local schools. Occasionally, they have live music. They also delivers during the week.

Altogether, Potbelly offers delicious, fresh sandwiches. I will return!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'HasTV': 'False', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'classy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'touristy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': False}", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True'}
categories: Juice Bars & Smoothies, Salad, Ice Cream & Frozen Yogurt, Fast Food, Sandwiches, Food, Restaurants, Soup, Delis
text:
I've been a regular at Potbelly in Wynnewood since they opened back in March. I work around the corner and am in pretty regularly--around once a week. Vince and his team know what's up! They're always happy to provide a suggestion (Vince will tell you the pastrami is his favorite and not to be missed, and I gotta tell you, he's right!) and with plenty of variety on the menu, you'll have a tough choice. My personal favorites are the Pastrami and the Clubby, but there are plenty of other choices on the menu too, including salads and some delicious vegetarian options. Their broccoli cheddar soup is my favorite anywhere and the chicken enchilada soup has a nice kick to it as well. Their cookies are soft and fresh and I've heard great things about their milkshakes, although I haven't had one yet. 

The atmosphere is one of nostalgia. Old advertisements and photographs line the walls and tables, which is a nice touch. Aged wallpaper, wooden benches, a tin ceiling, and an actual potbelly stove (unlit, but still nice to look at) round out the store for a rustic, home-y experience. Not that it's a huge deal, but the bathrooms are spacious and always sparkling clean. On the downside, parking can be a bit of a pain, as the lot is shared by the Starbucks and First Watch, which means the lot is frequently completely full. If I find that's the case, I just park across the street at the Wynnewood Shopping Center and walk across the street (there's a conveniently located crosswalk, so no need to jaywalk).

Overall, you just can't go wrong with Potbelly--you're sure to walk away with a decently priced, delicious meal that will keep you coming back for more.

text: Potbelly is a unique experience, it is not your cookie cutter sandwich shop. The food is delicious you can add extra meat which I highly recommend to make a very hearty sandwich. I like spicy peppers and there's were plenty hot for my taste buds.  Definitely give this place a try if you want to mix up your lunch routine.

text:
Potbelly is worth at least a try.  It is better than Subway.  Very friendly, energetic employees.  Orders have always been correct.  

I always get the hot pepper mix (giardiniera) on my sandwich.  The desserts are the best part of Potbelly's if you ask me.  Potbelly's offers shakes.  

It is a fast casual sandwich spot.   Indoor and outdoor seating.   Community book sharing shelf.

text: Came...Ate...Underwhelmed.  Bring back Provisions.  These places like Potbelly and Jimmy Johns harken back to the phrase "Where's the meat?"  I had a chicken salad sandwich.  Left unfilled.  Went to McDonald's and got a Double Double for a buck.  Now satisfied.  If they doubled the meat I would go 3 stars (but I ain't paying extra for it!).  I bet they invested $300K to open that location.  Shame.

text: Potbelly is famous around the country because of its price, taste, and quality.  This is not your typical midwest, gluttonous extranganza of meat and calories.  You get normal people food here, and served in normal proportions.  If your hungry get the Big size.  Recommend the Wreck with hot peppers, one of my favorite sandwiches of all time.

text: I just went into potbelly for the first time! Of course I didn't know what I wanted the girl was so sweet helping me. I knew I wanted something meaty she recommended the wreck so got it and switched a couple meats on flat whole grain!  Getting to the front I was debating between a smoothie or a cookie Travis was so nice and helpful and told me all about both! His customer service will definitely bring me back and I haven't even tasted my sandwich yet haha! What an impact! Thanks potbelly especially you travis and unfortunately I didn't get the girls name but thank you she was a vegetarian so you know who you are! I'll be back soon!

text:
Sub Search #1
The Wreck is everything it is cracked up to be. Crusty roll, savory filling, delicious. The salami makes the sandwich. We had carry out so I can't speak to the ambiance or anything else about this place but it is a definite "good" on my list. It did take me several hours to successfully digest this sandwich but it was worth it.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}
categories: Food, Delis, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Fast Food, Soup
text:
Do not go here unless you like to get angry rather quickly. I walked in, saw some one-man-band singing with his guitar in an already loud environment. The place has no walls, everything echos, so the music guy was obviously a terrible idea and everyone seemed to know it.  

I tried to order, was told that the online menu doesn't match their menu. Funny, I thought this was late 2012 and people knew how to organize their business with their online entity. I was basically yelled at because the worker couldn't hear me over the guitar singing. She still got my order completely wrong even though I basically had to  shout at her 5 times to be heard. I had to wait for them to get the order right while watching all the idiots run around and try to figure out why they had an extra sandwich. 

As for the food, it was ok, but on the small side. It's really hard to screw up a basic sub sandwich there's not much to say. It's the same setup as Quiznos, you order and the slap some meat on some bread and run it through a oven, only they really suck at their jobs.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}
categories: Food, Delis, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Fast Food, Soup
text: I love the sandwiches. I was eating there 6 times a month. But not now. The management is gotten very bad. I went in there on 11/19 and got the wrong toppings on the sandwich to go. The girl that made it wrong wanted to argue with me about it and had a horrible attitude. I got my money back talked to the manager was told mistakes happen . Ok fine.  So I go back the next day and same girl is working and same manager. I tell the girl what I want on it she doesn't say a word. She just takes my sandwich and sets it to the side. Then proceeds to make everybody else's sandwich. The manager sees this tells her again what to put on it she says fine and does nothing. The manage looks at me and then says its on me today then. So I wait a little longer, nothing is done. I look at the manager and said really ??? I ask him who's in charge here ? So I guess if I want Potbelly's from now on I better go to Clayton at least until one of these clowns get fired for not doing their job.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}
categories: Food, Delis, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Fast Food, Soup
text:
I haven't been to Subway since finding out about Potbelly.

"The Wreck" is my favorite sub here. So good that the many times I've been here, I haven't deviated once! It has the right amount of types of ingredients and the perfect size to fill you up. Make sure to get it on their house bread as I didn't care much for their multigrain.

They are pretty quick with making and topping the subs. Definitely not like JJ, but fast enough.

This place is in a great location, never had problem with parking (though it can get busy).

Tip: you can get side of hot peppers at the register if you don't want them to place it in the sandwich.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}
categories: Food, Delis, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Fast Food, Soup
text: I've always loved their food but only got it when I traveled through Chicago. It's awesome they're now available here in St. Louis. I had the Wreck with hot peppers and loved it, although the peppers were hotter than I expected. That's my fault. The ordering is seamless and the food comes out fast. Cannot ask for a more pleasant experience.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}
categories: Food, Delis, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Fast Food, Soup
text:
I love this location of Potbelly. Around noon, the line can be long but it moves so fast. I am always in and out regardless of time or wait. I love the toasted sandwiches. 

They have amazing cookies so grab one on your way out by the register. I always get the oatmeal chocolate chip. They are always so moist- not hard or crunchy.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop

text: Pretty good sandwich. I'm trying the veggie. Love the hot peppers....next time will ask for extra mushrooms. Zapps chips = yay!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}
categories: Food, Delis, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Fast Food, Soup
text:
I do love me some potbelly. Seriously, I do. I always get the same ole thing here and at every other potbelly on the face of this earth...Their turkey sandwich on white bread. BUT I don't care, because I love it.  I like that it has a hint of a dressing/sauce on it, with some awesome seasoning and other veggies that make it worth the drive. 

What I don't like, though, is that they used to have this awesome salad on their menu with TONS of veggies. It had none of this eggs, blue cheese crap that they have these days, it was just a purely veggie/cheese salad. It was great, but potbelly scrapped it off their menu.  BLAH!

Also don't like that Potbelly has hardly any options for vegetarians. I know I'm not one, but my bf hates Potbelly because he almost never can find something he's interested in eating here. He is forced to either eat the uninspired shroomy sandwich or a PB&J. First of all, he's not that big on shrooms, and second of all he's not a little kid. So basically he gets sulky when I try to get him to come here. I have to be extra nice if I have any hopes of dragging him to Potbelly.  

I noticed the Potbellys in Chicago already has a new sandwich that is more vegetarian friendly. It seems to have a more Mediterranean vibe to it, with hummus and roasted red peppers. I would totally try it if they offered it at this Potbelly. Why are they being so slow to adopt the new menu???

Anyone who is complaining about the random bands/singers that come to play at Potbelly must have never been to another potbelly ever. They almost always on the weekends have someone random playing music at Potbelly. It's usually hit or miss as to whether the musicians are any good. But I've learned to accept it. 


As a suggestion, it would be wise to open a potbelly in U-City. Just a thought! Then I wouldn't have to drive so freggin far to get my potbelly fix. While I admit I don't come from across the IL/MO border to get it, I still don't think I should be subjected to more than a 10 minute drive! Seriously people!  Though, it sounds like  there are people who do come from IL just to eat at Potbelly.  They must be some diehard potbelly fanatics! I am not that diehard, sorry.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}
categories: Food, Delis, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Fast Food, Soup
text: One word to describe Potbelly: Average. The service is good and the milkshakes are good, but outside of that this place is nothing to write home about. Also, milkshakes and baked subs are an odd combination. I had my second experience at Potbelly last night, the first being about 2 or 3 years ago. Both times I had the Italian sub, the first time on wheat bread and last night on white. This sandwich is waaaaaaaaaaay better on white than on wheat. I wanted to try it on flatbread last night but I was told that they were out of flatbread, which was disappointing. The sandwiches come in two sizes, regular and "big". I got the "big" sandwich last night which was much more filling than the regular one that I had on my last visit. The prices here are expensive also. For the regular (only) size shake and "big" sandwich, the cost was over $10 after tax. The sandwich "was" filling and the shake was good however, I don't think that price was worth it.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}
categories: Food, Delis, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Fast Food, Soup
text:
I am not a fan of Subway, but I am a fan of Potbelly. They know how to make a fresh sandwich fast and with friendly customer service.

We were running errands in Creve Coeur and just wanted a quick lunch. What can be quicker then 8 minutes? Potbelly promotes that you'll be through their line in 8 minutes max. I have no idea what happens if it does take longer. With the speed they move, I don't think it would ever happen. 

We enjoyed an Italian and the Wreck, both were very enjoyable. What sets Potbelly above their competitors is the ratio of ingredients to bread. The sandwiches here are not overpowered by bread like they are at Subway. The ingredients are the true star.  

I wish we had a Potbelly in city, but I'm glad we don't. If I had one closer to my house, I'd have a Potbelly from eating so much Potbelly. What would make Potbelly a 5 Star is if they had fries like Penn Station. Now that would be an awesome fast lunch.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}
categories: Food, Delis, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Fast Food, Soup
text: I go to this Potbelly often. The good: I love their salads!  The sandwiches are good and the smoothies/shakes are excellent, and are not to be missed. I think they just recently started offering a larger  sandwich. I know some have mentioned them only offering one size. I only have a couple of issues here and really they're very minute. My only issue here is I feel like I have to repeat myself several times while ordering, which can be annoying. At least 3 times I'm asked what I ordered when just seconds before I told someone else. I will however continue to frequent this place. Good food and decent service.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}
categories: Food, Delis, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Fast Food, Soup
text: I LOVE POTBELLY! My first time trying potbelly was actually in the suburbs of chicago! first time i had it, i was absolutely hooked! the bread is my favorite! it reminds me of having homemade bread back in the motherland. aka vietnam! lol. they have really good chicken salad and mushroom melt. oh and their peppers too...yum! and cookies! I always tell myself to try something different but it never fails, i always end up ordering the something!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}
categories: Food, Delis, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Fast Food, Soup
text:
A number of visits, always satisfying my appetite.  Sandwiches are great, as always.  You can't go wrong with "The Wreck."   Potbelly is certainly 4 stars (and it might be 5 stars for some).   The workers have always been nice to us.  And they have even been patient with the poor geezers who have no idea how or what to order.

So far, so good.  However ....   Sometimes there is live music.   This might be nice if you were looking for entertainment, out for a night on the town, rather than just wanting to eat a sandwich to keep your belly and backbone from bumping (apologies to Guy Clark).  One nice guy, playing the guitar, and singing some (and actually a pretty good singer).  But so far it has been way way too loud.  If you go to a booth all the way to the back of the store, it is possible to have a conversation. 

i'm not sure how to predict when the musician will be there. For us, it has always been in the early evening hours (weekends?).   I know some folks may really like the live music.  Maybe a good compromise would be to just turn the volume down.  How about Potbelly Unplugged?

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}
categories: Food, Delis, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Fast Food, Soup
text: For all you dieters looking for a fast option, I gotta recommend Potbelly's Skinnys. Marketed as less meat and cheese on thin cut bread for under 400 calories, I thought I was going to get a measly, skinny little thing. Not at all! They hollow out the middle of the bread so it's the same size as a regular sandwich. I got the turkey and swiss, then packed it with low cal toppings like spicy mustard, lettuce, tomato, and their hot peppers, which are sooo wonderful - so I never missed the extra meat and cheese. Yummy!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}
categories: Food, Delis, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Fast Food, Soup
text: This review is based on the 2 times I have tried to order but still have not dined at Potbelly.  First attempt was online, after taking the time registering, found out this location did not support online ordering (strike 1).  Called the restaurant to ask a few questions to find out the online menu was not consistent with what they sold at this specific store (strike 2).  Was directed to their menu online and went a found what we wanted, called back in to place a to-go and was told they won't support to-go until 30 days in.... (Strike 3).  At first glance it seems way to hard to try to give this place a chance.

text: A solid sandwich shop.  The line moves fast, there are interesting sandwiches.  My salad was a bit bland but my companions' sandwiches were tastier.  The milk shakes are also very good.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}
categories: Food, Delis, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Fast Food, Soup
text: I had lunch at Potbelly's.  I had never been there before but I was in the mood for a good sandwich.   I ordered "the wreck" which was salami, roast beef, turkey and ham along with Swiss cheese, lettuce and tomato.  The sandwich was okay.  Nothing that really stood out. It was better than Subway or Jimmy John's, but it wasn't as good as some other sandwich places around the area.  The Big sized sandwich with a bag of chips and a large iced tea came to just over $10.00 which seemed a little high for what I got.  I doubt I would return to Potbelly's.  It wasn't bad, but I'd prefer one of the other options around the area for a decent sandwich.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}
categories: Food, Delis, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Fast Food, Soup
text:
I first fell in love with Potbelly's when I was a student in Chicago. When I found out that this Potbelly's is just a few minutes walk from my work, I was definitely excited! The employees at this location are always super pleasant and patient (like when you forget to order your chocolate shake early and ask for it when paying). I also appreciate that they take orders on ipads during lunch rush to keep the line steadily moving along. 
My favorite thing at Potbelly's (right now) is the Mediterranean sandwich + chicken + flatbread. Give it a try for sure. It's delightful!
I love that I can be in and out within 10 minutes during lunch rush. And they have a great area to eat outside.
Parking gets a little chaotic at times since it's so popular, but worth the effort.
The only thing they could do better is sell boxes of their little shortbread cookies ;)

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}
categories: Food, Delis, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Fast Food, Soup
text:
THE best chain sandwich shop in the game.   Flavorful meats, fresh toppings, and the best toasty bread!   Very reasonably priced compared to lesser quality competitors, too.  Online ordering is a huge plus!

Only tip/negative:  don't mess with the double meat.  I've ordered the same sandwich regular and with double meat, and noticed no difference between the two.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}

text: Grilled Chicken & Cheddar sandwich, add bacon.  Yes!!  The bread is great, the meat to bread ratio is correct and the flavor is there.  Next time I go, I hope they have some plain Lays chip in stock.  It's the only way to have a sandwich. lol

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}

text: I always order the wreck... I don't like salami but this sandwich is amazing and the salami is so thin you really can't tell that it's on there so don't order it without it you won't regret it or you can send me a nasty private message!...lol... I just don't know why anyone would go to subway when there are so many better places... They now offer a bigs sandwich which is bigger than the $5 sandwich... just let me tell you the $5 sandwich is plenty big enough...

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}
categories: Food, Delis, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Fast Food, Soup
text:
Finally a long awaited St. Louis location for the Chicago-based sandwich king. I've only visited THIS restaurant 3 times, but have at LEAST 100 Potbelly visits under my belt over the last 20 years.

The staff has been friendly, helpful and efficient on all three visits. including the first after they were in only in business for a week and the line was out the door!

The comparisons to other national sandwich chain restaurants are moot, because this is NOT Subway, Quiznos, or Jimmy Johns. The ingredient quality is top shelf and fresh [get 'A Wreck,' - its the best!] The bread is perfect and the hot peppers [giardiniera really] make the flavor profile outstanding! That can never be said about any other chain sandwich place.

Oh! I SO long for the Boysenberry smoothie, but they don't have it here [but the mixed berry is a great substitute]

"fewer ingredient/toppings than the average pizza place" - it is NOT a pizza place, although the "pizza" sandwich is loved by my kids. 

I'd rather see it in Clayton, UCity or CWE, but the decor is a great reproduction of the original Lincoln Park store in Chicago with a vintage urban vibe. Hopefully St Louis will do the right thing for the shop owners and give them the success they deserve so they can expand to those neighborhoods.

For taste, value and ambiance, it's worth the drive. You're doing yourself a disservice if you go to SubQuiznoJohns instead.

text: Great new restaurant in Creve Coeur.  It's a sandwich joint, and they make a mean shake/malt.  They also have Zapps potato chips (Hotter n' Hot Jalapeno is my FAVE), which reminds me of home back in Louisiana.  I would love to see another one of these opened closer to downtown so it's not so far out of the way.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}
categories: Food, Delis, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Fast Food, Soup
text:
If you've lived or been to the Chicago area who wasn't waiting for this place to open?  While few things could replace Provisions (the busines that was there prior to Potbellys), I feel as though Potbelly's is an adequate replacement.

If we were in Chicago I wouldn't even write this review because, well duh, it's potbelly's, everyone knows potbelly's.  However this is the first STL location and I feel like I should be part embassador to welcome everyone from STL to a wonderful sandwich and delightful shop.

All the sandwiches are toasted and they have a static but awesome menu.  Service is what sets this place apart.  EVERYONE there is helpful, doesn't matter if they're taking the order, making the sandwich, cleaning your table, or running the restaurant, it's just an attitude thing.

While I don't often partake in the shakes or smoothies on the few occassions I have participated they are delicious.

My go to sandwich is always the roast beef, but if you've never been, try the wreck definitely the most popular sandwich.  Make sure you get a pickle with your meal and if you like hot peppers make sure to add them as well.

One thing is for sure, this sandwich shop will never let you down, because it's consistent every time.

Pretty good sandwich place in the county.  It's super fast -- I think it took 4 minutes to wait in the short line, order and check out. I had the italian, which was great! Great place for lunch!

text: 4.5 stars.  I have been to this location on several occasions.  I really enjoy the sandwiches here, although I must admit I have not tried anywhere near all the options on the menu.  I prefer upgrading to the big version of the sandwiches.  I have not had a milkshake from here, although I heard they are outstanding.  I would like to try the milkshakes and more items on the menu on future visits.  This is a great spot for lunch, as they are fast & delicious.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}
categories: Food, Delis, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Fast Food, Soup
text: I am a pretty laid-back customer but public arguments among the staff are an issue that is likely to cause me to walk out. I got there today at 11:01 and they were not ready for business. I was just the fourth customer in line.  Three employees behind the counter were engaged in a loud and heated discussion. The lady taking orders was obviously embarrassed at the ruckus her coworkers were causing, and probably new to the job since she only took two sandwich orders from customer #1 in the first five minutes I waited. Since there were another two customers in front of me I calculated that I would be in line 10 minutes before getting to the register and getting my lunch, assuming the employees stopped arguing and started working. I decided to spend my money elsewhere today. I will give this location another chance, though. I hope the management will consider training the staff on appropriate behavior and customer service.

attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}
categories: Food, Delis, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Fast Food, Soup
text:
Solid 3.5 for the sandwich. Got the turkey on wheat with lettuce, tomato, pickles, mustard Italian seasoning. Mustard was a little spicy and made it extra tasty. The sandwich was well made. Heated and crispy bread. 

The service was ok. 7pm. Not too busy but not overly friendly either. I wanted a shake but it wasn't clear where to order it. I ordered two soups at the initial stop where the sandwich is ordered but it was forgotten.   Sandwich was under $5 so that was nice. 

Oatmeal chocolate chip cookie was solid. I would get it again. Strong chocolate flavor. 

Service could be improved but solid sandwich flavor and I will return. They even sell bottles of their hot peppers.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}
categories: Food, Delis, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Fast Food, Soup
text:
I got a turkey sandwich at this place.  It was pretty good, and the price was reasonable.  If you start to order cookies or chips, then the price goes up like way too much.  The peppers they use are canned jalapenos, not pickled pepperoncinis.  They are way too hot.  I had to pick them off.  It is not normal for a person to assault one's self with such an unpleasant sensation.  The turkey was OK, but it was the kind of lunch meat that is stored in a saline solution.  Not bad, but not great.  They also seem to have a habit of always adding oil, so if you ask for the sandwich without oil, then you will probably still get oil.  Personally, I just don't like oily sandwiches that make my hands oily when I try to eat them.

In summary, the sandwich and price isn't bad.  It's good, but not that great either.

text: I came back despite the poor service my last time here. As I had expected, this time the food was very good and the service was quick and the employees were nice. Good job.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
