text: Last night, no one wanted to cook dinner. And we didn't want to spend a lot. And I was wearing pajama pants because my jeans were in the dryer, so we decided to send my dad out for sandwiches and soup at Potbelly. Turns out they didn't have the kind of soup we wanted that day so we just got sandwiches.  It was nothing that would make you whip out you phone to tweet to the world, but the sandwiches were good and the shakes were...shakey. Good for a quick sandwich run though.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}

text: Potbelly sandwiches are just like I remembered.  Freaking delish.  Bread is awesome.  The meatball sandwich is delish, but only one problem.  Not enough marinara sauce.  Service was fantastic.  I asked for mushrooms in my sandwich.  Not a good idea.  Next time, I'll ask for extra marinara sauce.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}
categories: Food, Delis, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Fast Food, Soup
text:
While there is nothing new under the sun, Potbelly demonstrates that in spades.  They have fewer ingredient/toppings than the average pizza place and more importantly less than the average sub shop.

As other "fatten up America" restaurants go, this is no different; offering a 3 cheese mushroom melt as their veggie option, a 860 calorie PB&J, and milkshakes.  

As a vegan, I also had to leave off the cheese and egg from their only vegetarian salad leaving little more than lettuce, chick peas, and dressing.

In a sea of many sandwich places and delis, and as someone who focuses on healthy eating options, let me offer Potbelly the following advice:

- Expand your horizons ingredient-wise.  How about some roasted red peppers, artichoke hearts, spinach, hummus, roasted eggplant, grilled asparagus, tapenade, etc.?

- Leave off the cheeses (or offer non-dairy cheeses) and price fatty ingredients as add-ons.  Don't make me feel like I've left a bunch of money on the table by asking them to be left off.

On the plus side, I did notice they offered non or low fat versions of some dressings and condiments as well as a vegetarian soup option (which I didn't try).

Even with Quiznos and Subway closer and in some ways a better value, I may give it another shot.  However, there really wasn't anything being offered that'd have me rushing back there, though I might join a friend who simply insisted on a Potbelly fix of their own.

text: Very efficient. Limited menu, decently healthy. Good quality for fast food.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}
categories: Food, Delis, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Fast Food, Soup
text: Attempted to order delivery 1.8 miles from this location for dinner ,the website states there is a $25 minimum for delivery, we had an order totaling over $60, when we attempted to order, the manager tells us that they will not deliver due to it raining...really ? We live in St.Louis, it can freaking rain here a lot..so when it snows do they shut the place down for the season? I am rating my experience not on the food, since I was not able to purchase any, but on the customer service which was horrible. If you are not wanting to deliver for any reason then there should be a disclaimer on their site and menu. The fact that there are a couple of raindrops falling is an unacceptable reason to not provide the service that they advertise. I will not be giving them a second chance and my coworkers feel the same. They lost potential customers today due to a manger that needs to be fired!!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}
categories: Food, Delis, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Fast Food, Soup
text: Wow, for a simple sandwich place, I was pretty impressed!  I love the different, added touch of live music - good atmosphere.  I will say, I could barely hear the person sitting across the small table from me.  It's LOUD in there.  Went during lunch on a business day, pretty crowded, there was a girl taking orders electronically to make it go faster - nice.  Food was good.  Comparable pricing to most other sandwich places, got the turkey and loaded potato soup (which was DELICIOUS) and a soda and spent $10.  In comparison to Subway, would have spent the same, but still had half a foot-long for tomorrow!  I'll go back.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}
categories: Food, Delis, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Fast Food, Soup
text:
Potbelly's is on practically every corner in Chicago and I ate lunch there many many times.  So most of this review is probably based on the feelings of nostalgia and finally being able to get the sandwiches here in St. Louis.  But man, I love this place and I love my tuna on wheat (everything but tomatoes and hot peppers!).  This location is very quick which is good because the line was out the door. You have to try the sugar cookies as well.  So delicious and soft.  I am a huge fan and I am so happy to see one in St. Louis.

If I had to make one complaint it's that the restaurant doesn't really have a great kid's menu (no sandwich place does) but they do offer PB&J.  Although when I was there I did see my own child and two other tables skipping the sandwiches and drinking shakes/eating chips/eating cookies instead.  So keep that in mind if you're traveling with kids - the sandwiches are probably too weird for them.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}

text:
Really liked this place in Chicago, only difference I noticed here is that there is just one size sub instead of two sizes. I showed up at about 7:55PM didn't realize they closed at 8PM. As we were about to leave the manager came out and told us we could order. We said that it was ok, we realized they were closing and he insisted it was fine so that was nice. 
I like the turkey, it is good quality and nice to have a place to get a quick sandwich. (I just can't stand the gelatinous subway "turkey")

text: We'll definitely come back.. Their sandwiches are unique to my taste buds.. I like the Mediterranean sub, oh my, can't wait for my next visit. One tip, if you're eating in a group, try buying a larger potato chips bag to share from the nearby Trader Joe's..

text: We have had Potbelly in Chicago many times, and were excited to see it come to the St. Louis Area. It was fairly busy, and I can see why - the food is really great. I had a hot Italian sandwich, chips (all kinds of Zapp's!), and a soda. Simple, cheap, but sooooo good! I highly recommend stopping by Potbelly for lunch!

text:
I have passed this location many times and finally had time to stop in and see what it was all about.

They have a vibrant, limited menu that posts all the information about your selection.  I chose the "A Wreck" sandwich on wheat, which satisfied my hunger.

They had a local musician playing and the atmosphere was very clean, inviting and friendly.

text: First time at Pot Belly and I loved the food. Plus, they surprised me with a free cookie (oatmeal chocolate chip), which was one of the best cookies I have eaten in a long time. I will definitely be back.

text: Visited my friend in St. Louis and we wound up here. Honestly great grub, loved the Mediterranean sandwich. Nice environment (live music!) and service, overall super pleasant experience.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}
categories: Food, Delis, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Fast Food, Soup
text:
I'm no Joey Tribiani, but I know a good sandwich when I taste one. This was a good sandwich. You could tell immediately that they use high-quality ingredients and the toasting gave it a uniquely delicious taste. I tried the turkey and swiss, plus bacon, and thought it was great.

Another thing worth mentioning is that I went for a weekday lunch. The place was packed due to all of the office buildings in the area. The line was wound around and nearly reached the door. Potbelly didn't miss a beat! They had an employee taking your order on a tablet while you waited in line, it was ready and waiting when you got to the counter, they directed you to one of several toppings stations to pick what you wanted on it and then to the cashier. I was out the door in under 10 mins. Impressive!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}

text: Good classic sandwiches but they have a very limited selection and they aren't real inventive.  This is definitely a step up from some sandwich shops.  They have live music every once in awhile.  I used to enjoy Lenny's just down the road that I think they have probably put out of business.  Their sandwiches where just as good and were more creative, but they didn't have the style that Potbelly has.

text: Disappointed. Moved here recently & loved my neighborhood Potbelly's so I was excited when I found this one. I ordered the Uptown salad. It was not what I expected. Much of the lettuce was brown and it was missing the nuts. The service was great, even at lunchtime rush. I won't be going out of my to come here again.

text: I just missed the rush! Arrived here at 11:50 AM on a Saturday with only a couple people in line but in 20 minutes they've managed to amass a couple dozen people ordering sandwiches. It's that good and it's that hot. That's pretty much all you need to know! Popular = awesome.  3 guys and a girl behind the counter trying to run the whole operation doing a fabulous job.

text:
bleccchhhhhkkkkkk.......

That is how I felt about my sandwich the day the office decided that pot belly was the way to roll.  I ordered a meatball with cheese and some macaroni salad on the side.  The salad was okay but had too much sauce.

The bread on the sandwich just was not good.  It taste like bread that was made a few days ago and with a ton of preservatives.

Everybody else in the office liked their sandwich and enjoyed the bread.  I personally like subway bread better and Jimmy Johns.  I will make sure and skip this lunch option next time.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}

text:
The Wreck, a whole pickle, and a shake! Win!

I first tried Potbelly when I was in Dallas for a business trip. I was very excited when I found that they opened a location close to where I live. I love the whole pickle and I always request that they not cut it so it could eat it the same way I did as a kid. They also have the best wheat bread in a chain deli - in my opinion.

I've never had any issues here at all except for I arrived when they closed because the time stated on Yelp was not the same. I wish they would update the closing time on their page in case anyone wanted to have a sandwich after 9PM.

attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}
categories: Food, Delis, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Fast Food, Soup
text: I am glad I have this fun little sandwich shop on our campus so I can swing by here for lunch.  It is one of your better sandwich shops that you'll find around.  They have a nice system to get you through the line very quickly.  You have to get sandwiches hot, which I haven't seen before.  I typically like cold sub's but these are still pretty tasty.  My favorite thing overall about this place is that it is very affordable.  If you don't feel like packing a lunch on any given day, you can walk up there and only drop about 5 bucks.  That is very low compared to everything else that is around.  I am going to miss this place when I move back to our corporate office!

text: The sub sandwiches are limited in variety but better than Jimmy Johns or Subway. They are the absolute tastiest sub sandwiches I have ever eaten. The people working there are typically always nice.

text: The food here is decent but the service from one employee was not good.  They have what should be on the sand which on the board but still ask what toppings which confuses me because i just want want is supposed to be on the sand which.  The lady working told us that they felt bad for messing up and forgetting people's orders and basically blamed it on us when it was her fault for forgetting.  She said we should've waited because it was out of order but there was nothing we could do about that because we would've held up the line.  The man was very kind and gave the messed up orders free cookies.  I will not be coming back here.  The girl also was not wearing gloves while making the sand which.

text:
I love their sandwiches here. My personal favorite is A Wreck on flatbread toasted. 
The meatball sandwich is also great. (Of course, they have healthier options as well, including salads.). 

Live music in the sandwich shop, too. 

Service is fast (even when they get crazy busy).

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}
categories: Food, Delis, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Fast Food, Soup
text: This is a sandwich place I'd like to try again, which is rare. I went on a weekday at perhaps 1PM with a relative. It was crowded and loud with a musician inside, but it died off and quieted as we ate and chatted, in no hurry. I felt like there were a lot more sandwiches on their online menu than in person, which confused me and caused me to need to change my order. They do have fountain soda, which I'm happy about. Both of us got the soup/half sandwich combo, both getting the Mediterranean, mine with chicken, hers without. It was a bit spicy but tolerable unless you can handle no spice whatsoever. The sandwich was just fine we thought; I'd try a different one next time. I did enjoy the multigrain bread, which is not one I would normally choose, and having it toasted made it even better. The real standouts were the soups. I liked the chicken pot pie soup--it's kind of bland, but so is chicken pot pie in my experience. It's just a kind of comfort food. They have oyster crackers to add also. My relative had the chicken enchilada soup, which I tried a spoonful of. It was very flavorful. I'd like to go back to order that soup and try another sandwich. You do choose toppings and condiments on your sandwich, which I'm actually not a fan of with these specialty sandwich places. I don't know what goes well together unless I try it; I want an expert to put the flavors together for me and just let me request a change if needed rather than letting me chance covering up all the flavors with mayo or another condiment (I resisted doing so this time; the tomato kept enough moisture that it didn't feel dry without a condiment other than the included hummus). But alas that's not how it's done, and most people probably prefer it this way.

text: Used to be good but now the workers are careless about their food! I asked for a turkey sandwich and the turkey was clumpy and it smelled like fish. I  had to reiterate my order of soup because they forget that I ordered it in front. Every time I walk in the workers give me a nasty look like they don't want me to be there. Who wants to go to a place like that? So now I go to Pickleman's instead because it's right down the street and the workers there are so kind.

categories: Food, Delis, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Salad, Fast Food, Soup
text:
There is no finer sandwich shop in St Louis than the Potbelly on Olive Blvd near I-270.  Fantastic and fresh ingredients, well portioned sandwiches and an excellent staff, friendly and welcoming.  

I'm given a free cookie, awesome!!; but, when I offer something for the tip jar, I am told politely "Thanks, but we cannot accept tips". WTF??? That's un-American. Lol. I tip my hat to this wonderful crew-of-two; Luke and Shawn.

Why oh why is there no Potbelly in South County where I work and live??

text: Guy taking our order needed me to repeat myself a few times (and he needed the manager to tell him too). Ordered a half Mediterranean sandwich and cup veggie soup.  My husband ordered the whole Mediterranean salad and Italian sandwich. His food was great ; my soup was delicious.  My sandwich was disappointing.  I added some of my husband's salad to it to dress it up.  See the before picture.

attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}

text: This is my first time coming to potbelly. And honestly the food is okay. Dint get me wrong but to be honest. The girl that was checking us out she was not any help. She was rude.  And said shrugged  her shoulders and said "next time you come in you order your sandwich at the top and the sides and shakes, smoothies. At this end. Like how am I supposed to know that?!?! They also didnt offer any of the toppings to us. Like mayo pickles and etc. So we and my boyfriend ate our Italian  sandwich dry. This is so frustrating  I wanna enjoy a nice sandwich after I got off of work. They need to work on there manners. Did n.v i mention  she forgot to put my two orders of mac and cheese and banana  smoothie on the same ticket  so I for it selrate... unbelievable

text: Not only do they have the best food and best cookies, but I have never had such amazing service! Rob was hands down the nicest person to deal with, but his positivity and kindness has guaranteed a customer for life. Great store with amazing people!

text: Not only are the sandwiches and everything else good... the guy name Rob I spoke to on the phone was Phenomenal! He has such great customer services! Everyone that I talked to and every time are always so nice! He even told me about the app for Potbelly so our department can get rewards for the orders that we order once a week. Definitely go here for food and ask for Rob. Thank you PB!

text: We love Potbelly. I was so disgusted today to see that every single employee was NOT wearing a mask INSIDE the restaurant while they spoke and milled around...I arrived early to place my order and saw all this 10 minutes before the store opened. The man and two women wore their masks under their damn chins! WTH!? To think that they are possibly spreading Covid minutes before I ordered my food and touched their counter?! Disgusting and dangerous behavior! Will not be back.

text: First time at Pot Belly I got the BLT & potato soup.  The soup was very tasty  and I enjoyed it a lot.  The  BLT was very peppery (no mention in menu that they peppered the sandwich)  it was way to spicey.  Probably will not go back again.

text:
Arrived to pick up two subs at 1130am. 
At least 50 customers arrived after me & left before me. I asked for my order from four different staff members during the hour I was there and they were utterly clueless. When I finally got my food, not even the slightest apology. It was just thrown in my face.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}

text: Customer Service is horrible! My sixteen-year old son went in alone and they were terribly rude to him and did the sandwiches all wrong and then blamed him! I won't go back despite being a somewhat loyal customer. They often get the order wrong and act like they are doing you a favor to wait on you. FYI...if they put the wrong toppings on, they just wipe off bread and don't start over. Very dangerous for those with allergies. Go somewhere else...not missing much here.

text: I stopped in for lunch this past summer when it was raining. I should have went to Arby's instead. This was the most flavorless tasteless sandwich I've ever eaten in my life. I really thought it was going to be a good sandwich judging by the crowd. They were trying to rip off Quiznos, which have now all closed in St. Charles county. Now, I don't seem to have anywhere to go for a decent sandwich.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "'quiet'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': None, 'validated': False, 'lot': None, 'valet': False}", 'DriveThru': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}

text:
This was my first time eating at a potbellys and I was impressed! I will definitely be back for lunch in the future.
Great sandwiches and soup! The chicken enchilada soup was great and honestly better than I was expecting. Friendly and knowledgeable staff. Inside is nice and clean and they offer a decent sized outside seating area with several tables. They also deliver and offer catering as well. Price is on par with other specialty sandwich shops suck as picklemans or firehouse subs ($12 for a large sandwich, a cup of soup, and a drink).

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "'quiet'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': None, 'validated': False, 'lot': None, 'valet': False}", 'DriveThru': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}
categories: Food, Sandwiches, Delis, Fast Food, Juice Bars & Smoothies, Soup, Restaurants, Salad
text: This is my favorite sub place hands down! This is my to go place especially after a hard workout! The menu has all sorts of choices from Beef, Chicken, Turkey, and veggie options for everyone to enjoy! This place has the best staff and customer service I have ever met! Every time I go there they are willing to go out of there way to make sure you have the best experience here which I always do! I always either get the chicken with cheddar, turkey with Swiss, roast beef, or Mediterranean on flat! They are all Phenomenal and I always look forward to going here! Anyone who enjoys a good deli sandwich has to try this place out and make sure to get Hot Peppers on your sandwich they are AMAZING!!!! They do have chips, shakes, and cookies so make sure to make yourself a good healthy meal ! Great place for kids as well with tons of choices! Make sure to check this place out, you will not be disappointed!

categories: Food, Sandwiches, Delis, Fast Food, Juice Bars & Smoothies, Soup, Restaurants, Salad
text:
The only reason I gave 2 stars is because the smoothies/shakes were great.  Customer service
is terrible.  I called in my order for 5 pm.  The person taking my order was very unsure of himself.  I ordered 4 sandwiches, 1 cup & 1 bowl of chili and 4 smoothies.  My order was not ready at 5 like promised.  When we got it home we were missing all the chili and 1 sandwich was not made correctly.  Had to go back to the store to pick up the rest of the food and for our inconvenience they gave us a cookie.  I guess that's all our business is worth to them.
Very disappointed.  Won't go back.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop

text: This was a really clean place! The woman who took my order was so friendly! And very helpful. The food? Absolutely horrible! I got the pizza sub w/meatballs. There was maybe half a meatball broken up and spread throughout the sand which. I'm not even exaggerating. And there just wasn't much flavor. My girlfriend got the chicken Mediterranean. The flavor severely lacked on hers as well! She also got the Mac and cheese. Bland as well. I will not return. So many better places to go! Trust me, it's just not worth the money, or time.

attributes: {'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "'quiet'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': None, 'validated': False, 'lot': None, 'valet': False}", 'DriveThru': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}
categories: Food, Sandwiches, Delis, Fast Food, Juice Bars & Smoothies, Soup, Restaurants, Salad
text:
I visit Potbelly Sandwich Shop again for lunch at 1:30 pm on Sunday. There are only a few groups of consumers, so I could easily find a table for me.

There is "Skinny Pair : $7.40", which we can choose any skinny sandwich with a salad or a soup as a side, so I ordered it and chose T-K-Y sandwich and chicken pot soup. The combination with T-K-Y, pepperoni, and mayo was great. Chicken pot soup was also delicious. Additionally, surprisingly, I got FREE drink!!! Why is it free??!!

A clerk was so helpful and thoughtful. I am not so good at English, but he kindly repeated an explanation several times for me. I am grateful to his patience. Thank you very much.

At a corner in the shop, there was live music by a person playing the guitar, and it was making the mood/atmosphere great. Thanks to him, I could relaxed and enjoyed lunch.

I recommend you to try this shop!!
(updated on January 14th, 2018)


-----
I visit Potbelly Sandwich Shop for lunch at 2pm on Friday, so there are only several consumers. I ordered a banana shake and a salad, Up Town, where they have apple, grapes, raisins, blue cheese, and so on in it. A staff was thoughtful, and she asked me if I can eat blue cheese or not when I ordered it.

The salad was delicious. The shake is real fruit shake, and it was hand made. She made it from banana and ice cream in the counter. The shake was delicious and creamy. I definitely recommend shakes to you.

text: No idea how the food is. They made my sandwich but refused to give it to me because their credit card machine was and had been down. Forgot to ask me if I had cash prior to making my order. It was 2:30pm and I was dying. Had to go somewhere else. They should have put up a sign. Don't think I'll be back. I guess the trash can might have enjoyed the sandwich. They threw away my perfectly fine sandwich when they saw I didn't carry cash.

categories: Food, Sandwiches, Delis, Fast Food, Juice Bars & Smoothies, Soup, Restaurants, Salad
text:
Stopped in for dinner because I had a taste for soup and it by far exceeded my expectations! I see so many places with all of this traveling; but there's nothing like choosing a restaurant and being blown away by service and food! Yes, that's right... Dan completely blew me away with his outstanding service!! He went above and beyond to make recommendations and to ensure that my experience was extremely pleasant! Service goes a long way and I wish there were more Dan's from PotBelly St Charles worldwide!! Just to be brief I ordered a grilled cheese sandwich with a bowl of tomato soup. My total was roughly $11. There are many items to choose from.... I even saw a sign that will allow you to build your own Mac and Cheese. I hear it's back by popular demand so it must be amazing. They even have "SKINNYS" meal items for people that are partaking in these end of the year diets! 
My food was delicious!! I actually did takeout but for those that want to get out of the house; dining in would be a great choice as there are plenty of tables and chairs and the restaurant was super clean! If ever in the area again; I most certainly will stop in and I recommend whoever reads this review to do the same!!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "'quiet'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': None, 'validated': False, 'lot': None, 'valet': False}", 'DriveThru': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}
categories: Food, Sandwiches, Delis, Fast Food, Juice Bars & Smoothies, Soup, Restaurants, Salad
text: Can't get much worse. Both chocolate milks were over 10 days passed the Best Buy date for the kids meals. They didn't give the salad dressing for both salads. They didn't put the Swiss cheese in either salad also. Drove back and found out all their chocolate milk is expired so they couldn't replace it. They gave the salad dressing for the salads when I returned but gave the wrong dressing for one of the salads. I decided to use the ranch anyway and it tasted soured and very off so I couldn't eat it. Very disappointed. I use to go here all the time but I don't think I could possibly return after discovering multiple instances of them using expired drinks and condiments.

text:
I have stopped in Potbelly-St. Charles several times since they've opened. All of my experiences there have been above-average. Employees are very friendly and the management is great (of those managers that I have met) I am just now leaving a review because the Pastrami BIG that I ordered today was outstanding! I would even rival it against ones that I've consumed in NY.

Additionally, there was live music playing which was soothing as opposed to distracting while I ate. I don't go out and get sandwiches too often, but with the quality of food along with relaxing live music, I may have to make more trips!

text: Great sandwiches and great soup, when you can get it. Visited at 3:45pm and were out of chicken noodle soup, one of the daily soup specials that day. We specifically went there to get the soup and then learned they were out. Can't they make another batch when they run out? This is the third time we have visited since they opened and the second time they have been out of the daily soup. It's almost not worth the gas to get there if they are going to be out of what you want to order, especially by mid-afternoon. Really disappointed.

text: I've attempted to order from this place twice for delivery which is an option on their website.  However, the first time I was not informed there wasn't a delivery driver until after waiting over an hour. The second time I was called after immediately placing the order. However, why the delivery option if it's not really an option. I was told by the employee that I could use grubhub or doordash but I'd rather not. Needless to say I won't be ordering from this location. I LOVE the sandwiches I've had most recently at the Creve location (who did deliver).

This was my first time visiting and truthfully the sandwich was very dry , even with oil and mayo. The mac n cheese was pretty okay very creamy. The staff is super friendly and knowledgeable though.

text:
I visit Potbelly Sandwich Shop for lunch at 2pm on Friday, so there are only several consumers. I ordered a banana shake and a salad, Up Town, where they have apple, grapes, raisins, blue cheese, and so on in it. A staff was thoughtful, and she asked me if I can eat blue cheese or not when I ordered it.

The salad was delicious. The shake is real fruit shake, and it was hand made. She made it from banana and ice cream in the counter. The shake was delicious and creamy. I definitely recommend shakes to you.

text: Turkey sandwich was fine, but nothing special.  (I wouldn't make a special trip to seek out this restaurant.) Sandwiches are toasted. You can make your sandwich into a meal deal which includes chips and a drink.  I was a little turned off by the fact that one of the young men  kept sniffling while making our sandwiches.

text: I've been here a few times due to it's proximity to LU.  The food is meh at best, which I can live with (not every meal needs to be the best ever), but the customer service is horrible. The employees were down right rude with customers.  Not worth a return trip when there are so many other eateries in that area.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "'quiet'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': None, 'validated': False, 'lot': None, 'valet': False}", 'DriveThru': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}
categories: Food, Sandwiches, Delis, Fast Food, Juice Bars & Smoothies, Soup, Restaurants, Salad
text:
I first discovered Potbelly two weeks ago, and I am glad I did! The food is great. While the sandwiches are not as big as what you would get from a competing well-known sandwich shop, the flavor does help to make up for that. I have been to Potbelly three times already, and I have paid three different anounts for the EXACT SAME SANDWICH. This is very frustrating. The last time I was there, the employee behind the counter was a young guy who didn't seem to care all that much and just wanted to get me out the door...he charged me the most for my sandwich...in fact, the WRONG sandwich! When I said something, he apparently thought it was funny, and another girl helped refund my purchase. I only got 30-something cents back when it should have been in the neighborhood of 3 DOLLARS! I have reached out to customer service about this, and am confident they will help make it right.

I mention these issues so that you can be aware going in, especially if it is your first time. Don't let my experiences dissuade you from going, though! The food really is great. I'm thinking I may need to order online for takeout so that I am charged the correct amount. The only problem is that it's not always practical or convenient to do that, but it is a solution...probably easier than expecting employees to know how to ring up your order correctly.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "'quiet'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': None, 'validated': False, 'lot': None, 'valet': False}", 'DriveThru': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'CoatCheck': 'False'}
categories: Food, Sandwiches, Delis, Fast Food, Juice Bars & Smoothies, Soup, Restaurants, Salad
text:
Comfortable, cozy, and considerate Potbelly is the national sandwich chain that feels like the casual younger sibling of Type A Panera. 
Even Saturday mornings at Panera can feel like serious things are getting done with various couples hunched over documents or groups working on projects. 
Potbelly, with its early 20th century feel of oak furniture, pseudo-antique furnishings, and fun signs, is more casual and laid back.
However, Potbelly is serious about providing top quality food. My T-K-Y (turkey and Swiss cheese) sandwich tasted more crafted, fresher and deli-like than Subway's. The whole wheat bread contained sunflower seeds, for example. 
Chunky chicken enchilada soup was also fresh tasting. 
I'll be back.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text: This place is pretty good, I come here once a week but the reason three stars rather than 4 is for two things that are a little annoying: first of all they only sell diet half iced tea/lemonade. I really don't get why they have four rows in the drink refrigerator for diet half and half and not one lousy non-diet half and half. Does that make any sense at all? Is diet half and half in such demand that it warrants for rows to the exclusion of regular? And I've talked to people about this. To no avail. My other gripe is how everybody kind of communicates via corporate-speak. It's the same schpeil every day about the sandwich, "Hi sir" and "Is Swiss cheese okay?" (every time)  etc etc it's kind of bothersome. People shouldn't be drones

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text:
I always get the large meatball sandwich, which is probably one of the most caloric sandwiches to get there.  I request extra sauce and get just Italian seasoning.  The pickled hot peppers also go well too.  I wish they had some parm to top the sandwich.

The lines get long during lunch so make sure you come by early to avoid the rush.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text: Yummy & quick with healthy lunch options (the "skinny" sandwiches are a great alternative, with less stuff inside - as are the side soup & 1/2 sandwich option) . Yes, folks, the potbelly is for a stove, ie a "home cooked style" , body warming meal - not neccesarily one that gives you a pot belly ( ; Fun retro decorations too . Tasty food with friendly service, that's not too hard on the wallet . Its a winner all around. ps. There are locations throughout the city & the 'burbs .

text: That stupid singing guy with the guitar ruins it for me. I'm going to lunch, not a concert.  He sings way too loud and expects us to give him money.  I'm not sure why they don't kick him out.  The food is actually pretty decent,  better than average,  but every time I walk by and I see him in there,  I go somewhere else.  I find it to be quite annoying.  Every other place kicks out these vagrants but potbelly seems to allow it more often than not.  It makes it very hard to have a conversation while you eat.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text: I like the convenience of this place more than anything. The line moves fast during lunch rush hour, and there is also a good selection of sandwiches and soups, made to order. Nothing really stands out to me as outstanding, just your average sandwich place. I did enjoy my grilled chicken on wheat, the kale soup was just OK. So worth stopping by and checking out if you are in a rush and need a sandwich fast. They also have a great nutritional calculator online (surprisingly most full sandwiches are around 500 cals, eek).

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text:
I know I am biased.  I went to college in Chicago (98-02) and often frequented Potbelly's near my dorm.  Back then, the sandwiches were $3.50 and they didn't have salads or skinny versions.  Simpler times... 

When I heard they were coming to Philadelphia, I emailed all my friends and urged them to try it.  I even had it delivered for lunch for my bridal party on my wedding day as we were getting our hair/make-up done :)

My long-term relationship with Potbelly's is still going strong.  I usually get turkey with everything but oil & mayo.  Their mustard is awesome and I actually keep a jar of their hot pepper at home as a staple pantry item.  It's SUPER spicy and flavorful packed in oil.  It's great with eggs and with grilled meat too. 

Yesterday, I went there alone to get my usual and was happy to eat the familiar, yummy sammie I love.  It's a comfort food for me. 

I know people are huge fans of their milkshakes.  I love the mini cookies they put around the straw.  I wonder if they still do that.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}

text: Da bomb...Ditka would love this Chicago based joint.  New manager had turned this place around!

attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}

text: They have sweet potato pop chips! also love the T-K-Y sandwich which is a turkey skinny sandwich for just $4! well done potbelly! They re very quick during the lunchtime rush and really get the line moving fast. The place is usually clean and they have outdoor seating. The staff has always been friendly to me.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text:
I recently started working in center city and began to find lunch spots that I can go to regularly.  I happened upon Potbelly my second month and wished I had gotten here sooner.

From the fun and quirky decor, it is obviously a chain/franchise.  This is not bad, but not a reason to go or stay, it just is.

The sandwiches are run through an oven and makes them warm and crispy, which I like.  After the sandwich flows through the oven, you get to pick from a good selection of toppings and spices to add.  All in all a pretty good sandwich.  Not inventive or unique, but still pretty good.

One important thing to note is that the staff here is among the friendliest I have ever seen.  Even on days of bad weather or jammed at lunch, their attitude does not change and is great.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop

text: I always get the turkey breast with mushrooms on original wheat for breakfast. No lines in the morning. Lunch for breakfast. This review is currently shorter than most...oh well. The food is good, period.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text:
Potbelly sandwich works is a chain based in Chicago, IL - (my hometown). Today, for lunch, I wanted to escaped my office for an hour "calgon take me away" and I didn't really know where I was walking to. I decided to go to Potbelly, since I no longer live off of City Ave and haven't been to the one by Perelman building since moving to University city. It's been awhile.... I beat the lunch crowd and found a seat a little away from the door...

Today, I got a cuppa soup. Cream of Tomato, because it's pretty chilly outside - Chicago-worthy winds and my Vegetarian sandwich with the works. (tomato, mustard,pickle, sweet pepper and lettuce on whole grain)

I like Potbelly bread - they bake it fresh daily and I like the choice of whole grain vs regular. 

Service was fast and I ate. Brrrr, it was really cold in the Potbelly, guess because the winds were strong...I really felt like i was at the Lincoln Ave location today or Evanston. 

I think Potbelly is a decent place to get a sandwich. It's economical, tasty and you can have it your way.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text:
Working 2 blocks away and having to fight the Center City work crowd for lunch, their online ordering system is great! For those large orders that always seem to get screwed up by those other places, Potbelly gives you yours with individual computerized labels for each person on each sandwich. So you're probably thinking you must not be able to customize much with this system. Wrong! You can type in any request and they will comply or call you to clarify. We had a gluten-free person in our group and requested the worker change gloves before making her salad. Done! No problem.

Their breakfast is excellent as it is the same size sandwich as lunch for $2.99. Again, quick service and always fresh, as it is made to order.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text:
First introduced  to Potbelly a decade ago in another city, I have been a fan ever since.  In a city like Philly with countless home-grown lunch choices, Potbelly may not be as competitive as it is in towns with fewer alternatives. 

In any case, Potbelly's strengths include the option to have your sandwich made "skinny" by the removal of 1/3 of the roll, the warming of the roll before it is filled with your selected protein, Potbelly's special hot pepper mix, and reasonable prices.  

Because I don't generally eat cold cuts, my sandwich of choice is the chicken salad on skinny wheat with swiss, extra hot peppers, extra onions, tomatoes, lettuce, pickles and Italian seasoning (no oil).   When the chicken salad is properly made, it has the barest amount of mayonnaise necessary to hold the salad together.   This location gets it right about half the time.   I have been known to order the Biggee and make two or more meals out of it.   The sandwich actually improves with overnight refrigeration.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text: Great sandwich shop! Come here whenever I'm in the mood for a quick sandwich. They keep the line moving. I love that they toast the whole sandwich. They have a lot of toppings and their famous hot peppers. A sandwich is only about $6 so it's a great cheap lunch.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text: I've eaten at the 1635 Market location several times.  Some of the menu items are average at best however, some items are actually quite good (Up until today I was a fan of their uptown salad).  Unfortunately, following today's meal I will likely never be back.  I ordered the Grilled Chicken and Cheddar.  Bites one and two were okay, rather tasty in fact.  However, bite three ruined it.  Inside my sandwich was a metal washer, around a half inch in diameter.  Fortunately I was not hurt and I quickly called to store to let them know.  I returned the washer to them so they could hopefully identify it and determine how it wound up in my sandwich.  They were nice enough, apologized and gave me a coupon for a free sandwich which expires in six weeks.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text:
Awful, just awful. Not only was the food horrible but the staff was just simply rude. Maybe they were having a rough day - but why ruin my lunch over it? 

The roast beef tasted old and the roll - even though it was toasted tasted like it had once been frozen. Yuck.

And - the address doesn't help you find the location. I was very late meeting a friend there because the address is misleading. I called and got attitude since I wasn't sure where they were located.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text:
Don't expect to wowed over by Potbelly's.  I don't think that you'll necessarily be disappointed either but this is not some fantastic sandwich joint by any means.
What you'll get is a decently sized, good, average sandwich at a reasonable price.  Really nothing to complain about.  The menu here is by no means huge or interesting - it covers the basics & pretty much everyone should find something they'll enjoy.
The sandwiches & salads are made to order & you're herded down the assembly line at a pretty good pace.  It was pretty busy when I visited this location, but everything moved along very steadily.
The one thing I really didn't like was the guy they had in there loudly singing with his guitar.  Annoying.  I'm at lunch.  I do not want to yell over Guitar Guy to bitch about all the BS currently going down at work, thank you very much.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text:
Agree overall with Laurel's review... basic, average sandwiches for a reasonable price. Line moves quickly, although there is a bit of confusion and I'm never quite sure if they got my order right, although they have every time so far. Soups are great, and the salads are good (nothing spectacularly creative or remarkably fresh). And the oatmeal chocolate chip cookies are really, really good.

Also definitely agree that the Guitar Guy is a waste of space - I'm guessing it's part of the Potbelly's shtick, but really who needs live music during their lunch hour? Also, you could easily fit one or two tables there instead of him and all of his equipment, and help alleviate the seating problem there.

Perfect for a change of scenery if you don't feel like Quizno's or Subway, plus the seating area (minus the guitar guy) is much more inviting and homey. And, if you planned ahead, you can submit your order for this location online and skip right to the cashier for pickup.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text: Nothing compares to "The Wreck" with everything on it. The hot peppers are full of flavor and subtle heat. It is a flavorful masterpiece of a sandwich. Visited today and service and food were top notch. I devoured this warm delight in the car! I wished they were open a bit later into the evening, is the only thing that could improve upon this wonderful establishment.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop

text: i wish we had these in LA!!! Way cheaper than subway or quiznos, way yummier ingredients, and pretty decent customer service. i ordered the farmhouse salad with potbelly vinaigrette. SO GOOD! it was like a light cobb, only 420 cals. my bf got the wreck, and i was kinda jealous !
