text: Walk here from my hotel whenever I'm in town for work. Potbelly is great no matter what locations - quick, cheap and tasty!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text:
There is a wide range of reviews here, which generally signals to me that a restaurant's service and/or food quality is not consistent. I HAVE NEVER FOUND THAT TO BE THE CASE here. The sandwiches are of good quality, and line super fast. There's always seating. I can't believe fellow center city  Philadelphians haven't discovered this little gem. You get the same food as Cosi basically, at 2/3 the cost.

I think its because the name "potbelly" elicits a visual of someone with a big stomach sticking out from eating their food and that's why people avoid it. It's actually named for a kind of old fashioned stove, their food doesn't make you fat! You can even get anything on a "skinny roll" which is a thinner, less bready roll than their regular hoagie roll, wheat roll avail.

They also have BREAKFAST!!!!! the $3 Bacon Egg Lettuce Tomato sandwich is awesome, and cheaper than the food cart outside their window. I get the skinny roll, which by the way, is baked fresh on premises.

Service was always with a smile each time I go, and I am a happy camper. I pity the fools waiting in line elsewhere around the block!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text: I've been sleeping on Potbelly. My ass has been waiting my time and money on subway. The bread was fresh as shit omg. And the meat? Bro amazing! I was mad that I didn't eat my sandwich warm. I was hungover as fuck, but once I was better the sandwich was still A1 even chilled. The milkshake was also a plus. I'll be back y'all xoxo

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text:
My wife and I stopped in this morning for breakfast. Everything with our visit was fine. Much later today, after a 4 hour car ride, my wife realized she had lost her backpack. The backpack contained her computer and other electronics, etc. We called the hotel where we had stayed and then the shop on Market St. hoping that there would be a chance that it was found. We were incredibly relived that the folks at the store had found it and set it aside knowing that someone would likely call. All too often stories like this end in disappointment.

I would sincerely like to thank the entire staff of the Philly Market St Potbelly and hope that someone from headquarters gives them a call for a job well done!

Thank you!

Peter

text: Simply ok. Nothing more... Nothing less. The customer service was nice, but my sandwich was dry and boring. Plus, I had to create a "veggie" sandwich since it wasn't one on the menu. I had to order a mushroom melt without mushrooms :-(

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text: It's a tie between which sandwich place is better, JJ (jimmy johns or potbelly). I think you get more meat at jimmy johns and fluffier bread at potbelly.  They're about similar prices, I think there's more toppings at potbelly. I get the wreck (basically Italian) or mushroom melt (three cheese melted on mushrooms). SO GOOD!! Good lunch place or quick bite for dinner spot.  It's really close to the comcast building!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text:
Everyone here is very friendly and attentive. So great job to the staff. They do try to keep the lumch rush line moving.

However, I think I grew up spoiled by my wawa bc they always were so generous with the cold cuts. Now I find myself disappointed by the lack of meat in the sandwich here. I feel like they are short on everything: the onions, the oil, the seasoning. I just cant get my fill here! Also, I've never had a hot italian, it was always cold. Not sure how I feel about toast cold cuts...

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text: Since they closed down the one in the Gayborhood, I have made the trek over to this location a few times when I crave some potbelly.  The sandwiches in my opinion are a solid 4-5 star experience.  The service is quick, however I think it might be more friendly if I was ordering from actual robots.  Everyone there seems like they hate their job and you for making them work there.  Hence the 3 stars.  I'll go back - but I hope those people all have better days and cheer up a bit.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text:
Used the online ordering twice now, the second time being today. Very easy process, but 2 very different experiences.

First time: arrived a few minutes before my order was supposed to be ready, so no issues waiting then. Order was ready at exactly the time that I had requested it for.

Second time: get held up at work so arrive 10 minutes after my order was to be finished. Proceeded to pay and then wait another 10 minutes for them to figure out my order had somehow been lost and then rush to remake it. Meanwhile people come in to the store, order their food, receive it and pay before I get my meal. 

Honestly disappointed that the excellent service my first go-around had to be followed by a very lackluster experience today.

That being said, the sandwiches I got were fantastic, as was the soup I had today.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text: Potbelly used to be my favorite lunch spot when they first opened this location in 2007 - and for good reason: decent sandwiches (toasted on the spot) and friendly service at a reasonable price point. Since then, they've added soups and salads, which are pretty average but they get the job done. The line can get a little long during peak lunch time, in which case beware of slower service.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text: This is one of my go-to sandwich place if I happen not to bring lunch at work. I always get their Grilled Chicken and Cheddar with wheat bread. I love the way they cook the chicken...so juicy and less dry. They also give good amount of toppings and vegetables, which makes me feel healthy even when I eat out. The price fair and it s similar to Jimmy John or Subway's sandwiches.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text:
Wow, I'm surprised at the mixed reviews. I was kind of sad because I thought that this Potbelly had closed but realized it's the other one on Walnut Street, and this one is still here. 

About the service: Never had I had any trouble with service. Actually... I feel that service was superb each time I came with the BF.

The BF and I would come to this Potbelly on occasion for lunch. One day the BF wasn't feeling so good so I got him lunch here (and he was at home). One of the staff recognized me and asked me where my BF was (lol). We had a nice conversation and I told him the BF was sick. Another day, we came back together and coincidentally, the same staff member was in and he started joking around with us about the day I got food for my BF when he was sick. I've never had any trouble with the other staff members either.

On to the food: My fave is the A Wreck. So so good! The BF likes the Meatball sub that has marinara sauce and provolone cheese. He also likes adding mushrooms for an additional cost.

We also like to have some potato salad as a side.
The sandwiches are so good and I like how they are just so warm and yummy!!

By the way, the place could get really packed around lunch time because of the people who work nearby.

Anyways, enjoy!!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text: We don't have these in Boston, but I know Potbelly from trips to Chicago. It's good for a quick inexpensive lunch when you're on the go. Here, they even have a few tables outside so you can people watch and catch some rays while you eat. I usually get the meatball, it's warm and melty and yummy in my tummy.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text: Best milkshake I've ever had. Literally amazing and would recommend to anyone, they are simply the best!!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text: I think Potbelly is a great place to get a sub.  The subs are fresh and priced about the same as either Subway or Quiznos, but I think they are far better than either of those two competitors.  I highly recommend the ham and swiss which is delicious toasted.  A lot of people just get the subs here, but you should also try the milkshakes and some of their cookies.  Both are almost equally as good as the subs.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text:
From the time that I worked around the corner from a Potbelly in 2004, I have adored their tasty sandwiches with a particular weakness for the Italian on wheat.  A few years have passed and since that time, they have added variety in offerings (salads) and sizes (skinny, original, or large for sandwiches), as well as a calorie count.  Well, after seeing the comparative calories on the chalkboard, I skipped the Italian and opted for the Turkey Sandwich and was pleased with my slightly healthier, toasted delight.  Potbelly continues to offer a solid sandwich option in my book.

Tip: you can ask for light mayo (even though it's not listed) and you should not miss the hot peppers which add a delicious kick of spice and vinegar.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop

text: So good! Came to philly for work and had to try this place out. Staff is friendly, food is off the charts!! I've been twice already. The ingredients taste fresh and to die for! I also got the soup, which was perfect for the cold rainy weather. The broccoli cheeses was rich in taste. The was a beautiful bite of cheddar cheese as well as a warm broccoli aroma. It was the perfect temperature and each spoon full was a burst of yummy again and again.

text:
3.5 stars
First, I didn't know this was a chain until I saw one in D.C. a little disappointed. I only came here for breakfast and it seems it's not a popular choice. There was plenty of room and it took ages to get my oatmeal with bananas and nuts. In fact, the bananas looked like they'd seen better days. I think I skipped some ingredients because of the delay.

I'd probably try this place for a lunch time sandwich and forgive the slow service on my first visit.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text:
Okay so I stopped in here strictly on impulse as I'm making a greater effort to try new places. I love that the place is dimly lit. I'm not a fan of bright lights especially when I'm dining. The 2 tiered layout is interesting. They even have a wheelchair lift inside. The staff was surprisingly friendly. Could they be taking a cue from Jimmy John's?

So I ordered a pizza sandwich (pepperoni and cheese) and it suffers the same fate as subway's BLT. If I don't get vegetables the sandwich is flimsy as hell. If I do get vegetables, I don't even taste the meat because they were so stingy with it. Potbelly has some kind of special pepper concoction they use, and it really has some bite too it. The peppers and onions were some of the best I've had, but uh... it's no substitute for meat.

Since it was my first time there they let me get a free cookie (it was good). Another plus is that there were free refills AND they had raspberry Nestea in the fountain. YES! If it weren't for that, those peppers would've burned the hell outta my mouth and I'd be giving 2 stars. They have milkshakes too, but I had business to take care of I didn't want business to take care of me 30 minutes later.

Overall, the term "potbelly" doesn't have anything to do with the meat on the sandwich... at least not the pizza sandwich. It's really named after a potbelly stove. I'm gonna try this place at least 1 more time and I'm gonna get a sandwich with meat on it and see if I can't give this place 4 stars. If not, then the search for new food continues.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text:
After the potbelly in my town closed a long time ago, I was excited to find out that there was one in center city just a short walk from my office. 

My experience was decent, the employees were all friendly, the resturant was clean and I had a pretty good sandwich, but it just wasn't what I remembered. For starters, adding mushroom to your sandwich is 60 cents extra. And I recall them selling pickles on the side which I didn't see on the menu. 

I would probably go back to Potbelly, make try their "pick two" option, but it won't be at the top of my list.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text:
Not an encouraging lunch spot for Philly vegetarians.  Well, if you're down with $6 PB&J sandwiches, then you're all set, but otherwise.... meh.  I'm shocked at the brevity of veggie options available here, especially since so many other local chains do a fair job of incorporating healthy and meat-free options into their menus.  I've done the PB salad thing a couple times, but they're honestly just not that good nor worth the price (Corner Bakery's salads, right across the street, are far superior).  

It's too bad, cause Potbelly is right downstairs from my office and I would happily buy an eggplant/tomato mozzarella/veggie anything from them, but no such options exist.  For what it's worth, I've actually noticed that a bunch of people in my office tend to go meat-free for lunch (it's just a lighter way to get through the day....).  Oh well.  I don't eat at these places much anyway, but when given the choice, I'd take a Cosi sandwich over Potbelly any day.

attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text: I've been meaning to try Potbelly's. Today was the day. I had lunch with my friend. We walk in and there is a line. The woman behind the counter is trying her best to keep the line moving. I order the Farmhouse salad with the Potbelly vinegarette. At some point the line is supposed to shift into sandwiches and salads. As it shifts I lose my place. So some kind of order would be nice on busy days. Taking names, roping off 2  different sections. Onto the food. The salad was good. I love Blue cheese so it was a good touch. I would have loved to have croutons but because the woman in front of me ordered hers with out I think I got mine without also. Not a big problem but if there was more structure to the line it may not have happened. I will go back hopefully not on a busy day and have a sandwich.

categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text:
I had not gone back to pot belly as I did not like it - but we had a corporate luncheon catered from there today and a few things seem to have improved:

1.  The chopped salad with cranberries and walnuts was not too bad (I'd get it without onions in future).

2.  The meatball sandwiches arrived hot and the sandwich boxes (Box 'o sammies) were cute and well organized with a variety of sandwiches.  If I ever go to potbelly again I'm getting the meatball sub.

3.  The dark chocolate chip cookies seemed to be freshly-baked - albeit a bit greasy (butter or margaine?) - they were DELISH.

Much improved.

text:
Wooo Hoo!! Potbelly's!! It just can't get better than this place!!!

Excellent subs, it doesn't matter which one you get, they're all tremendous! They're very very reasonably priced and the shakes are seriously to die for. I usually get either the Wreck or the Italian Sub with everything. I get the macaroni salad and an oreo or vanilla shake and my week is totally made! 

Seriously, if you want incredible lunchtime food at a great price, you really gotta get it HOT!

attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text:
It's not as good as I'd hoped nor as bad as I'd feared.
Potbelly is a fast-food sandwichs chain with decent prices and an EXTREMELY limited menu.

I had a Chicken Salad salad that was passable.  I had them add artichoke hearts and remove the dried cranberries.
Though I am not thrilled I prefer it to Quizno's and Subway.

Line moved quickly and servers were well trained and fairly friendly.  (But THAT's because they are new.) I am certain that quality will diminish over time, as most fast food places (and manicure joints) do.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text:
The idea of writing a review about a place for the primary purpose of saying that you don't have much to say about that place is damn near the textbook definition of Waste of Time, but I'm already in too deep.

Basically, I go to Potbelly because of the following reasons, in greatly increasing order of importance: 1) the sandwiches/ingredients are decent tasting and filling without being gross 2) the food is inexpensive and 3) this place is two blocks from my work. I'm of the opinion that Center City is slim pickings as far as good food is concerned, so most of the time, it's either this, walking ten blocks in the freezing cold to Reading Terminal, or packing my own lunch like a sixth grader every day. If invention is the daugher of necessity, Potbelly's is the red-headed step-child that lives in the closet.

text:
This review pertains to the catering: boxes of hoagies, including a delicious hummus, artichoke, cucumber vegetarian option.  The bread overpowers, but I still enjoyed it.  Timely delivery.

Most importantly, the oatmeal chocolate chip cookies are so gooey and delicious I couldn't stop at one.  

Now I know why it's called Potbelly.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text:
Back when I was in Chicago for college, my friends and I would often stop by Potbelly Sandwich Works for a quick bite to eat. Offering delicious sandwiches, Potbelly's 'Wreck' would always hit the spot. So when I moved to Philly, I was thrilled to see several outposts. While the one near Midtown Village closed last year, there's another right in between work and home. So it was the perfect spot for a midweek lunch with the GF.

One thing that's different between the college days back in the previous decade and now - Potbelly's now 'super-sizes!' Offering Bigs, these mammoth versions of the original are truly 30% bigger. You can also opt for double the meat. But being that I needed to return to work, I opted to get just a 'Big' without double the meat. 

The Wreck ($6.60)
Salami, roast beef, turkey, ham, swiss cheese

Just as I remember it. The bread is perfectly toasted and crusty. The Italian meats are savory and salty, complemented by the subtle hints of cheese from the Swiss. The mayo, lettuce, tomatoes, and sweet peppers are perfect complements for this melange of flavors. 

Grilled Chicken ($6.20) 

The GF had a sandwich filled with moist chunks of grilled chicken. The mayo wasn't over the top in this sandwich, so the other flavors of the sandwich weren't drowned out.

Potbelly Sandwich Works isn't fine dining to be sure. But they offer a great sandwich for an affordable price. And the Center City location has plenty of seats and a bunch of options for every palate. Be sure to check it out!

text:
Got lunch from here for the first time in a while.

Tell me why I asked for "no cheese" in my salad about 5 times and there is cheese in my salad. The lettuce is old and is more pink than green. For $8 there are plenty of better places to go for lunch. Not coming back.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop

categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text:
Assembly line sandwich making at it's not so finest. follow the line of breads, meats + cheese, condiments, and soup. Pay towards the end and maybe you'll get a cookie if your feeling extra adventurous. Potbelly is a more fanciful version of Subway, but only really in the meat and bread. Grant it the soup is there, but it's some of the worst I've had! If you ask me I'd rather sink my teeth into a $5 foot long.

And now that jingles stuck in your head. Huzzah!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}"}
categories: Food, Soup, Salad, Fast Food, Desserts, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Delis
text:
Move on to something else.  
This place really looked promising when I came in.  Looks like an old-style eatery in the decor.  When I got up to the counter,  i could barely hear the person because there is so much mechanical noise.  There was one woman working the counter and when a guy opened the door from the back looked at the one woman trying to help six customers, he just shut the door ignored us and went back to believing that customers aren't important.

I ordered the chicken salad. When it is done right, it is fantastic.  Too much to hope for at this place. The chicken salad was disappointingly uninspired and almost flavorless.  I added salt and pepper and choked it down.

The place wasn't clean, tables wrecked, the floor dirty, even the trays up at the register were filthy and at 3 in the afternoon, there isn't an excuse other than they just don't give a F.

address: 4100 George J Bean Pkwy, Tampa Intl. Airport, Tampa Intl Airport
attributes: {'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'WiFi': "'no'", 'HasTV': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'DriveThru': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '2', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': True, 'street': False, 'validated': None, 'lot': None, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True'}
categories: Soup, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Fast Food, Breakfast & Brunch, Salad
text:
A good sandwich

We arrived at our gate just early enough that we had enough time to grab a sandwich.  I looked around  and spotted Potbelly, a restaurant chain I hadn't seen since my days in Philly so many years ago.  After a quick look at their menu I chose A Wreck, their signature sandwich.  It had a four different types of meat and read similar to a Italian.  There was no line so I had my toasted sandwich in just a few minutes.  I also received particularly good service, topped by a wonderful smile by my cashier.

They have no seating so I took my food back to our gate to enjoy.  It was not a very large sandwich and as you can see by the photo didn't look like much, but it was tasty.  My only gripe would be the cost, pretty high for such a small sandwich.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
address: 4100 George J Bean Pkwy, Tampa Intl. Airport, Tampa Intl Airport
attributes: {'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'WiFi': "'no'", 'HasTV': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'DriveThru': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '2', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': True, 'street': False, 'validated': None, 'lot': None, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True'}
categories: Soup, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Fast Food, Breakfast & Brunch, Salad
text:
I got Potbelly for dinner while waiting for my flight and it was A-OK. The service was really fast since there wasn't anyone else in line and the people working there were really efficient and friendly. I ordered the grilled chicken and cheddar sandwich and while it wasn't anything amazing, it was a decent dinner. The sandwich was nice and warm and I was able to customize it with different toppings like hot peppers, lettuce and tomato.

Of course my biggest complaint is the cost. It was close to $9 for a sandwich by itself. But all airport vendors are notorious for having above average pricing since there is less competition and you can't reasonably leave the airport to go anywhere else.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
address: 4100 George J Bean Pkwy, Tampa Intl. Airport, Tampa Intl Airport
attributes: {'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'WiFi': "'no'", 'HasTV': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'DriveThru': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '2', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': True, 'street': False, 'validated': None, 'lot': None, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True'}
categories: Soup, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Fast Food, Breakfast & Brunch, Salad
text: I am writing this review only based on my recent experience. I have been here twice since it opened at the airport. The sandwiches are decent. This last visit I ordered a sandwich before I got on my flight back to LA so it would be my lunch while flying over Texas. Anyway, they are kind of slow here and they seem to be still learning the process. One of the guys was getting mad at one of the girls and this older woman kind of told them to calm down so my first thought is that this is a family owned shop and that was the mom telling the brother and sister to stop bickering. Eh, no big deal. But they were getting backed up and the girl behind the register had to help wrap sandwiches and bag them. Eeks! She handled the money from the previous customer and maybe without thinking, she grabbed a sandwich that was waiting to get wrapped and did it herself to help out. Oh man, touched money then a sandwich? She most likely didn't realize because they were so busy but that is something you have to be cognizant of. Especially since customers are staring at you across the glass and watching the sandwich being finished. Not sure if I will go here again but its a good option at the airport and maybe it just so happened that I saw a one time occurrence and it will never happen again. I have to wait for a while though.

text: Stopped to get a sandwich before flight back to Atlanta. I got the Mediterranean sandwich on wheat bread. It had hummus, red peppers, and artichokes. The sandwich was okay. The service was great. The staff was attentive and nice. My meal was about $14 with bottle water and chips. Might stop here again due to lack of choices in Tampa terminal on Delta (Blue) side.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
address: 4100 George J Bean Pkwy, Tampa Intl. Airport, Tampa Intl Airport
attributes: {'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'WiFi': "'no'", 'HasTV': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'DriveThru': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '2', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': True, 'street': False, 'validated': None, 'lot': None, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True'}
categories: Soup, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Fast Food, Breakfast & Brunch, Salad
text:
Really liked the clearly marked calorie count on the items. Staff was very efficient if not overly friendly. Plenty of chips and snacks for sides/desserts. Offered shakes of which I didn't take advantage.

The format wasn't great and confused some people. Order the sandwich and they put it through, go to the far end and the team member is ready to check you out, then your sandwich comes through the grill and the team member in the middle wants to know how you wanted it topped. Some people were basically out the other end of the restaurant when they were being asked what they wanted on their sandwich. Meanwhile, I figured out to kind of hover in the middle but then ended up all but swimming like a salmon at the end of the process. 

Bottom line, typical sandwich shop options but the taste was very good. Would stop here again in Tampa or possibly their other locations.

text: Yuk!  Got food to take on my flight out of Tampa Airport and it was horrible. I never thought that I couldn't finish a cup of vegetable soup, but it happened today! It had an overwhelming taste of some herb or seasoning.  I then tasted my daughter's Turkey Club.  Again, awful.   She didn't even finish half of her sub.  Sorry, won't be visiting another of these locations.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
address: 4100 George J Bean Pkwy, Tampa Intl. Airport, Tampa Intl Airport
attributes: {'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'WiFi': "'no'", 'HasTV': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'DriveThru': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '2', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': True, 'street': False, 'validated': None, 'lot': None, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True'}
categories: Soup, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Fast Food, Breakfast & Brunch, Salad
text:
For what it is I like it. I appreciate the toasting of the sandwich. I like the tuna salad more than subways, but less than Publix. They have way less topping options than  most sandwich places but Since this is the only one I have been to I don't know if that is because the airport location or the chain in general. 

I put Dijon mustard, lettuce (ask for more), tomatoes, and Italian seasoning on my tuna. Only half of the smash which gets toppings so I are the side without them first and saved the topping side  for last. I like that they cut the sandwich in half so it is easier to eat. 

My hubby definitely ordered better than I did as the salad looks really good and it has lots of meat on it for him to enjoy. 

Now I know to get the half an half next time.

text: My wife & I each ordered the smoked ham sandwich ($8.00 each) & we each grabbed an 8 oz. bottle of milk.  The bill came to $26.69.  Prices for any bottled drink are not posted, & now we know why: each 8 oz. bottle was $5.00!!! Not posting this high price for drinks is clearly artful gouging.  We travel frequently & this is the most egregious food chicanery we've encountered.   Caveat emptor!

text: I had breakfast here while waiting to catch my next flight. My order included a cheddar, bacon and egg sandwich on a wheatIt got the job done. Nothing particularly special and maybe even a little lackluster. They did however have options to add veggies such as mushrooms or spinach to your breakfast sandwich which earned them another star. The bottom line --- ok for a quick bite but definitely not my first choice.

text:
An okay place to get breakfast before an early flight. There aren't a lot of options in Terminal E if you want to get food to go.

Service was rather poor. I ordered, then the person who took my order let me pay him in advance, then everyone there forgot my order and then forgot that I already paid. When I got  my food, it was on white bread rather than wheat, and there were no hot peppers. Sigh. Coffee was potable.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
address: 4100 George J Bean Pkwy, Tampa Intl. Airport, Tampa Intl Airport
attributes: {'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'WiFi': "'no'", 'HasTV': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'DriveThru': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '2', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': True, 'street': False, 'validated': None, 'lot': None, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True'}
categories: Soup, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Fast Food, Breakfast & Brunch, Salad
text:
For a fast food sandwich joint - it hits the spot and pocketbook friendly with one of the few places open for dinner inside the airport. I strongly encourage eating at Jimmy John's or Jersey Mike's prior if you can - their meat is a higher quality & I think you get more of it or else it felt like a smaller sandwich in comparison for a 9" from Potbellys.

I would ask for less sauces next time - it was leaking & they pressed it so it was warm. It beats the McDonald's line that was insanely long & is much better and healthier in comparison.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
address: 4100 George J Bean Pkwy, Tampa Intl. Airport, Tampa Intl Airport
attributes: {'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'WiFi': "'no'", 'HasTV': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'DriveThru': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '2', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': True, 'street': False, 'validated': None, 'lot': None, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True'}
categories: Soup, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Fast Food, Breakfast & Brunch, Salad
text:
I stopped here to grab some breakfast before my flight because I did not have much time and this was the only place without a line.

They offer a bunch of grab and go items and a nice range of drinks. They offer a wide variety of different sandwiches, and breakfast sandwiches(until 11.00am) They also have shakes, smoothies, salads, soups, and desserts. I opted for the egg and cheddar sandwich on multigrain bread.  I really enjoyed my breakfast sandwich, it was very flavorful and felt healthy and not greasy. 

I would definitely recommend eating here for breakfast. I'm not sure how the other sandwiches would be, but if they are anything like the breakfast sandwiches then it will be great!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
address: 4100 George J Bean Pkwy, Tampa Intl. Airport, Tampa Intl Airport
attributes: {'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'WiFi': "'no'", 'HasTV': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'DriveThru': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '2', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': True, 'street': False, 'validated': None, 'lot': None, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True'}
categories: Soup, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Fast Food, Breakfast & Brunch, Salad
text:
I ordered the Grilled Chicken and Cheddar sandwich on flats and it was an amazing sandwich.

Service was not. I'm at the airport, a woman asks me what I want to order and directs me to the cashier. I cash out, and wait for two going ladies to ask me what I want on my sandwich.

Guy behind me gets called over, whatever, his may come out first. They flirt with him, ok I want my sandwich. They acknowledge another lady that came after me and then when she gets her order they ignore me. Wtf?

I approach them and ask if there's any reason why I was skipped. They asked me what I ordered - I pointed to the wrap that was sitting by itself away from the sandwiches. They get quiet, one says I'm sorry and the other one gives me a death glare. I death glare her back and she says, against her will," all the way?" I go "yes thank you" and she then looks up at me like she's going to hit me. So I stare at her back in the same manner and she hands me my sandwich as she looks away from me.

YOURE TRYING TO FIGHT WITH ME OVER A SANDWICH? So gangster.

text:
The food was good, but the service was very slow. The person at the register was in no hurry to get people on their way, as we waited 10 minutes after our food was ready to pay. I guess with the worker shortage, this is the new normal.  

Again, the food was fresh and tasty, but 30 minutes from start to paying is a little too much for fast food.

Eat before you get to the airport.

text: Arrived here at 7am and unlike some places that only serve breakfast items, Potbelly's lets you select any item on their menu. Super excited about this! text: I don't usually fly out of this airside so was please to find Potbelly's open early.  Was able to order breakfast to go and was in and out in 5 minutes. Staff very pleasant. Quality of food as good as their reputation. Fell in love with you at Midway airport happy to know you are right here at home.

categories: Soup, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Fast Food, Breakfast & Brunch, Salad
text:
| Potbelly's Poor Portions |

Airports, like sports stadiums and arenas, gouge prices on all items to cover high operation costs and because we have no other choice. Travelers have accepted this if they choose to eat or shop in an airport...however, if you're going to over charge at least make it worth it.
The original sandwich I wanted was the Turducken but they were out. So I ordered a Chicken and Cheddar Flat which is the second level of sandwich length. Unfortunately for the 9 bucks I paid, I got an ill assembled sandwich that was barely bigger than a Subway 6". It didn't have much meat, lacked toppings, and tasted bland. I guess not having much choice also gives the airport restaurants the ability to put in little to no effort. I use the airline in this terminal frequently but I won't be returning here for food.

attributes: {'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'WiFi': "'no'", 'HasTV': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'DriveThru': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '2', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': True, 'street': False, 'validated': None, 'lot': None, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True'}
categories: Soup, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Fast Food, Breakfast & Brunch, Salad
text:
Had an early morning flight and needed a bite to eat. Sat at my gate looking at potbelly's menu online to see if they actually had anything that sounded good to me before I actually went over. 
Found a Mediterranean breakfast sandwich on their menu online that sounded delicious, but the gal working informed me that they only have about 4 different breakfast sandwiches, which are mostly plain Jane, egg, cheese and bacon/or sausage. So I settled for the egg, cheese and sausage sandwich. I was craving a milkshake so I also ordered an oreo shake. 
The girl ringing me up tried to charge me for a cookie even though I clearly didn't have one, and there were no cookies on my straw for my shake?! I thought that was a potbelly signature staple? Guess not. Overall the breakfast sandwich was decent, the shake on the other hand was water consistency as soon as I sat down to drink it (and no the weather did not play a factor in this).

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'False', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "'no'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': True, u'street': False, u'lot': True, u'validated': False}", 'HasTV': 'False'}
categories: American (Traditional), Food, Soup, Delis, Fast Food, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Salad
text: Potbelly is a great place to eat unfortunately this franchise is severely lacking in customer service from owner down.  I walked in to use the restroom and was informed I need to purchase an item to use the restroom.  After I get done, I try to purchase a bag of chips and 4 cookies.  I then get a lecture from the owner about how it cost them a thousand dollars a month from people walking in and using the restroom without purchasing anything and get a tutorial  on how to run a small business from the owner.  After I inform her I run a small business and have worked at my family's small business that has been open since 1949, she asks if I can pay her a thousand dollars for using their restroom.  I handed her a 20 dollar bill for the use of the restroom to call it even.  The bathroom was clean however so I give it two instead of one.

text:
Roast beef sandwich. One of the best I've had. 
Food tasted very good but some staff were unfriendly. My friends noticed it too. We were there during the lunch hour when there was a long line. I do understand that it could get crazy during those busy hours but customers don't like to be in long line either. Friendliness of the workers can make a customer's experience into a positive one.

text: I had this place for the first time in Houston and was so excited to see it hit the 'Ville... I had the Italian and broccoli cheddar soup and my guy had the pizza sub... It was just as tasty as I had remembered and those hot peppers are an awesome addition to any sandwich.... I think I will def be a regular here... Quality meats veggies and bread and toasted....I'll take it along with good customer service. The guys that were working were so personable like they were your buddies from around the way and their suggestions were winners with my guy and he's hard to please.

text: This was my first experience at a Potbelly and heard rave reviews.  Unfortunately, I wasn't able to try it because upon going to pick up my mobile order, I was greeted by an unkind cashier, Rhonda.  She couldn't find my order and didn't help me in trying to find it.  Instead, ignored me and didn't offer any help.   I felt very uncomfortable and went next door to Milk and Honey (which was life-changing).

text: These sandwiches are so tasty and the cookies are yummmy. I normally get the Italian sub and I am always satisfied and full. You can't go wrong with a good sub, and Potbelly definitely delivers great subs. I was happy to see Potbelly come to Nashville, I used to eat here in Michigan. Great alternative to Subway. It's quite a drive from where I live just for a sub , but Potbelly is worth the drive.

Fantastic, courteous service, line was out the door and we got our food in a couple minutes.  Highly recommend. FWIW, really close to Station Inn in The Gulch.

text:
Update: Still waiting....


I am watching for this place to open in Nashville.... I can't wait to be able to get the Wreck (no roast beef) in my hometown! The PB&J is also not to be missed. We ordered it the first time just for our son, and my husband took one bite just to demonstrate how to eat (our son was 3, it made sense at the time), and I think my husband might have cursed in surprise. The whole menu is amazing. This will be a terrific addition to the Gulch!!

text: Food was very fresh, excellent quality. I visited at lunch during the heat of the rush and the staff was still incredibly friendly. Awesome food and people--I will definitely be back.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'False', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "'no'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': True, u'street': False, u'lot': True, u'validated': False}", 'HasTV': 'False'}
categories: American (Traditional), Food, Soup, Delis, Fast Food, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Salad
text: SO good. We went here before a Preds hockey game. I had the grilled chicken and cheddar sandwich (add bacon to it--you won't regret it). My husband had the pizza sandwich. I'm so glad we broke out of our normal "turkey and ham" routine sandwiches--these were delicious! We also split a chocolate brownie cookie which was incredible--it tasted just like a brownie, but in cookie form. Melts in your mouth. I may have dreams about that cookie. :) They weren't too busy, but then again, we were there at 5 p.m. on a Saturday night--sandwich shops aren't exactly happening places on Saturday nights. ;) I'm sure they are packed though during the weekly lunch rush. All in all, with two sandwiches, two fountain drinks, two bags of chips and a cookie, we spent about $22, so roughly the same price as a meal at Firehouse Subs or McAlister's Deli. Go visit this place--you won't regret it!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'False', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "'no'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': True, u'street': False, u'lot': True, u'validated': False}", 'HasTV': 'False'}

text: I work down the street and potbelly is my go to ! The chicken and cheddar sandwich is so good . It's a thick sliced chicken that is always fresh and juicy . The staff are really cool especially Chris  and if you go enough they already know what you order . Sometimes if I'm running behind I call ahead and it's always ready when I get there . Best sub shop on Nashville !

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'False', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "'no'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': True, u'street': False, u'lot': True, u'validated': False}", 'HasTV': 'False'}
categories: American (Traditional), Food, Soup, Delis, Fast Food, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Salad
text: I've been to multiple Potbelly locations, so I was pumped to discover there is one in Nashville! The chicken salad sandwich is my absolute favorite. They were kind enough to go off-menu to make a simple grilled cheese for my 3yo, so everyone was happy. Kelly was especially nice, coming over to make sure the food was as good as we remembered & to say hi to the kiddo. Very happy to find this location, hope they expand around town soon!

text: Great service. Great food. Great staff. I love the Italian sandwich with hot peppers. Great location and there is a parking lot across the street. Be careful parking there at night though, two friends got tickets. This is the best Potbelly's franchise I have visited. Plus they have the hard to find Zapp's Voodoo chips.

text: Its unfortunate that an establishment with Chicago roots would tell its customers that we need to stop coming to Nashville because we're making everything expensive for her. I wish the mood would be as good as the sandwiches.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'False', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "'no'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': True, u'street': False, u'lot': True, u'validated': False}", 'HasTV': 'False'}
categories: American (Traditional), Food, Soup, Delis, Fast Food, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Salad
text:
Order prior to getting here and shorten your wait.   

I would stick with the sandwiches and not to the salad.  I didn't really like the salad that much, but since it's a sandwich store, I am rating it for that.   

Chicken Salad Sandwich $5.25 is made with the chicken salad with just the right amount of celery, mayo and pepper.  It has melted provolone cheese, fresh lettuce and tomato on multigrain

Chicken Salad $6.85 was too mayonnaise for me, and wasn't that special to me.  The sandwich tasted a lot better.     

All in all a good place to get some quick food.   

Location: close to the nashville wings and next door to a juice place

text: The chili was really good, but the farm salad was just ok...nothing really special about it. What almost puts this place at a 4 is the service. They are very friendly here and quick. I'll most certainly try them again, but its not a place I would make my "go to" just yet. I'll have to try a few more things on the menu...obviously I still need to try the sandwiches, seeing as its a "sandwich" shop.

text: I ate my sandwich too quickly before I even got to snap a picture. Darn. I had the Pizza Sandwich. Amazeballs. Followed by a Chocolate Peanut Butter Malt aqnd an Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookie (baked fresh daily). Give me a break people, I'm pregnant! ;) The menu is simple, not overwhelming, with plenty of options to personalize but not confuse you. Lots of soda options, plus delicious dessert to follow your delicious sandwich. Try out the yummy soups as well! Quality ingredients and super nice employees! Always a pleasure dining at PotBellys!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'False', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "'no'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': True, u'street': False, u'lot': True, u'validated': False}", 'HasTV': 'False'}
categories: American (Traditional), Food, Soup, Delis, Fast Food, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Salad
text:
I am literally OBSESSED with their hot peppers, in turn I'm OBSESSED with Potbelly. I literally check every time we travel to try to make Potbelly theee stop when grub is needed.

I was a little bummed, b/c this was my first Tennessee Potbelly experience and I feel like the main manager wasn't very friendly and her main focus was micro-managing the staff in front of the customers.
It was really hard to watch, and I was really looking forward to this experience.

INFO
- Location, what a fun spot. It's close to the nashville wings mural. 
- Parking, the first hour is free at all the close parking lots, perfect!
- My sandwich was SOOOO good (recommendation: Italian on white, with lettuce, tomato, pickle, onion, HOT PEPPERS, and the seasoning)
- Chips - we usually get the jalapeno chips, and I got the specialty "Potbelly hot peppers" flavor chips (I prefer the jalapeno ones!)
- Milkshakes - they come with a cute yummy little cookie on top of the lid with the straw through it. They are so good!!
- Drinks - always sweet tea when it's an option... yum!
- Soup - One of the people in my party got the loaded baked potato soup and another person got the broccoli cheddar.  Both of them seemed to like it.
- They close at 8pm, and there isn't really a non-busy spot to then go and talk if you want after eating here, definitely has no baring on this 3 star yelp rating

PROS
- Store was clean and bright
- They sell their hot peppers!
- Sandwich was yummy
- The sandwich isn't super big, but it is filling, especially when you have chips with it, I was super hungry when I came.
- Quality food/ingredients
- They did come to my table and ask if I wanted more sweet tea before they dumped it for the night/closed

CONS
- As I mentioned above, the manager situation was pretty lame and really took away from the good experience I was hoping for

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'False', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "'no'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': True, u'street': False, u'lot': True, u'validated': False}", 'HasTV': 'False'}

text:
We also went here because milk & honey & biscuit lover were obscenely busy. I guess you need reservations everywhere in Nashville. 
This is an over the counter sandwich, salad, soup, etc. 
It's decent sized inside and the food is good and cheap. 

I ordered the Mediterranean salad and it has a ton of stuff. I wish they had just an olive oil/vinegar dressing but their house is ok. 

The staff was friendly, you watch as they make your food & pick your sandwich toppings. 

They have a few sodas on tap & various bottled beverages. 

Parking can be found in decks.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop

text: Food is amazing!!!! I walk here to get a sub sometimes. The people making the food are super polite. However, the cashier lady that is always there isn't very welcoming and seems to always be sorta rude to me when I go. It's just that same lady that makes me not want to go there sometimes. She seems like she's always annoyed of the customers. The great food crew and wonderful food keep me coming back. The shakes rock!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'False', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "'no'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': True, u'street': False, u'lot': True, u'validated': False}", 'HasTV': 'False'}

text:
It's open and it was totally what I wanted. I had my sandwich (wreck, no roast beef), Zapps chips and a Diet Coke. A perfect lunch. 

The shop itself is identical to the experience in other cities. Same menu, same ingredients, same process. 

Nashville suggestion: I think the hot chicken fans will appreciate the hot giardiniera. 

The owner is around and he's super social and nice. We chatted and I thanked him for bringing my favorite sandwich shop to town.

Go and keep my sandwich fix in town!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'False', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "'no'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': True, u'street': False, u'lot': True, u'validated': False}", 'HasTV': 'False'}
