text: Excellent Customer Service!!! I'm currently recovering from a recent surgery and wanted some Potbelly since I haven't had any since my days in Chicago. I walked into the restaurant with my crutches to enter the line to order my food and immediately a staff person came to me and asked to take my order. They allowed me to be seated, took my food order, took my money and brought my food out to me in a bag that was easy for me to carry with me crutches. The customer service provided was more than I could have expected and service like this will ensure my return. Thank you!!!!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'False', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "'no'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': True, u'street': False, u'lot': True, u'validated': False}", 'HasTV': 'False'}

text:
Such nice people, and such tasty sandwiches.

I was there for their soft Grand Opening day, and things were hopping!
I like that the sandwiches are both hot and cold, sometimes you're just in the mood for a warm ham and cheese, you know?

Great chip selection, I love that sour cream and cheddar chips now come in baked.  It's a small thing, I know, but I love it.

I even sampled the cookies, of course, and both the chocolate brownie cookie and the oatmeal chocolate chip were on point.

And best of all, a sandwich is only $5.50.  Tasty, and cheap!  Go give 'em a try.

text: Sandwich was delicious, the service was even better! Kelly understands what it means to know your customer and make them feel comfortable. Only in town for a few days, but will definitely stop back in when I'm back in Nashville!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'False', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "'no'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': True, u'street': False, u'lot': True, u'validated': False}", 'HasTV': 'False'}
categories: American (Traditional), Food, Soup, Delis, Fast Food, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Salad
text: You can't go wrong with Potbelly. Spending a considerable amount of time in Chicago (where Potbelly is headquartered and found on nearly every street corner), I was overjoyed to hear that a Potbelly had opened in my new home of Nashville. I'm happy to report that this location is just as great as its northern counterparts. The sandwiches are top notch and the employees are extremely friendly and fast -- a great combo. What makes my love for Potbelly so far is not its sandwiches or service. No, it's the fresh baked, soft and chewy chocolate chip oatmeal cookies. I've been to Potbelly several times just to pick up one of these cookies. If you're a cookie enthusiast like me, you must try one (or two). I've heard the milkshakes and other desserts are also great, but I haven't been able to part ways with the cookie. Keep up the great work, Potbelly! I'm glad you're here.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'False', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "'no'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': True, u'street': False, u'lot': True, u'validated': False}", 'HasTV': 'False'}

text: We went here all the way from Murfreesboro, we were not disappointed. The sandwiches are very reasonably priced as is everything else. I had the Italian and my daughter had the pizza sandwich. We really enjoyed them!! I also got a Dream Bar on the way out, Yum!!! The staff was very friendly and would describe what was in what, we will drive  the 30+ miles again!!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'False', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "'no'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': True, u'street': False, u'lot': True, u'validated': False}", 'HasTV': 'False'}
categories: American (Traditional), Food, Soup, Delis, Fast Food, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Salad
text: I grab lunch here at least once a week. The food is better than the average sandwich fast food chain by far, and the staff and management are always very kind and helpful. There can be a line sometimes, but even when it's to the door, I've never waited more than 7-8 minutes to get through and get food (and that's when I ordered a milkshake - which they make old school style in a blender). Quality fresh affordable food and great customer service. Thanks, Potbelly! I don't know what I'd do without you!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'False', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "'no'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': True, u'street': False, u'lot': True, u'validated': False}", 'HasTV': 'False'}
categories: American (Traditional), Food, Soup, Delis, Fast Food, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Salad
text: 5 stars...they made me a vegetarian off-the-cuff sandwich that wasn't even on the menu.  Twice.  On two sep visits.  With smiles.  POW!  Oh and it was GOOOOOOOOD!  The ice cream cookies weren't what i expected, but after the sandwich I got, i'm glad they weren't.  I also believe that because the gulch is apparently on an all avocado diet, you'll want to get to PB early to make sure you can get avos on your wich.  Enjoy!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'False', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "'no'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': True, u'street': False, u'lot': True, u'validated': False}", 'HasTV': 'False'}
categories: American (Traditional), Food, Soup, Delis, Fast Food, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Salad
text: There is nothing I can add that hasn't already been said other than Potbelly is on track to be one of the best sandwich shops in Nashville.  The only thing PB needs to do now is open more locations around the Metro area. Being from Chicago, I've been eating Potbelly sandwiches since only having a single location on Lincoln Ave., and aside from Portillo's, they were one of our most missed eating establishments.  The Gulch location definitely lives up to Chicagoland standards in terms of consistency, quality and service.  The staff is super friendly and their malts are still the best.  My sandwich: Double roast beef on white, all toppings except for lettuce and tomatoes, with extra Giardiniera (a staple condiment in Chicago consisting of marinated hot or mild peppers, oil and other vegetables).

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop

text: I really like this place. They have good sandwiches, soups and shakes but they just raised prices 10%. A sandwich and drink shouldn't be over $10.

text: Pizza sandwich was great but could have used more marinara.  Vegetable soup was very good.

text:
I tried the Mediterranean sub meal and i can say it was eh

This is my first visit here with friends and after they raved about the food here, i decided to try it out.

Pros: The veggies were fresh, the service was good and the price was reasonable

Cons: The sandwich was bland which required me to drench it in a dipping sauce (i tried the potbelly and the balsamic vinaigrette). This added more flavor.

All in all, i can not say i wad impressed.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'False', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "'no'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': True, u'street': False, u'lot': True, u'validated': False}", 'HasTV': 'False'}

text:
BEST SANDWICH SHOP IN NASHVILLE!!
I recently came across this place while walking around in the gulch. Since I found it, I've been 100% hooked! Great location, great sandwiches, great soups, great cookies, and they even have Zapp's chips! Staff and management are very friendly as well. This place truly is the only sandwich shop I can give 5/5 stars, all around amazing. If you haven't been here, you're definitely missing out!!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'False', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "'no'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': True, u'street': False, u'lot': True, u'validated': False}", 'HasTV': 'False'}
categories: American (Traditional), Food, Soup, Delis, Fast Food, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Salad
text: I had this place for the first time in Houston and was so excited to see it hit the 'Ville... I had the Italian and broccoli cheddar soup and my guy had the pizza sub... It was just as tasty as I had remembered and those hot peppers are an awesome addition to any sandwich.... I think I will def be a regular here... Quality meats veggies and bread and toasted....I'll take it along with good customer service. The guys that were working were so personable like they were your buddies from around the way and their suggestions were winners with my guy and he's hard to please.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'False', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "'no'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': True, u'street': False, u'lot': True, u'validated': False}", 'HasTV': 'False'}

text: Truly a great sandwich shop. The line moves quick. Decent choices of different sandwiches and the bread is also soft and delicious. I'm not much of a warm sandwich guy, but it was delightful and delicious the way they serve there's.  Prices are reasonable and you're in-and-out before you know it.  A must try if you're in the area.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'False', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "'no'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': True, u'street': False, u'lot': True, u'validated': False}", 'HasTV': 'False'}
categories: American (Traditional), Food, Soup, Delis, Fast Food, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Salad
text: Four of us came in at 6:45pm on December 23.  Bad, awful, disrespectful service. No lettuce, no tomatoes, no mayo, no meatballs, out of cheddar cheese, and no chicken salad.  Obviously, the  employees did not want to be and not sure why they were even open when they were out of so many items.

It's about time a Potbelly's came to Nashville. Tastes just as it does up north.

Great service, great sandwiches. My only complaint is that this place isn't located on West End.

text: Their coffee oreo shakes will change your life.  Some friends and I went in there and asked the staff to surprise us and they made us a "strawberry shortcake" shake which was fresh strawberries mixed with crushed butter cookies that was amazing.  From their oatmeal chocolate chip cookies to any sandwich with the hot peppers, you can't go wrong at this place.  The amazing and kind staff put this Potbelly's over the top.

text:
Nice sandwich!!! Ordered 4 different sandwiches and those are made to order and can be customized! Amount of meat in each sandwiches are very generous and you won't feel eating bare bread. 

Price were very reasonable for that area of restaurant. 

Only the disappointment was there were minor mixed up to the topping in some of our order.  
But overall all the sandwiches were very nice and will back again!!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'False', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "'no'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': True, u'street': False, u'lot': True, u'validated': False}", 'HasTV': 'False'}
categories: American (Traditional), Food, Soup, Delis, Fast Food, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Salad
text:
I first was introduced to Potbelly when I lived in Maryland and then in Seattle, so I was thrilled when Nashville brought one here (of course it's in The Gulch, but that's another story for another day).

Anyhow, the food was as good as I remembered it back in the day. The sandwich was nicely toasted with a nice choice of meats, cheese and toppings, and while it looks smaller than what you'd get at Subway, and certainly at Jersey Mike's, it is deceptively quite filling and for just under $8.50, gets the job done. 4 stars.

The Wreck Salad  of course fits under the same premise as the sandwich that has the same name, and it was good as well. I do wish the salad was slightly bigger in size, and I also wish there was more than only four options for dressing. I know Bleu cheese crumbles are in the salad, but it should be an option as a dressing. Additionally, the meats and cheese in the salad should be diced and or cut into smaller pieces to make it easier for eating. Croutons should be in the salad, or at least a packet should be on the side.  For an $8.50 salad, it was very good, but should be bigger and better. 3 stars.

A few other things of note. No Potbelly should close at 6PM, particularly in that part of Nashville and DEFINITELY on a Saturday. That's way to early given the bustling neighborhood it is located in. At a minimum 8-9PM is more appropriate. Secondly, their drink dispenser did NOT work, thus the only option was iced tea. That's inexcusable, and at a minimum, the bottled drinks should've been offered for the same price as their fountain drinks to make up for it. No one should spend $3 for a bottle of Coca-Cola or other similar bottled drink. As a matter of fact, I couldn't even get a refill of the iced tea because it had been emptied and the dispenser for the tea was removed because of the fact that they effectively closed as we were leaving, just before 6PM. That's when I realized they were closing, which was shockingly disappointing.

The ambiance was beautiful as always, very eclectic and a great place to dine in, so I do recommend going down there. One hour free parking, two if you're only dining there, and overall it was good to enjoy Potbelly's once again, even with the concerns I have about the establishment. Hopefully my next visit will be better.

text:
BEST SANDWICH SHOP IN NASHVILLE!!
I recently came across this place while walking around in the gulch. Since I found it, I've been 100% hooked! Great location, great sandwiches, great soups, great cookies, and they even have Zapp's chips! Staff and management are very friendly as well. This place truly is the only sandwich shop I can give 5/5 stars, all around amazing. If you haven't been here, you're definitely missing out. 

Since this review, I've gotten 2 more Togo orders and they've both been just as phenomenal!! Only suggestion is to make more oatmeal chocolate chip cookies!!! They're so delicious and they definitely run out of them quickly! But still not worth losing a star

attributes: {'BikeParking': 'False', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "'no'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': True, u'street': False, u'lot': True, u'validated': False}", 'HasTV': 'False'}
categories: American (Traditional), Food, Soup, Delis, Fast Food, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Salad
text:
We decided to stop by this sandwich shop for dinner one night. It wasn't busy on a weeknight, staff were friendly and patient, and quick service. We ordered the Pizza Sandwich and the Turkey breast. The sandwiches were toasted to perfection. Pizza Sandwich was cheesy and gooey. They gave plenty of Turkey breast and pepperoni on the sandwiches. They were both toasted and the bread were crispy. Overall the sandwiches were good and I would come back to try a different sandwich. 

Maybe it's the Potbelly stove or the ceiling....there's something about this sandwich shop that makes it very welcoming. Having a out door patio was a nice touch during the summer too.

text: Terrible customer service. I called to place an order at 6:50 pm, not knowing the restaurant now closes at 7 pm due to covid-19. The woman I spoke to took my order and hung up on me. I called again to confirm my order and she accepted it. I got to Potbelly right at 7 and they had completely closed up shop, lights off, doors locked, phones unanswered, despite the website saying that the last pickup time was 7:05 pm. Management should be ashamed of this.

text: For a Potbelly's, pretty damn good. Even with a large line on a busy work day lunch hour, this staff manages to be efficient and kind. They hooked it up on the sandwich and all the toppings were great. I got chili and I will say, they should cut up their onions because giving whole raw onion rings in chili is a bit weird. I ordered take out from here the next day and it was just as good delivered.

text:
The owner openly denied me service if I didn't show him "paperwork" for my service animal. He openly broke the law set forth and clearly outlined by the ADA. If you have a service animal do not give this establishment your business. 

Sir. For future reference and for your "wife" who you said was a lawyer: 

https://www.ada.gov/regs2010/service_animal_qa.html

Q7. What questions can a covered entity's employees ask to determine if a dog is a service animal?
A. In situations where it is not obvious that the dog is a service animal, staff may ask only two specific questions: (1) is the dog a service animal required because of a disability? and (2) what work or task has the dog been trained to perform? Staff are not allowed to request any documentation for the dog, require that the dog demonstrate its task, or inquire about the nature of the person's disability.

categories: American (Traditional), Food, Soup, Delis, Fast Food, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Salad
text:
This place is a well-oiled machine! And the sandwiches are really good.

We stopped in for a fast lunch and were quickly greeted cheerfully by several staff. When taking our order the person inquired about the specifics of how we wanted our sandwiches prepared. Everything was smooth and efficient. Our sandwiches were ready quickly, and they were very good. And everything was prepared exactly how we had ordered. The fast service was especially impressive because we had shown up during the lunch rush.

If I were only rating the sandwiches it might be a 4-star rating. But the service was so good, I had to bump them up to five stars. Will definitely return, especially when I need a quick lunch prepared in a hurry.

text: I have been in this location a few times and they always have had nice and fast service. Ingredients are fresh and bread has been freshly baked. They have salads too. The place is average in size and they also have outside sitting. Parking is tricky in the Gulch so it's not the most convenient, but if you don't mind paying parking then be my guest, pay for mine too while you are at it lol . Definitely better than the unmentionable SW!

text: Ordered through potbelly.com and accidentally put in the wrong pick up time. Called them 4 separate times to cancel my order and give my money back. Each time they said they would do so. They never did. For the past 3 weeks I've tried calling and even knocking on the door with no response. PLEASE just answer the phone or give me my money back!

text:
As sandwich shops go, Potbelly is one of the best out there. After a long absence, we were left satisfied and feeling happy.

Meats, veggies, and breads are always fresh and filling. Our go to are the chicken salad, and the grilled chicken. The turkey club is also checking out. The loaded baked potato soups is a must have indulgence and worth the calories. 

Although we didn't have the milk shake this time, they are a great summer treat.

Did I tell you guys this is my favorite Sandwich Shop?    :)

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'False', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'WiFi': "'no'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': True, u'street': False, u'lot': True, u'validated': False}", 'HasTV': 'False'}
categories: American (Traditional), Food, Soup, Delis, Fast Food, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Salad
text:
The negative reviews may be out of date. I have no idea if the management has changed recently but my experience today was phenomenal. Ordered A Wreck and some chips. One of the best fast food deli-style sandwiches I've had in Nashville. Hot crispy bread with a chewy inside, all melted perfectly. Next time I will get double meat but the standard version is quite acceptable. Other reviewers mention service and parking. Everyone was incredibly friendly and helpful. The gentleman at the register even noticed my name tag which I forgot to take off and asked about what I did. Also thanked me as I was leaving. There is a parking garage that literally shares two walls of the restaurant. Pull in, scan a thing with your phone and get an hour of free parking. Many of the immediate spots were open, making it about 100' covered walk to the restaurant without crossing a street. Didn't know Nashville had a Potbelly until today, had only been to the one in Chicago. Definitely adding this to the lunch rotation!
One thing though, if you want to sit at the bar by the window and people watch, it's like a wind tunnel. Be prepared to chase your napkins all over the place!

It didn't take long to get our food.

I appreciated all of the healthy selections that were available. I would highly recommend this to all without reservation

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text:
Decided to give Pot belly another chance. My husband is still a fan and they were doing a bogo offer. When you went they gave you a coupon to come back. He went to lunch and then we went the next day also for lunch and even sat out with our dog. We also ended up their the next day as well with another coupon when my choice ended up being closed on Sundays. 
The trick for not getting hot is to get it without bread. I had no issues either day. We both got the big Turkey Club and they put mine on a bed of shredded lettuce. I really didn't want a big salad and all the toppings. I just wanted the meat and cheese and a little lettuce. I even got a dressing. It's the perfect light low carb summer lunch. 
The staff was working hard. Saturday was pretty busy and Sunday less so since it was later in the day, but before dinner. They even recognized me when I came back. The entire ordering process was easy and my husband as the app and he gets points for scanning his app. 
We really like the patio. Both days we were headed to the other side of town afterwards and it was great not to have to go back for the dog. He is small and sat quietly under our table and enjoyed my bacon. 
I love they have recycling! I love to see a place not just dump all that plastic into the trash.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text:
The oatmeal chocolate chip cookie will change your life. Mostly because you will die if you eat too many, but nonetheless, it will be changed forever. They are so good!

My Potbelly trick is to get my sandwich "thin cut" - they remove about 1/3 of the bread! It helps me keep my figure for these summer months. You surprise me with a Wreck (lots of meats) on wheat, thin cut with all the topping - know that a wedding proposal is around the corner. Get the wreck, or be wrecked. BAM.

Standard Potbelly operation so if you know it, you like it! Patio outdoors is awesome for every season but winter, naturally.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}

text: First time I visited this shop. All of the staff was very friendly and helpful. I decided on the turkey BLT and a cup of chicken enchilada soup. Soup was very good. Turkey BLT had large chunks of meats, and a bit too much mayo to my liking. Easy fix for next time. While I was looking for a place to sit to enjoy my lunch, I saw a few dirty tables. It was cleaned up by the time I finished my meal. I noticed they also offer smoothies. I will revisit and try other menu items in the future.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop

text: I love potbelly sandwiches! I first tried them when I was on a layover at an airport and have been hooked since. I often would see them on our road trips from northern Indiana when we would travel from Lake Michigan and in Chicago. Every time it was a must that we stop to getI was excited to find out about the downtown location and it became our go to midday date spot. I'm a northsider so a location 10 minutes away was heaven sent! So excited to have you potbelly sandwiches!

text: Really glad they opened up another Potbelly's in central Indiana. Hands down, it's probably my favorite turkey sandwich. They have amazing shakes too!  Unfortunately last time, I ordered the strawberry and was sorely disappointed. There was barely any strawberry flavor. (see my picture for proof).  It definitely wasn't how they usually do it. I'm sure it was just a busy lunch day.

text: I eat Potbelly's at least once a week. Today I went in and ordered a large turkey on wheat. It wasn't good at all. The tomatoes had went bad. They were grainy and extremely soft, and it was entirely too many peppers on the sandwich. These two issues are gonna make me stop eating it for a while. Its payday Friday! I could have chosen any other restaurant downtown. I'm disappointed.

categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text:
I like Potbelly. I seem to always get the meatball, but tonight I ventured out to get the Gyro FLATS. I think I have a new favorite sandwich!  We also got the milkshake, Mac & Cheese and a cookie. The cookie was free because I used the new app to order / pay. And, I also earned another cookie by using the app for my next visit. 

The staff tonight were friendly and helpful. We ate outside and had a great experience. 

I always have been and still am a fan of Potbelly!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text:
We were heading down to the Indy zoo last weekend, and we had a tough choice to make:  Do we get off the highway and pop into Potbelly for a quick lunch, or do we grab something at the zoo that's massively over-priced?  Easy decision.

I'll skip the food-quality part of the review and just sum it up quickly:  My meatball sandwich was great - no complaints there. My only suggestion is to do something to address the process of placing your order and getting your food.  There seems to be a very convoluted process of putting in your initial sandwich order, shuffling to your left, and then informing the sandwich maker which item is yours when it comes out of the toasting oven.  Maybe it's just me, but it seems a little annoying, having to point to which item is yours.  She should already know which sandwich is mine. 

My only other suggestion:  Don't ask patrons if they want mayo after you've already slapped it onto the bun.  Yeah.

Otherwise - great sandwich.  Lots of flavor.

text: Their sandwiches are fantastic! I put in an app order, got their earlier than my time listed, and they were able to get my order down fast. The service was good and the employees were very friendly. Did I mention their sandwiches are .

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text:
We grew up in Chicago, and this was one of our go to shops.  This particular shop doesn't overfill the sandwiches with veggies, so the sandwich feels like it has too high of a bread to veggie ratio.  

We will try it again one more time asking them to load up the sand which with veggies and will see how that goes - if it's like it used to be in Chicago, we will definitely be upping the stars. ( I'm sure this will not really be an issue - I just wonder why it was skimpy on the veggies)

SERVICE: service was awesome, really nice guys - you can tell they respected each other and were extremely pleasant.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text: This place was pretty good!  Went here during opening week and there are still some service kinks left to work out.  I had the pastrami and it was absolutely delicious!  I was disappointed that it was about 6pm - dinner time - and they were completely out of brewed tea.  When asked about it the cashier stated they were out and didn't know if they'd be making more.  He then stated he didn't know how to make it.  I had already paid for the cost of a beverage but I can't and don't drink sugary drinks.  I usually prefer iced tea with sweetener.  Finally a manager came out and said she'd make some and that it would take 10 minutes to brew.  By the time we were done eating, the tea was ready.  So I went through my whole meal without a drink.  I was hoping they would have just offered me one of their bottled beverages as a sub since I had already paid.  Other than that, the food was delicious.  The location is great as well.

text: Potbelly's has some of the best sandwiches and friendly staff. My favorite is the grilled chicken and cheddar on the flatbread.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text: Wow.  What a great place, and perhaps the best sandwich ever.  I stumbled in one day, with a joke in my belly, craving a chicken sandwich.  I ordered the BBQ cheddar chicken sandwich.  I was kindly informed they were out of chicken.  I asked them what the best sandwich they had, and I was told:  The Wreck!  What a pleasure, and I have yet to try anything else!!  Certainly a hardy meal, with lots of extras and service only matched Chic Fil A.  Would say more, but I'm a Wreck!

text:
Third time I've been to this chain and always have a great experience!  The food is top notch with its own unique flavor and style. 

With so many sub sandwich style shops out there it's hard to impress, but Potbelly does it!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text:
Potbelly is close to my job, and it's a nice , quick go-to for lunch. The lot always appears to be full, but there's almost always one spot, or someone pulling out of I spot when I arrive. The line is always long, but it moves pretty quickly. I always order the same thing - chicken salad on multigrain bun. It's wonderful! 

There's usually a live musician playing which is a nice touch. I've never fully enjoyed it, because I usually order to-go, but there's plenty of seating inside and on the patio.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text:
I tired to like this place. But man. I don't like hot sandwiches. Unless it's a Ruben or a patty melt. But not a lukewarm lunch meat meat. I shouldn't have to keep making sure they aren't heating it. So today we were in a hurry. I said cold, cold, make sure it's cold. Yet I am back at the office with a "warm" sandwich. Last time I had it re-made, but I only had 15 minutes to get back to work and eat at my desk. I doubt if I had noticed I would have time anyway to have it re-made. Plus there is no cheese on my sandwich. I mean what is the point without cheese. At this point I don't even know if it was mine. I had 15 min to eat it before a phone meeting so I had to. I won't be back. 
Might be helpful to write names on the bags like Which Which does. I mean they know how to make a sandwich. Or if Lenny's would just come back. 
It was busy and it was lunch time, but just disappointing that I have to unwrap my sandwich there to make sure I even have the correct one and I swear the bag didn't feel warm. 
Seem like this location is due for some re-training maybe? People rave about the one downtown although I haven't been there.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text: Unimpressed. Service and quality is below the usual Potbelly standard. Music is always loud at Potbelly, but at this location is interferes with service quality. Both my wife and I were asked twice about a specific item on our sandwich. Clearly the sandwich maker was asking out of habit rather than actually listening for our response. After waiting for the toppings to be put on my sandwich while two employees talked very loudly to each other about whether one had ever been to Ohio, I opened my sandwich at the table to find the wrong toppings. I guess going to Ohio is more important to them than whether I wanted pickles vs mayonnaise. This new location needs to do something quick to get up to standard. Poorly lacking.

text: Great meatball sub! Salads are great too. Don't forget the Oatmeal Chocolate Chip cookies

text: What a great place! In addition to having great fresh sandwiches that explode with flavor in your mouth, they have great shakes, salads and everything else.  The Wreck, is the best sandwich I have ever had.  The people preparing your food are artists, and extremely friendly.  Laid back atmosphere with books, games and occasional local talent playing music make this a great stop for lunch and dinner.  Love it.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text:
Recently found out that there was a Potbelly's in Carmel when I passed it on the way to Market District one day and was excited as I really like the one downtown. The way the ordering process is, can be a bit confusing because when you first walk in the cashier is right there which if you've never been before, you'd think you'd have to pay first then get your sandwich at the other end of the counter but that's not the case. When you walk in, go all the way to the back where the refrigerated drinks are and that is where you'll place your order. 

I got the Mediterranean sandwich with chicken. I thought it was just okay. There wasn't much flavor as the location downtown so I was a bit disappointed. The bread was my favorite part as it is toasty on the outside but nice and soft on the inside. Overall, I'll probably just stick with the location downtown as I wasn't too impressed with Carmel's.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text:
i had wanted to try the roast beef but they used process beef, thoroughly cooked through and in a perfect oval shape.  So passed on that.  we tried an italian and the meat was very good and not overly spiced.  But they had no oil and vinegar, just oil.  That really surprised me as italian's are traditionaly served with a drizzle of oil and vinegar.  
The bread was ok but we prefer a thicker french bread this was slightly underbaked about the thickness of a ciabatta without the light chewiness.  The tomatoes were sliced as thin as the meat.  they were almost translucent.  even with extra tomato we could not taste it in the sandwhich.  It was better than subway but not as good as firehouse or sub 16 (our favorite).
in fact after splitting an italian at potbelly we went and split one at sub 16 and could tell with the first bite it was a much better sandwhich.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text: My family and I love Potbelly and go there quite frequently. We went out of our way to come to this Potbelly and they said they weren't open until 1:00pm on their door. That is unacceptable that it was not on a website and there better be a good explanation for this. I was late to my daughter's soccer game and missed her goal because I had to go to Jimmy John's instead because of the poor service. Another lost customer.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text:
Potbelly is a chain sandwich shop, and the nearest location (until now) is on Monument Circle. For their "oven warming" (soft opening), proceeds went to the Carmel Clay Public Library, which gave them brownie points in my book. I was unable to attend that time but went on the 4th of July weekend.

I didn't think the layout of the shop was very logical and I was unsure where to place my order (hint: walk toward the menu board in the back and order there). Then you pay at the end, instead of paying up front and then picking up your sandwich. Though we were the only ones in line, we were asked to clarify our menu orders at least twice. How do they keep orders straight during busy lunch hours?

I ordered a Mediterranean sandwich with chicken. It was good, but I didn't find it to be crazy delicious - standard sandwich in my book. The bread reminded me of Which Wich. My loyalties will remain with Jimmy John's around the corner.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text: I waited 2 days for them to get it right before I wrote my review. Here it goes: I stopped by Tuesday after work for a chicken and cheddar NO mayo, NO lettuce, NO pickle, everything else. The girl preparing my sandwich asked me at least 3 times what I didn't want; I repeated it. I pay and leave. I get home, open my sandwich and lettuce is waving at me. I'm pissed cause I'm hungry, drove out of my way to this particular Potbelly's, told the girl what I didn't want at least 3 times, yet I'm looking at what I asked not to have on my sandwich. I called and spoke with Nick who apologized and told me to stop by and they will make my sandwich right and give me a cookie on the house. I told Nick I'm not sure when I'll be back that way, but I'm gonna freeze the sandwich and bring it with me. Today I stop in with my sandwich only to be told they don't have any grilled chicken and I can't get my money back because the purchase was a few days ago. The lady seemed skeptical about my issue until I pulled out my receipt (she saw the 2 day old sandwich in my hand), then offered me a free sandwich coupon to use when I come back in. Thanks, but I will NOT be back. Maybe I'll use it as a stocking stuffer.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text: Wanted something different on our way to grocery shopping so we stopped at Potbelly. The things we liked. They have Coke and Pepsi and our sandwiches were good. Now to what was not so great. The ordering process and line needs to be redesigned. Do something like Which Wich and have something for the customer to fill out and send down the line with what you want. Or have one person take the order, one put on the stuff before the oven and mark it like Blaze with a number, so you don't have to figure out what is yours when it rolls out. The brand of chips was not great, really wanted Lays bbq and Doritos. Did not like the live music. They didn't sound bad, but the place is too small and acoustics are bad. We can mark this off our list and go to Which Wich it's in our grocery parking anyway.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text: I like Potbelly... well I want to like Potbelly but it just seems a little hectic behind the counter.  I placed an order but had to repeat my order to everyone on the line including the cashier.  That's odd to me.  I think the employees should be relaying that information to each other.  It was pretty slow service and the line backed up a bit.  This is my second time at this location and both times I have not been super impressed.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text: I love potbelly's and I was super pumped when I found out there was one down here. I came in 40 minutes before close on a Saturday night and I was created by Cam, smiling and kind and he seemed like he was genuinely happy we were there. He is seriously one of the friendliest people I've come across in the service industry in a while and I really appreciate it. Excellent subs and even better customer service!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text:
I really like a lot of their sandwiches but lately I've been getting the Mediterranean sandwich with chicken. It's definitely the only place I can get a sandwich like this. 

Instead of mayonnaise on the bread they use hummus for this sandwich. I've never really thought about using hummus that way but it works. Gives the sandwich moisture but not a lot of fat.

The only thing I don't like on this sandwich that comes with it and are the artichoke hearts. They always seem kind of chewy and so I just leave them off.

For extras I always get lettuce and tomato and of course the hot peppers! To me the hot peppers aren't very spicy and they add the right amount of kick to the sandwich. 

If I'm really hungry I get it big!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text: This place was pretty much a hit or miss kind of a situation. I tried their seasonal turducken sandwhich and it was amazingly flavorful! It was well seasoned and had that salty and sweet combination dancing on my taste buds. Unfortunately, their other sandwiches did not meet up to this yummy, limited time beauty's standards. The Mediterranean was pretty disappointing flavor-wise and so was the philly cheese steak. Both were dry and not really wowing enough for me to come back. The secret menu sandwhich called "Fireball" made up for these lackies, though! It was tasty, zesty, savory, tangy, and had that right amount of kick. Would I go back for it? Maybe. In regards to their smoothies and/or shakes try the secret menu item called "cookie collision." Honestly, you can't really go wrong with blended up Oreos with butter cookies! Other than that the berry ones are okay, but if I were to choose, I'd go with the oreo one hands down.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text:
I like a sandwich made with a roll that is soft on the inside and has a slightly toasted crunch on the outside. Soft enough to chew that you're not gnawing on a hunk of bread like a squirrel. The sandwiches here are good like that; no squirrel-like behavior. I got the turkey swiss, with "everything" on it except hot peppers and pickles, which included lettuce, onion, tomato, mayo, mustard, salt and pepper, oil and vinegar. What I love about these sandwiches is that they are all toasted, so every bite is both warm and cool.

Here is what I hope they work on: I had to tell my order to the person getting my bread, then I took two steps over and told my order to the person adding my meat and toppings, then I took another two steps over and told my order to the person ringing me up. Literally, I had to recite my order three times to three different people who were all standing next to each other. You're probably rolling your eyes and going, "First-world problems," but it's really annoying. All this talking would be completely unnecessary if they would just come up with a system to get everyone behind the counter on the same page about the orders.

Other than that, I like their sandwiches, and they have a large selection of chips. The inside of the restaurant is clean and new still, with lots of tables.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text:
I love sandwiches and Potbelly is a favorite place. It's on the regular lunch rotation at work and I always try to go along when it is Potbelly day. 
Parking can be a little crazy at lunch time, but we car pool and can get in and out without much issues. We rarely stay to eat, but they do have a fair amount of tables and I have noticed they often have had live music. 
My current favorite is the turkey club. The turkey is hand carved and it comes with the best bacon. I love a hot sandwich and Pot Belly is one of the best around. 
I have the app and have earned free cookies. The cookies are great. The brownie one is the best and I also like the dream bars. They say they aren't baked in house, but they are all super fresh so they can't come from far. 
If you want a quality sandwich or even a salad go to Potbelly. You won't regret it.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop

text: Had my second bad experience there tonight.  This time I ordered online and went to pick it up and they were out of everything.  I will not go back again.  Manager could care less, cashier was clueless and continually brushing her hair with her hand. This place is a mess.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop

text: Pickup order wasn't ready until 10 minutes later than the pickup window. That's despite nobody being in line and only 2 other people in the restaurant.  They were out of ingredients, the person making everything was rude. Giving more than one star because I'm assuming the food will taste better than trash. Haven't tried it yet, just writing this review out of frustration now before even getting home. Would have left if I didn't make the mistake of already paying online.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text: I didn't know this location existed until recently. I'd honestly forgotten about Potbelly which is crazy because they make a great sandwich. I always get the Italian on wheat. Their hot pepper spread is so good!! They also have really good milkshakes. Not sure what makes them so great but I love getting a vanilla milkshake. Service at this location was awesome. The woman who made my milkshake was super sweet and had a smile on her face from the time I walked in to the time I left. Now that I know this location is only about 10 minutes from my house, I'll definitely be back!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text: Since moving to Indiana 6 years ago, I have driven by or walk pass potbelly shops and never thought to stop in. I love me a good sandwich, and I always managed to stop at Jimmy John or Subway just cause I needed fast service cause I am always on the go. Since working around the area, there was plenty of options to eat from McDonalds to the Market Table but during rush lunch it can be quite a mission to grab lunch. One day I decided to order food online and just pick it up. I placed an order online and it was super easy to navigate. Also, for first time users - FREE COOKIE!! Which by the way is huge!!! I ordered an Italian Sub and added hot peppers, onions, pickles, and oil. They give you time slots to pick up, so give yourself an extra 15 min prior to place a order since pick up is in waves. I literally parked  my car, walked inside, went to the order counter, and my sandwich was ready. Still warm and toasty. And just like that it was that easy!! And omg there sandwiches are so good!! Doesnt taste like cardboard like some bread or subs does.  Like I dont think I want to eat Jimmy John and Subway after eating Potbelly. It's becoming a weekly lunch for me. Definitely sign up for online services, they have perks. This week, I managed to order online BOGO subs, and managed to save the sandwiches for next day lunch for hubby and I it was still good! I never get a chance to notice the staff, they did seem friendly, but my online order was always ready when I went to the counter to pick it up. So you cant complain about that!! Can't believe it took me so long to try them out!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}

text:
I've only ever gotten THE WRECK, but that's because my taste buds crave it! Join the perks club and you'll have deals flying into your inbox! Don't want another app on your phone? Just go in and make a purchase - there have almost always been coupons on the bottom of mine. Warm, fresh, meat and bread, the Italian seasoning is just the added touch and if u like HOT - go for the peppers! 

They know how to keep you coming back!

text:
Love potbelly, but this place is bad. The last time I went in, they were sweeping the floor (it was about an hr before closing.) the person sweeping put their broom down and then proceeded to try and make me a sandwich without washing their hands.

Today when I went, the cashier also happened to be the person putting the toppings on the sandwich -- which is fine, as long as they was their hands after handling the money -- this person did not.

Will not be returning.
