text: 1st time at a Potbelly and I was not disappointed!  Mediterranean Salad was awesome, probably one of the best salads I have ever had. Staff was exceptional. I will definitely be back!!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}

text: I love this place so damn much!!! The food is great, one time I didn't get enough mustard but the people are too nice to care. They literally know who I am and already start making my sandwich when walk over to order. I used to be a jimmy johns guy but potbelly has made me want to come back as much as I do. Hats off to the manager for finding people like this. Love you all

text: One of the best milkshakes I've ever had! Service was fast and friendly! I didn't realize they sold shakes and smoothies here. I'll def be back and ya'll should check them out too! I haven't had anything else from their menu but will give it a try next time I'm there for another shake.

text: For a sandwich shop in Carmel I can't give this place three stars. It's more reliable than any other sandwich chain. I rotate the turkey, chicken salad and chicken cheddar sandwiches on multigrain. All solid and not too many calories .

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text:
Need a quick lunch but don't want "fast food" then Potbelly's in the place. Excellent service, excellent sandwich. Hadn't been to a Potbelly's in years, now I'm going to be a regular. I had the turkey club the bacon was crisp and the meat was real roasted turkey not that pressed lunch meat that so many places serve. It came to me warm and delicious on super fresh 12-grain bread. 
I am an iced tea aficionado it's all I drink and I've had it everywhere. I like it unsweetened with lots of fresh lemon. I always prefer fresh brewed But what I appreciated most was the lemons, they were a sizable portion. Not those little slices that you get on the side of a glass that are more decorative that functional. Here they serve real lemon wedges. 
The restaurants bright and airy and there is a counter along the window so single patrons can eat and not feel like they are taking up a table meant for 4. The one thing they need is some plants blocking the outdoor patio from the parking lot while it is nice to eat outdoors when the weather is so nice nobody wants to eat lunch in the parking lot.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text:
Potbelly is a top two local sandwich shop for me. They get a 5 for my sandwich and a 1-2 for service. Not sure why, but you can never order via app at this location anymore. I've tried many a times and it always says it isn't available.  The majority of the staff always seems annoyed that you come in.  Yesterday I actually got a lecture by a young employee on "how to make their life easier".  

So if you want to get a good sandwich-you'll probably get one. You just may get it with a side of attitude (hence why I wish I could order via app).

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}

text: I absolutely love potbelly, but this has to be the worst one I've been to. The chicken on my sandwich was dry and a strange dark color. But that's not the worst part. I added on avocado for $1.10 extra and it came with THE SKIN ATTACHED and covered in dark black spots. Absolutely disgusting. Who just looks at a black avocado and continues to put it on a sandwich?? Never going back again. Beware.

text: I was not aware there was a national mayo shortage! This was the dryest sandwich I think I've ever had. Is it just the Carmel location that doesn't believe in condiments, or all of them?

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text: Tried the Potbelly delivery through their app. Estimated delivery time came and went so I called to check on it. I was told Doordash hadn't come to pick up my order which had been sitting there for forty minutes. I was offered to either come get the food or cancel the order. I chose to do have hubby pick up the order because I felt wasteful just canceling. I should have just cancelled it. By the time the food came home, the sandwiches had been sitting an hour and 20 minutes, so needless to say the sandwiches were mushy and the shakes were melted.  There are many other sandwich shops around so I will be trying some others...

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}

text: Ordered through Grubhub to be delivered at 1. My food was not ready when the driver arrived, so I received my order 35 minutes into my lunch hour. Also, my order was incomplete and the sandwich did not taste good. However, the potato soup was good, which is why I gave Potbelly 1 star.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text: Never eating at potbelly again. I ordered food tonight and when my boyfriend went in to grab our food from a designated pick up box. He was harassed and prevented from grabbing OUR paid for food because he wasn't wearing a mask? We're not against wearing masks it's just not needed if you're in and out and not interacting with ANYONE. Not once I did read something in my email that had very detailed pick up instructions. If that's how you're going to treat your guests I'm fine never eating there again. Also like to add they forgot some items we ordered.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text: I ordered a mediterranean sandwich with chicken and macaroni and cheese for pick two. I ordered my sandwich without red peppers, when I got it that had it and that was the most ingredient in the sandwich. The macaroni and cheese have been sitting there for two days probably. They remade my sandwich everyone in my party was done eating and the piece of chicken was the size of a pea it wasn't even a bite. Going out to lunch was supposed to be a special treat but it was probably one of the worst I've had.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text:
Meh. 

So you order and give all the specifics about what you want. They make the sandwiches in front of you. Then you go to the cashier and they ask "what did you order?"  I just went through this, now I have to repeat the entire order again?  Seems kind of silly. Here's an idea, whoever takes your order should write it down (I know, genius) and hand the ticket down with the order. 

Vanilla milkshake was good but nothing special. No whipped cream or cherry. 

Sandwiches were ok. Although both the wife and myself were missing avocado that was supposed to come with both. We brought this to the attention of the staff and they gave us some avocado and apologized. 

We've been here a couple times and probably won't be back. Too many other places to support.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text:
I really enjoy the food at Potbelly, but this Carmel location is consistently frustrating. Between the chaotic cattle-call ordering process in the store, to their consistently dysfunctional website, I'm not sure which is worse. Today, I placed an order for delivery on their website. The website gave me delivery windows in the Central time zone (both the store and my office are definitely in Eastern time). I converted to what I assumed was my desired time, but when the food failed to show up well after my 15 minute window, I knew this was yet another case of Potbelly screwing me over on my lunch break. I called to report the issue to a staffer who was more interested in rushing me off the phone than listening to what the problem was or doing anything about it. There is no doubt in my mind that my complaint about the time zone issue on the website started and ended with the girl I spoke with... she wasn't interested in listening and I doubt she tells a soul.

As it stands, I'm not sure how many more chances I'll give this location. I've reported issues to the staff only to have them happen again and again. I've stood in the lobby and/or sat at my desk waiting, hungry, far too many times. For the premium prices they charge, it's just not worth the headache.

text: I ate at this location today.  Service was VERY slow.  Order was messed up.  Ordered loaded potato soup.  The only thing that was loaded was the water.  That was possibly the worse bowl of soup I have attempted to eat.  I will not return.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop

categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text:
We got curbside pickup for lunch. I ordered ahead of time on their app and the process was seamless.

You can schedule the order for a specific time and day. Call the restaurant when you pull up and they'll bring it to your car. 
We ordered the Italian, the wreck and the classic turkey breast sandwich.  Only one sandwich per person but they are really filling. Nice, warm and toasted.  The ingredients taste so fresh. You can customize the order or eat it as is. My favorite is the Italian! 

Their cookies and smoothies are also delicious treats. The Zappos bbq chips are also my fave.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text:
Second time here. I have been to Potbelly at airports and I know there is one in Bloomington, IN. Quick service with affordable sandwiches and salads. 

It is the closest thing to an east coast grinder I have found around here. All the ingredients are very fresh and service is quick. Your sandwich goes through the toaster oven / conveyer so it's not as quick as Jimmy John's but it is nice and toasty. 

My chicken sandwich was not just chicken slices but chunks of tender chicken meat. I had it on wheat (need to request this) with all the works: mayo, mustard, hot peppers, lettuce, onion, tomato, pickle, oil & Italian seasoning. The pickles and peppers were nice and crunchy adding to the different texture levels. Very tasty and for most people the original size (5.70+.55 for mushrooms) will be plenty.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text:
I cannot speak to any other food at Potbelly. But today I split the ice cream cookie sandwich with a friend because it was so huge. No, we did not share the same handheld delicacy. Rather, large top and bottom cookies were chosen, then the ice cream was split into two small bowls. It was the perfect amount, my sweet tooth was more than satisfied, the team member granted every request, and two people were made very happy for under $4!

#Getlostindiana

text: This was a very poor experience. Not only were people not social distancing, but the staff and manager were policing customers' behavior. It is understandable to be stressed in these circumstances, but if a guest would like to go look at the cookies while sandwiches are being prepared, there's no need to chastise them to get back to the line. The manager was incredibly rude at check out. Have grace with people, especially paying customers. The food was good but the sandwiches were not labeled and we had to go through each other's food to figure out whose was whose.

attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text:
For me, Potbelly's is all about nostalgia. As a Hoosier, I only was introduced to Potbelly's when visiting my cousins in Milwaukee: I had never been to a place that, by default, toasted sandwiches: Subway was our go-to, and, well, it was reserved for road trips only.

When I went to Potbelly's the first time, I discovered mushroom-forward sandwiches. First, it was the vegetarian sandwich: the standard. Always accompanied by an Oreo shake or smoothie (this was younger me, the version could afford the calories and the sugar). Then, I came across the mushroom melt: less bread that actually helped you TASTE the cheese better, as well as better overall veggie-to-bread ratios. A much more reasonable calorie count as well.

Potbelly's also carries some great, kettled-cooked potato chips that come in a variety of flavors like jalapeno. If you want a change from your usual sandwich joint, give Potbelly's a try. You won't regret it.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text:
Beware this Potbelly location. It is woefully inconsistent in quality.

I've avoided writing a review here because my love for Potbelly is long standing. I think my family discovered them in West Lafayette about 16 or 17 years ago, and I was hooked immediately. I've since eaten at many locations in multiple states, and I don't remember a single bad experience until frequenting this store.

I order the tuna salad sandwich 95% of the time I eat at Potbelly. I just love the way their hot peppers complement the tuna salad. On multiple occasions, the tuna salad has been SO dry here. For some reason, it doesn't seem their employees can follow the tuna salad recipe. One time, I had to ask for mayo packets to put on my sandwich because it seemed like they just gave me flaked tuna straight out of a can. So bad. 

Now since 2020, I've started ordering on their app and picking up carry out in the store a lot. It is a very handy way to be able to grab a meal ... if you could trust that they make your sandwich well. Unfortunately that only happens at this location about half of the time.  They don't seem to be able to follow notes requests well. I like extra hot peppers. I only get this on my sandwich every couple times. This I deal with, but what I can't deal with is getting home with a sandwich that has about half the normal amount of meat on it and completely torched, dry bread. If they're cutting corners and not putting the adequate amount of meat and cheese on, their toaster completely burns and dries the bread. Inedible. 

Things like this happen at this store too often. I've contacted Potbelly HQ about it when the store wasn't very old (after the no mayo tuna salad incident) ... that they need better training for a consistent experience, but this store just doesn't seem to be able to get a handle on it. I wish this weren't the store that was local to my work commute. I want to stop eating here. But I love Potbelly. It's frustrating.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}

text: I haven't eaten at a Potbelly in a while so I thought I would try it again. I got here at 30 minutes before closing so I got the RBF look. I ordered a 9 inch turkey add bacon. Loved the bread and the bacon stole the show. Loved it. The turkey on the other ham seemed cheap and didn't wow me. Sandwich drink and chips $13+ so I'd expect more. I'd come back  but next time I'd get a BLT for sure. The guy who I will assume was the manager went back to cleaning while my sandwich came through the toaster he did wash his hands for about 2 seconds which was alarming but at least he put gloves back on.

text: Great food, great mobile app, but the "USS" fan blade thing is annoying sound. Trying to eat here and this thing is just making horrible noise...

text: I LOVE POTBELLY! I seriously crave these sandwiches (esp with the turkey and provolone with hot peppers). I have always had great experiences at this location. The staff is pleasant and efficient. My son loves the Mac and cheese kids meal. Something for everyone!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'Caters': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'BusinessParking': "{u'valet': False, u'garage': False, u'street': None, u'lot': None, u'validated': False}"}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Soup, Restaurants, Salad, Delis
text: I always stop at potbelly when I'm in the area. The Italian sandwich is so good. I actually never tried anything else on the menu. There were 2 younger guys working this day they had the best customer service they were so friendly and helpful. I had scrubs and work badge on actually thank me for working in a hospital and helping people. I thought that was very nice of them. I just love  going to establishment were people actually care about their jobs and make every one feel so welcome. The prices are very affordable like any other sub shop. Can't wait to go back and try more things on the menu

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop

text: Pretty awesome sandwich shop. The pizza sandwich is great. They have a lot of different options to change up sandwiches so there is always something new to be tried. A definite recommend for sure. Also the shop is fairly new and pretty nice.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Caters': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': 'None', 'Ambience': 'None'}

text: Surprisingly good salads. I was skeptical about the $8-9ish prices for just salads but they're pretty hefty. The farmhouse is good. I do wish the chicken salad one had more meat. This particular store has reallyyy nice staff. Plenty of tables. Right across from some Temple buildings, so great for students.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Caters': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': 'None', 'Ambience': 'None'}
categories: Restaurants, Salad, Sandwiches, Fast Food, Delis, Soup
text: One of my favorite places to have lunch. This was the first place I went to when visiting campus and it has been a place I go to almost every week (multiple times a week too). The food is always great and warm. The employees are the best and coming from working in the food industry. I appreciate the good service. The food is fairly priced and I can always finish my whole sandwich (roast beef with mushrooms, provolone, and mayo) and feel full. I was too busy eating the sandwich to take a picture before, so here is a half eaten one lol.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Caters': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': 'None', 'Ambience': 'None'}
categories: Restaurants, Salad, Sandwiches, Fast Food, Delis, Soup
text: This potbelly is awesome! My first time at this location I had a great experience. The manager Ron greeted me with a welcoming smile. Overall, the  staff is amazing they are all very friendly.The food is always fresh and delicious!!!! I have been back at least once a week since my first visit.  My new favorite spot for sandwiches!!! I'm so happy this location is on temple campus. I recommend the Turkey and Swiss sandwich or the Uptown salad.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Caters': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': 'None', 'Ambience': 'None'}
categories: Restaurants, Salad, Sandwiches, Fast Food, Delis, Soup
text:
I have  come here before for lunch about a year ago and regret not coming back sooner!


They staff was very pleasant during today's visit. Since I have only been here twice before I feel like a newbie and tend to be shy about asking questions. There's no need to be here, they are so nice. 

My lunch was amazing and even coming in right at 12, the line went quick.

I'll probably come back next week when I'm on campus again!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Caters': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': 'None', 'Ambience': 'None'}

text: Amazing quality food. Their sandwiches, salads, soup, milkshakes, cookies, you name it! They have great customer service, low wait time, and good prices. This is one of my favorite places to eat on campus for so many reasons.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Caters': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': 'None', 'Ambience': 'None'}

text:
Unreasonably expensive and nowhere on the menu does it say all sandwiches are toasted. Thanks for ruining good bread. 

They drop a huge block of cheddar into your chili. Horrible.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Caters': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': 'None', 'Ambience': 'None'}
categories: Restaurants, Salad, Sandwiches, Fast Food, Delis, Soup
text: Previous experiences were good so I'll give 2 stars, but after tonight I doubt I'll go back. I approached the counter at about 10 minutes after 9pm. The gentleman behind the counter asked what I would like. When I told him he proceeded to tell that I need to download the app so they can have my sandwich ready. He said because they are closing soon that he is in closing mode and would prefer not to make anymore sandwiches. I wasn't aware so I asked what time they closed. 930pm perhaps? No. They close at 10pm. Guess what else? No lettuce or tomatoes left...oh because they were already covered in plastic wrap for storage overnight. Cap it off with half of a milkshake sans cookie on the straw and another miserable employee who had to make it.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Caters': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': 'None', 'Ambience': 'None'}
categories: Restaurants, Salad, Sandwiches, Fast Food, Delis, Soup
text: Today was my first time ever going to a potbelly and let me tell you my experience, it was amazing! The staff was so welcoming and helped me pick out a great turkey sandwich. I have never been to a place where the staff was so nice and helpful! Also, they had great live music and gave me a complimentary drink for it being my first time! I will definitely be recommending this potbelly to everyone on campus!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Caters': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': 'None', 'Ambience': 'None'}
categories: Restaurants, Salad, Sandwiches, Fast Food, Delis, Soup
text: I love potbelly sandwich shop. The young girl with brown hair at the cash register is very sweet and apologized to me over and over again because I waited one minute for my online order food to be ready! And she brought it out to me! Great service at this restaurant.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Caters': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': 'None', 'Ambience': 'None'}
categories: Restaurants, Salad, Sandwiches, Fast Food, Delis, Soup
text:
It's taken me a hot minute to visit this Potbelly, and I'm pretty much regretting every lunch that I ate elsewhere on campus.

First, this place is nice and big! You shouldn't have a problem securing a table.

Second, the lines are long, but they move pretty quickly. I got the chicken and cheddar on flatbread, and was very pleased with the size of my sandwich. It was completely an acceptable portion size - not too much and not too little - and it was simply delish!

The cheddar and broccoli soup was probably extremely bad for me, but it tasted super cheesy and great.

They have fresh baked cookies and dream bars, and their smoothies come with two little cookies with holes in the center so they can go over your straw (how cute!).

I truly loved it here. Sandwiches of all types, salads, soups, and desserts. What more could you need?

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Caters': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': 'None', 'Ambience': 'None'}
categories: Restaurants, Salad, Sandwiches, Fast Food, Delis, Soup
text: The employees were very rude. They complained about having to make our milkshakes because of the cleanup and "because it's winter". They were also condescending when we placed the sandwich order.  The fact they had to do any labor seemed like a burden to them. They then proceeded to conclude the transaction by talking about how Temple isn't a good school, which is ironic because TU students pay their bills. I enjoy Potbelly, but not worth going to this location.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Caters': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': 'None', 'Ambience': 'None'}
categories: Restaurants, Salad, Sandwiches, Fast Food, Delis, Soup
text: My family loves the Potbelly Sandwich Shop on Temple University's campus.  Shelby and the rest of the crew are awesome, the atmosphere is always buzzing, and the food is satisfying if you are on your way to cheer on the Owls at a sporting event (just a quick walk away).  But we especially like Potbelly in the fall and winter, when they bring back their chicken pot pie soup.  It's a like a hug from a loved one.  Piping hot, creamy soup with vegetables, big chunks of white meat chicken and crunchy topping. Yum!  Grab a bowl of soup, a cookie and a soda and you are set.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Caters': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': 'None', 'Ambience': 'None'}
categories: Restaurants, Salad, Sandwiches, Fast Food, Delis, Soup
text: I have always had a great meal here. I love everything here. It is always freshly made and available. The better part about my experience is the customer service and the friendly vibe from all of the employees. The all make my day and make me want to come back.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Caters': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': 'None', 'Ambience': 'None'}
categories: Restaurants, Salad, Sandwiches, Fast Food, Delis, Soup
text: The sandwiches are good and I love their cheddar broccoli soup. It's usually pretty packed since they are located near Temple University's college campus.  It's always clean (tables, chairs, floors) and that is a great reason as to why I continue to visit. Usually the staff is pretty nice, but the one lady with the headscarf does not appear to be pleasant.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Caters': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': 'None', 'Ambience': 'None'}

text: Love it! The service was excellent and the sandwich was fresh and tasty.  I thought Potbelly no longer existed in the Philadelphia area. I was pleasantly surprised to find this location and it is actually better than the others used to be! Very clean dining area and great staff! Long live Potbelly!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Caters': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': 'None', 'Ambience': 'None'}

text: Best sandwich ever! Very healthy and yet flavorful. The staff is very friendly and efficient.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Caters': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': 'None', 'Ambience': 'None'}

text: If you're looking for a place with great food friendly customer service and a pleasant atmosphere this is the place to be I enjoy all their burgers they are absolutely delicious and me and my family often go here to eat I recommend these guys to everyone that I talk to if you looking for a good time grateful friendly atmosphere excellent customer service this is the place to be

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Caters': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': 'None', 'Ambience': 'None'}
categories: Restaurants, Salad, Sandwiches, Fast Food, Delis, Soup
text: This was my first time trying Potbelly, I have to say I was not impressed. I'm not much of a soup guy so I didn't try any of the soups but I ordered a turkey and cheese sandwich. They toasted it which was fine the bread was fresh enough that it wasn't too crunchy but outside of that the sandwich was lacking flavor. It was just so bland. The turkey was just blah the cheese didn't even have flavor it was really interesting. I guess they are used to people dipping the sand which in a soup but again, not my style. I'm not sure I'd try this place again. They did have Zapps chips which was awesome becuase they are the best chips in PA but they were out of the voodo chip flavor, THE ONLY ONE THAT MATTERS  best of luck with your soups and sandwiches but this seemed like a super watered down version of Panera....

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Caters': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': 'None', 'Ambience': 'None'}
categories: Restaurants, Salad, Sandwiches, Fast Food, Delis, Soup
text: I ordered online for a group of ten. I was extremely embarrassed that they only gave me 5 sandwiches cut in half except one was in thirds. Look at the picture on the website of what I ordered and compare it to what I got. I called the shop back and they told me that one of the sandwiches was cut in three to fill in the space and that everything was correct. I had pre-ordered more for the next day which I promptly canceled. The next day they tried to charge my credit card for the 20 sandwiches. When luckily my credit card company asked me if it was a fraudulent charge I agreed it was. Potbelly then called to ask if I REALLY wanted to cancel. This place is supposed to be a franchise.  Yikes!  They need help.  Avoid this place at all costs!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Caters': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': 'None', 'Ambience': 'None'}
categories: Restaurants, Salad, Sandwiches, Fast Food, Delis, Soup
text: I didn't enjoy the food from here.  Ordered a sandwich and received what tasted like old chicken and was dry.  The broccoli soup was okay it just needed some salt and pepper. The best part of my order was the chocolate chip cookie which I'm sure was premade.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Caters': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': 'None', 'Ambience': 'None'}
categories: Restaurants, Salad, Sandwiches, Fast Food, Delis, Soup
text: The service was great, even though we got there before they were about to close they still served us as if they weren't closing at all. The sandwiches are fully loaded and tasted wonderful! I would surely come back.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Caters': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': 'None', 'Ambience': 'None'}
categories: Restaurants, Salad, Sandwiches, Fast Food, Delis, Soup
text: The veggie melt was weird. Avocado, cheese and raw mushrooms? It's like someone who has no idea what vegetables are came up with this sandwich. Also, was told the potato soup had no meat in it, but when I tried it, it smelled and tasted strongly of bacon. Hubby had the steak sandwich and didn't like it either, it was just luncheon meat (roast beef). However, the chocolate cookie was good, service was also good, and prices were decent enough.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Caters': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': 'None', 'Ambience': 'None'}
categories: Restaurants, Salad, Sandwiches, Fast Food, Delis, Soup
text: I ordered a bowl of chicken pot pie soup and a chicken salad sandwich with extra mayo. Instead I was given a mayo sandwich and a spoonful of chicken salad. There wasn't even a variety of bread types. Would have preferred regular sandwich bread instead of a roll.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Caters': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': 'None', 'Ambience': 'None'}
categories: Restaurants, Salad, Sandwiches, Fast Food, Delis, Soup
text:
This is one of my favorite restaurants ever and it's definitely my favorite sandwich shop! I always order the Mediterranean sandwich without chicken or cheese (to make it vegan) and I absolutely love the zesty hummus. The sandwiches are always warm, fresh, and perfectly toasted. It does cost a little much for me (about $8 for this sandwich) but it's completely worth it. 

My sister loves the big turkey sandwich, broccoli cheddar soap, and oatmeal chocolate chip cookie.

As of October 2020, they have limited indoor dining and plenty of outdoor dining.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True'}
categories: Sandwiches, Restaurants
text: Great experience all around and a delicious sandwich. This location opened up less a mile from my office so a few of us decided to get takeout to try. The online ordering was super easy and very customizable. The minute I got there the food was ready and the staff were friendly. Everything was in the bag as well as plenty of napkins and utensils. The food itself was SO good. Mac n' cheese was fantastic, I tried a bite of someone else's portion and regretted not getting it myself. We had two turkey sandwiches, a Mediterranean and a BLTA as well as some mac n cheese and a broccoli cheddar soup. The soup was good and hot, but the mac n cheese was the clear winner. The Mediterranean was fabulous but very hearty. Everything was toasted, hot, fresh and super tasty. This is being added to the lunch rotation!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True'}
categories: Sandwiches, Restaurants
text:
My first Potbelly's was 35+ years ago at the original on Lincoln Ave. in Chicago. Made by the "Mayor of Bucktown" and pedicab owner/driver. I just tried Tampas' version', near Ray J and found myself sadly disappointed. The avocado on the Avo-Turkey was brown! The other Sandwiches we ordered were blah. Bland. Of no taste consequence. I want to love ''em and frequent the place. But Alesisi and John Smith hands down are better choices.  Jersey Mike's, Quiznos and Subway compete. 
I'll give y'all one more try so please take more care and pride in your product and the legacy it represents.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True'}
categories: Sandwiches, Restaurants
text: As a former Michigander, I was so excited to see Potbelly down here in Florida! The sandwiches are all so good. Keep in mind, all the sandwiches are toasted unless you ask for them not to be. My personal favorite is the tuna salad or the Mediterranean. You place your order at the back/the end of the sandwich line and then move down to the end near the registers to customize with whatever toppings you want. Besides the awesome sandwiches, the shakes here are amazing too, but my absolute favorite thing here is the freshly baked oatmeal chocolate chip cookies. If you're in the area, I highly recommend stopping in. You won't regret it!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True'}
categories: Sandwiches, Restaurants
text: Stopped into this new location for a bite to eat. Ordered the Mediterranean with grilled chicken sandwich and a cup of vegetable garden soup. It was delicious! Come on in if you're in the area and don't forget to sign up for the potbelly perks.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True'}
categories: Sandwiches, Restaurants
text: It has finally arrived in Florida and not inside an airport! What a wonderful and amazing place this is! As a fan of this chain of establishments, seeing this come into Central Florida is a dream come true! I really hope this place blows up in the area and can lead to this amazing chain entering the Orlando/Kissimmee/International Drive scene as this would fit right it! Great staff, amazing food, wonderful value, and perfect as always!!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': True, 'breakfast': False}", 'HasTV': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': True, 'casual': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}"}
categories: Salad, Delis, Soup, Restaurants, Food, Desserts, Fast Food, Sandwiches
text:
First time here, unfortunately my last. But here's the catch... It wasn't a bad experience, just grossly underwhelming. The decor says trendy farmhouse  (which I love), but the food just wasn't great. It was just ok. I got the original Italian sandwich which sounded great but was very one note in its flavor. Salty meats and not enough cheese. It was a little better when I added some pickle and tomato to balance the flavor but overall just ok. I kept thinking it would be much better as a cold sandwich. 
The chili was again just ok and had a base of meat that was very finely ground but did not go down well. Kind of Grindy and chokey.  I'll pass!

text: The food was delicious. We had never been here before and we were very pleased with the choice. The restaurant was very clean. My only issue was one of the employees was a little rude and unhelpful which but the other employees made up for it. We will definitely be back!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': True, 'breakfast': False}", 'HasTV': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': True, 'casual': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}"}
categories: Salad, Delis, Soup, Restaurants, Food, Desserts, Fast Food, Sandwiches
text: Off a Main Street in Clayton,MO this sandwich shop offers a lot of the sandwiches you'd see in a typical sandwich shop. But what drew me here was the barbecue pulled pork sandwich.  It comes with jalapeño crisps and slaw so I just added lettuce and tomato. I don't like sandwiches that fall apart when you bite into them but if this is your preference then the extras will fit the bill. Wow. This sandwich is bursting with flavor. The pork is moist and tender and is complimented by a tangy bbq sauce. They offer a choice or regular or spicy and of course I chose spicy. This is the version that comes with the jalapeño crisps.  I like this sandwich a lot. It doesn't knock you for a loop at the first bite. The heat gradually builds with each mouthful which allows me to savor the other flavors. Upon entering you receive a warm welcome. Don't expect to be in and out of here like a fast food joint. This doesn't bother me since I'm accustomed to a bit of a wait in this type of sandwich shop. On the plus side of the equation , you can while away the time enjoying the banter between the workers and customers.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': True, 'breakfast': False}", 'HasTV': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': True, 'casual': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}"}
categories: Salad, Delis, Soup, Restaurants, Food, Desserts, Fast Food, Sandwiches
text: First I want o say that I love pot belly. I work in Clayton and I go here a lot. Sometimes I order sandwiches and sometimes I order the salads. The way their system works when you order a salad is you tell the guy at the end of the line what you want and he yells down the line to tell them what type of salad you want. They do it this way because the guy at the beginning of the line is the guy who starts making the sandwiches. One flaw in their system that I've noticed is when you move along down the line after ordering your salad and you get to the next person they usually don't know what type of salad you ordered and you have to tell them. It is at that point, when it goes that way, that they begin to make the salad. Obviously, their system is designed so that when the guy on the end of the line hollers out your salad the salad person starts making it. The goal being in mind that when you get to the end of the line your salad is ready and you pay. I mentioned to one of the employees that I loved the restaurant but I wanted to constructively mention the issue with the salads being called out down the line.  As soon as this employee realized what I was saying he cut me off and abruptly said I apologize sir we are doing the best we can. I attempted to tell him again that I loved the restaurant but was only offering some constructive criticism. Once again, before I could even finish he cut me off and rudely said I told you we are doing our best. This employee has a ponytail and long sideburns. This gentleman clearly needs a little retraining on customer service. I will continue to go and continue to recommend the potbelly. However the salad ordering system does not work well and the large sideburn employee is rude.  But for this employee this would be a four star review

Great, quick spot for lunch in Clayton. Hope it sticks around! Subs are good and toasted. Nothing too epic, but it does have a wide range of healthy/vegetarian to heavy/meaty.

Sandwiches, soups, salads, MILKSHAKES, and some damn good cookies.

text: A nice sandwich shop, great place to grab a good lunch.  The line may be long, but it moves fast, an employee walks through the line taking your order and then you add toppings to your hot sandwich when you reach the front.  My salad was pretty unexceptional, but the quality was good and it was fillings.  The sandwiches are quite good, toasted, I really liked the multigrain bread.

text: Always love Potbelly whenever there is one around. This one is fairly new (opened last 6 months) and the sandwiches are just as good as any other Potbelly. This one however does not offer the FULL Potbelly menu but have the standards. The employees were very nice and I will definitely be back!

text: As far as Potbelly locations go, this one is efficient (even during the lunch rush!) and the employees are all very courteous. My favorite order to get is the Powerhouse Salad with nonfat vinaigrette (I NEED THE RECIPE FOR THAT VINAIGRETTE) and a strawberry shake. The outdoor seating is great for when it's warm and sunny out.

attributes: {'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': True, 'breakfast': False}", 'HasTV': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': True, 'casual': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}"}
categories: Salad, Delis, Soup, Restaurants, Food, Desserts, Fast Food, Sandwiches
text:
Potbelly Reminds me a lot of Pickleman's Sandwhich Shop. I have heard  a lot of people mention how amazing Potbelly's is but I didn't have one close enough to me to try it out. When this one opened up I stopped by during the week to pick up lunch and it was like a deja-Pickleman!!! It has the same style menu and vibe and decor. I will say that Potbellys is a little more cozier if I had to compare. 

The place was PACKED during rush hour lunch time. The line was long but it was moving. The tables were all filled. People were hustling and bustling. I was hoping that a Harlem Shake would break out but unfortunately my hopes were unrealistic. 

I had the meatball sub and it was delicious. Toasted to full crispy capacity. I have also tried the Roast Beef and that one was also really delicious. The chili is also good too. I guess I can say I have had consistently good food here so far. 

It was not as busy on a Saturday afternoon, but what restaurant in Clayton is busy in the afternoon on a weekend anyways? I know this place will get a lot of business during the work week though. Its closer to my office than Picklemans is so I will frequent this place for that reason.

text: We went on a college roadtrip from Chicago to St. Louis stumbling on Potbelly in both locations! As native southerners, we hadn't even heard of it before our trip but now we look back on it as a highlight of our journey. As a vegetarian traveling with a self proclaimed carnivore, I loved the options available for both of us. If the sandwiches (which are fantastic) aren't your thing the tomato soup is delicious and their salads are great too!

text: Loving my big wreck on flatbread... no mayo, swiss cheese is fine. Stand by me is playing on the music box.

text: This place was great! It was really fast, the service was outstanding, and the food was good. All the people behind the counter were very courtious and nice. I got a wreck and it was good. If I'm in the area again I would go back here. But next time I'll get double meat.

text: My fiancé and I usually make sure to stop by once a week. The staff is awesome, some even know us by name. Its a great, clean, chill atmosphere. I like how they let local musicians play during the lunch hours. The food is great, the portions are just right, and most items are very reasonably priced. I usually get a turkey sandwich with bacon and a sugar cookie. Yum!

text:
I've come here a few times to pick up food for lunch/dinner. The staff are always quick and friendly, and never have made my sandwich wrong! Woot! If you time your visit right, usually during lunch hour, they have live musicians playing (mainly local acts) which creates a nice atmosphere. 

I will warn you that this place does get very busy during the lunch hour rush, so be prepared to wait in line for a bit.

text: Great service, small menu, and live music at lunch. This quick, tasty joint is tucked away between two high end restaurants in Clayton. Its perfect for brief area stop in to enjoy the scenery, and also grab a quick bite. Its not like Picklemans because the prices are cheap for a decent sandwich that took more thought than turkey and cheese. I am looking to cut back on heavy sandwichs with lots of bread. The toppings on the Mediterranean were fresh and refined--chickpeas and feta cheese. Skip Subway. Gotta grab a bite here when you're in town.

text: I live nearby and got hungry for a sandwich, so I checked Yelp and saw this place had online ordering, so I tried it. Ordering was quick and simple. There was a long line, but I went directly to the cashier, gave my name and picked up my order. Super fast and efficient. Sandwich was good too (ham and Swiss on flatbread).

text: This has become a solid favorite in my sandwich shop experiences. This location just down the street from my office, so I've been able to try around almost all of their sandwiches and I haven't yet found something I don't love. Goodbye subway and Quiznos chains. Potbelly blows them all out of the water. Huge salads too.  Great drink selection, and some awesome chips and cookies. (The oatmeal chocolate chip cookies are ALWAYS soft and chewy...). My favorite place to grab a bite for lunch in Clayton.

Great atmosphere. Came here for lunch on a Saturday. Had the grilled chicken and it was delicious. Guy working the register was SO nice and helpful. 
Chicken noodle soup was perfect.

text: I have come to expect my sandwiches here to be perfect, the service to be quick, the staff to be genuinely friendly and the damage to my wallet minimal -- and this has been my experience every single time I have stopped in for lunch. They even have live guitar music on occasion. I know some may miss the Fatted Calf that was here before (Pot Belly kept the sign for an inside wall --nice touch!) but I consider Pot Belly to be a big improvement in the neighb.

text: I had a pizza sub and because I enjoy hot sandwiches with cooked ingredients, I didn't like the fact that the mushrooms on the sandwich were not cooked. The cheese wasn't melted, and overall I just wished I went somewhere else for lunch. If you don't mind semi- warmed sandwiches you would like it.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': True, 'breakfast': False}", 'HasTV': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': True, 'casual': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}"}
categories: Salad, Delis, Soup, Restaurants, Food, Desserts, Fast Food, Sandwiches
text:
I hate to compare this to Subway, but it's the easiest way to explain this sandwich shop. You walk in and are met with a variety of different sandwich options. There's a assembly line where you tell the staff what you want. The protein goes on first and then the toppings. In the end, they wrap the sandwich up, and you pay. Sounds familiar right? But this place is soooo much better than Subway.

I had the grilled chicken and cheddar sub on multigrain bread with all the toppings and was very surprised as to how fresh and tasty the sub was. Mind you, the sandwich was a little pricier than a Subway, but well worth it.

Even though it was my first time at a Potbelly's, the staff was friendly and very patient with any questions I had. The sandwich shop was clean and had tons of seating.

Definitely recommend this place if you are looking for a quick, healthy, delicious sandwich for lunch.

Quality ingredients, but staff is a mess and unorganized.
I have bought two things on separate occasions- farmhouse salad (didn't receive chicken breast in salad), and a strawberry Oreo Shake (was only Oreo). Sucks that something was left off BOTH times I've visited :(

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': True, 'breakfast': False}", 'HasTV': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': True, 'casual': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}"}
categories: Salad, Delis, Soup, Restaurants, Food, Desserts, Fast Food, Sandwiches
text: When I'm in downtown Clayton and craving a sandwich, this is my number one spot.  I have come here a few times for lunch and have always left content.  I like to get a regular Turkey Club on white bread with lettuce, tomato, mayo, and mustard.  I make it a meal so that it comes with chips and a drink.  I come here typically during the lunch rush, but the service is really fast so I have never had to wait long.  In case you don't know, after you order your desired sandwich, you tell them what condiments you want on your sandwich before you pay, even though those condiments may already be listed with the sandwich you ordered on the menu.  If you decide to eat here rather than taking your food to-go, it's not too noisy inside and there are plenty of places to sit and enjoy your food.  In downtown Clayton, you have an abundance of places to choose from when searching for a bite to eat, but if you're craving a sandwich I recommend checking this place out.

text: Pretty good. Not the best, but definitely not the worst. I'd probably eat there again.

text: The kids ordered shakes and the Mac n cheese which were both really good. I had a chicken and cheddar sandwich and the oatmeal chocolate chip cookies which were delicious. The staff was friendly and the restaurant was clean.

text: Ok, I have been to all the potbelly's, and this one by far needs some management change. The business is very hectic there, but when now the last 5 times I've gone in there, my sandwich is either messy, or something was forgot that I wanted or added that I didn't want. In regards to potbelly as a company, it's a great company, I just feel this location needs to be reassessed on a higher level.

text: I have been wanting to try their sandwiches for a while and finally had the opportunity. The ingredients were fresh and sandwich made right in front of you, which is nice. The sandwiches and cookie bar we ate were delish! The store was clean and service prompt and helpful. Great lunch!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': True, 'breakfast': False}", 'HasTV': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': True, 'casual': False}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}"}
categories: Salad, Delis, Soup, Restaurants, Food, Desserts, Fast Food, Sandwiches
text: Tried to order online but couldn't.  Their website said they are permanently closed.  I told like ten people that it was closed forever.  Then I happened to be in the area and they looked open so I went in and talked to two people.  First guy didn't care just shrugged his shoulders.  Second person I talked to said they just set it to that when they are too busy.  Seems really smart in this economy to broadcast you are permanently out of business when that is actually happening to so many businesses in the area.  I need to be able to order online because of my schedule so I will just assume I can't now.  Good luck potbelly's, at least you have your PPP money to keep you afloat.
