attributes: {'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'HasTV': 'False', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True'}
categories: Delis, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Fast Food
text:
Great sandwiches. I'd recommend them over the 'Sub chains' any day! ..

-They are generous with the cheese; you can actually savor that provolone in every single bite..
-unlike subway sandwiches..they don't load your sandwiches with all sort of sauces that often end up subduing the taste of the rest of the ingredients
-likeable atmosphere

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'HasTV': 'False', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True'}
categories: Delis, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Fast Food
text:
3 stars because the sandwiches are pricey and the place not always clean.

Apart from that, Potbelly is my go-to place when I forgot my cash, even though it is a little pricier than, say, Subway. In general, however, their sandwiches are better - the bread and meats seem of better quality and if you like your sandwiches heavily toasted, you'll find them perfect. (In fact, you cannot get them un-toasted.) I have a tendency to always get their Italian sandwich - definitely their best in my book -, although the meatballs and the pizza sandwich are great as well.

I always thought it's quite a miracle how chain restaurants have their distinctive taste - Subway sandwiches always have the Subway taste to it, and Jimmy John's taste like Jimmy John's no matter which one of their many different sandwiches you get. Potbelly is no exception and I often find myself having a craving for it.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'HasTV': 'False', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True'}
categories: Delis, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Fast Food
text: I eat here at least a few times per month. I always marvel at how quickly and efficiently they move the line. My go to choices are the chicken salad or wreck on flatbread. They are always tasty! I top it off with to-die-for oatmeal chocolate chip cookies. Staff are always friendly, too. A nice change of pace from my workplace cafeteria.

attributes: {'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'HasTV': 'False', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True'}
categories: Delis, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Fast Food
text: I think the sandwich is okay, but way too small for the price you pay for. I think subway has a better deal on that. However, I do love Oreo Milkshake here. Be aware, there are times when some waitstaff makes very diluted milkshake, but 80% of the time, it's excellent.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'HasTV': 'False', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True'}
categories: Delis, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Fast Food
text:
I always get the Wreck Salad with the non-fat vinaigrette dressing--I don't know what they put in the dressing but it's delicious. I always get extra on the side.

As far as price goes, I can't comment on the sandwiches, but $5 and change for a salad isn't bad in my opinion.  Plus they're big.  I'm always full after eating one.

The drink selection is also good--I happen to love cream soda and black cherry soda and they stock both of them.  Their milkshakes are also good.

Finally, the staff are always extremely pleasant to deal with.  It's nice to have such positive interactions with them despite the restaurant being packed and the line out the door.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'HasTV': 'False', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True'}
categories: Delis, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Fast Food
text:
This place is right by the hospital so it automatically get a large crowd of people coming through. Based on that the staff here really had to run a tight ship. That included having people take you order way in advance (when you're in the back in the line) so that way they can start prepping your food faster. I appreciate that although I think online ordering and pick up is the most time efficient.

The food isn't super interesting, but I have to admit the sandwich I get 8/10 of the times is great (the Mediterranean with chicken, no roasted peppers and extra artichokes!). 
Nothing to write home about, but a great lunch place.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'HasTV': 'False', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True'}
categories: Delis, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Fast Food
text:
I really like this place for a few reasons: everything is cheap (~$5), tasty,  and service is fast and friendly. The only thing I don't like about this place is its location-- being on the far corner of campus makes it a little harder for me to justify actually going.

I've tried several of their sandwiches at some point or another and in general, after requesting all of the toppings (all free), I always find them very tasty. That said, the sandwiches are always a mess to eat, so I recommend taking a few napkins and a fork with you before you leave.

The salads here are not bad as well. My biggest complaint is the use of lettuce as the green. Naturally,  I think you can get better deals elsewhere, but not a bad deal by any means.

Overall, very solid choice.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'HasTV': 'False', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True'}
categories: Delis, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Fast Food
text:
First time and it was a bit overwhelming when the guy approached us in the line wanting to know what we wanted to order and we couldn't even see the menu yet. I guess if you know the menu your ok, but he was a bit annoyed that we couldn't rattle off what we wanted. Then the lady at the counter who wanted to know what condiments I wanted on my sandwich "mam"med be twice! I'm not that old - but actually, it's more about the fact that I simply wasn't aware of the proper procedure to moving through the line. All that said, now I know and I'm sure I'll "perform" better the next time. I will return since we must frequently visit the hospital and  the sandwiches were indeed great tasting for what they are. My husband truly enjoyed the soup which is also a plus. 

Worth the learning curve

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'HasTV': 'False', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True'}
categories: Delis, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Fast Food
text: After visiting a patient across the street for a few days in a row, it's nice to have a dependable great lunch here with friendly people. Roast beef and the Mediterranean sandwiches were good. The cookies are a must, chocolate chocolate chip and sugar cookies are worthy of their own store.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'HasTV': 'False', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True'}
categories: Delis, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Fast Food
text: You get a nice toasted sandwich from Potbelly although its a little on the small side, if you ask me. The shakes and smoothies are the bomb even if each shake has almost a full day's worth of calories. Another plus is the fact that its conveniently located across the street from HUP and CHOP. They also have plenty of outdoor seating for those nice, sunny days.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'HasTV': 'False', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True'}
categories: Delis, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Fast Food
text:
I arrived at 12:30 so there was quite a line already but it went fairly quickly - the staff seems very efficient.

I ordered the Farmhouse salad and requested cheddar cheese instead of blue cheese and they happily obliged. It was a generous size and the ingredients were fresh. the Potbelly vinaigrette was light and delicious. I also like that they post calorie content on each of their menu items and low calorie options are easy to identify. The drink selection is a bit pricey ($2 for a bottle of iced tea or lemonade). 

There's a nice terrace to enjoy your lunch outdoors and the location directly across from the University of PA hospital is hard to beat (especially if you're wary of food trucks - which I am).

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'HasTV': 'False', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True'}
categories: Delis, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Fast Food
text:
Sometimes you just need a breather to get out of the hospital and take a walk. That's where Potbelly's comes in. 

Get The Wreck, which is their version of an Italian hoagie. Talking with hot peppers and pickles and some root beer and you have a happy place.

Just resist the urge to hip check the guy standing in line taking your order on the tablet. He is only doing his job (jeez, I hope he worked there).

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'HasTV': 'False', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True'}
categories: Delis, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Fast Food
text:
I really liked this place. I had an appointment nearby but had some time to kill, so I stopped in for a breakfast sandwich and cup of coffee. The coffee was good, the service was fast, and the egg & cheddar sandwich was warm and fresh (made-to-order). There was plenty of seating available, and I enjoyed the eclectic collection of things hanging on the walls and varied music that played over the speakers. I sat here and read/ate/drank for quite a while (maybe 45 min) and was left alone to enjoy.

Best part- my breakfast was under $4, which is cheap for a convenient location in the city.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'HasTV': 'False', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True'}
categories: Delis, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Fast Food
text:
Being a doctoral student in Hoagie Studies, I can't give my highest rating to the sandwiches here, but I will say that the staff does a fantastic job with lunch catering orders, and they are super nice. 

The sandwiches are really OK, but don't expect to be blown away. One of the main problems for me is that they toast their Italian hoagie. That is pretty much sacrilege. But, on the upside, their accompaniments are quite good. The sandwiches come with thinly sliced pickles (sliced longways) and a delicious hot pepper spread. For me, the best part of ordering from here is the pepper spread. Don't miss it. 

The staff is really great. Whenever we put in a lunch delivery order online, they call to confirm, always show up on time, and the driver is always super friendly. A+ for service.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'HasTV': 'False', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True'}
categories: Delis, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Fast Food
text: A nice atmosphere, good, if narrow selection, but overall it was absolutely delicious. I got a meatball sandwich with provolone and it was just really good, My entire meal was under $10 which is also great. The servers were smiling and friendly, and the fact that its right near the UPenn museum of archaeology and Anthropolgy makes it even better for a history buff like me. I whole-heartedly recommend it!~

attributes: {'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'HasTV': 'False', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True'}
categories: Delis, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Fast Food
text: Great place! Just went there for the first time on Friday after visiting someone in CHOP, location is great and the food is great comfort food. Bread is great, warm and sandwich is loaded. Not a long wait, service is polite and helpful....I guess my only complaint was that the menu was a little confusing, but the staff was willing and able to help. Liked the way the place was decorated, clean and warm.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'HasTV': 'False', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True'}
categories: Delis, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Fast Food
text:
The food was unacceptable, given that I have visited plenty of Potbellys in Northern Virginia and DC and know how their sandwiches should taste. We visited on a saturday lunchtime, after I had already talked up how great our Potbelly's sandwiches would be with my friends. Usually the sandwiches are fairly consistent, regardless of the location, especially during lunch when everything is (or should be) fresh. 

However, everyone's sandwiches were made with old and stale bread. Even though I got a big sandwich to share they skimped a lot on the fillings. They had run out of the soup that was listed on the board. I have a hard time believing that they could run out of soup at 1pm on a warm day, I think that the employees were either too lazy to heat it up or too lazy to change the sign. Either way, disappointing. To top off our unexpectedly mediocre lunch, the oatmeal cookies we bought, which are usually really delicious were also stale! 

My suspicions are that the store just saved the old bread and cookies from the previous day and used them on saturday. Like I said before, unacceptable. For those of you who have visited and were disappointed - I urge you to try a Potbelly in the DC area so you can taste a fresh sandwich and cookies. They are typically great go-to lunch spots.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'HasTV': 'False', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True'}
categories: Delis, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Fast Food
text: Potbelly is solid and dependable food. Ordered the T-K-Y sandwich, which was plain, but good. The tomato soup has a nice little kick to it. My friend ordered the Oreo milkshake and wow, it tasted like a huge Oreo. There were also random mini Oreos served on the actual cup, too. There is a huge line around lunchtime, so I'd suggest coming before noon on any given weekday!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'HasTV': 'False', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True'}
categories: Delis, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Fast Food
text:
Dependable, hot, delicious sandwiches.  I wouldn't say there's anything special about this location, but they do serve up a quick, loaded sandwich.  While the lines can back up to the door during lunch hours, they are efficient and will take your order in line to expedite the service.  Standard toppings - mayo, mustard, hot peppers, lettuce, onion, tomato, pickle, oil and Italian seasoning  (they are always happy to give you extra if you ask) and usual drinks and chip selection.  Milkshakes come short and stout - thick, full flavor with fresh ice cream - but oh so bad for you...The cookies are also a great sweet treat to add on to your meal and they are always baked fresh.  

Maybe just don't get both :)

Enjoy!

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'HasTV': 'False', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True'}

text:
This is your average Potbelly sandwich shop, which is a good thing for me. I miss this place and I wish we had them in California since most of the sandwich chains here suck!
I usually get the Wreck with lettuce, tomato, mustard, and spicy peppers. Oh man the peppers are so delicious I regret not buying a bottle of them to bring back with me. 
Good, friendly, folks who work at this location also!

attributes: {'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': True, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': 'None', 'DriveThru': 'True'}
categories: Desserts, Fast Food, Sandwiches, American (New), Food, Restaurants, Salad, Soup, Delis
text:
I've been to Potbelly in Phoneix, and was excited that there is a Potbelly location on campus. 

We stopped by after a concert on a Sunday. No one was in the business, which was good for us, since we took awhile to decide what we wanted to order. The quality of the food, bread, and selections are great. I'm a fan of the italian.

Additionally, they serve freshly baked cookies, which are delicious! They are definitely large and sweet, so I highly recommend sharing it with someone or saving some for later.

The only downside to this location is that there is no designated parking for the business. You either have to risk it with parking in the Jack in the Box parking area, or find street parking nearby.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': True, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': 'None', 'DriveThru': 'True'}
categories: Desserts, Fast Food, Sandwiches, American (New), Food, Restaurants, Salad, Soup, Delis
text: It is summer time, so maybe they don't take their jobs as seriously when the students are gone. The sandwich I just had tasted like old, bad chicken. I didn't want to be rude, so I tossed it and asked for a Mac and Cheese. They said it as frozen and would be ready in half an hour. It is almost noon. Why bother when half the lunch rush is over? They weren't very nice about it either. I'm not coming back till the semester starts.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': True, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': 'None', 'DriveThru': 'True'}
categories: Desserts, Fast Food, Sandwiches, American (New), Food, Restaurants, Salad, Soup, Delis
text: I love Potbelly. Grew up with in Chicago so I was ecstatic to see that there was one coming to Tucson. Wait! Not one, but THREE locations here in Old Pueblo! I frequent the Park Ave location a lot, like way more than I should. The tuna sandwich is my old trusty but I recently discovered the Buffalo Grilled Chicken and that is also to die for. The chili is phenomenal and the shakes are scrumptious. ALWAYS GET A COOKIE. The oatmeal chocolate chip one is probably the best cookie I have ever had, but the sugar cookie is pretty tasty too!

attributes: {'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': True, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': 'None', 'DriveThru': 'True'}

text:
I was waiting for ten mins no one came to help me, the workers were in the back the entire time. Saw me and failed to acknowledge me. I ended up taking my business elsewhere for lunch.


I came back another to give this place another try and started off by asking for change so i could give some money to my sister who was waiting with me before ordering, the black girl worker was like sorry i can't give you change in a very bad attitude. 

Two strikes you're out pot belly

text: All I have to say is OMG the raspberry lemonade. Haha went here twice already this week and will probably go again today haha I love their sandwiches and I am traumatized because I am only in town for a week and this has become my favorite hot sandwich place.. Probably EVER! Seriously the Grilled Chicken and Cheddar sandwich with the peppers is heaven sent, and The Wreck is just a train wreck of awesomeness! The customer service is great and I had the pleasure of meeting their District Manager Lorrie who was such a welcoming character!  Also a big thank you to Octavio for being patient with my team and I. We were so clueless! PotBelly is a must!

text:
Tastes just like Chicago. I first ate at Potbelly's when I did my undergrad in Chicago (mid-2000s), and now every time I fly in I go through Midway airport (as it has a Potbelly's, but that's definitely not my only reason for flying into Midway). I got my favorite: the Wreck (lots of meat).

I'm not giving it the full 5 stars because service was extremely slow (and I was 1 of 2 people ordering), but I'm going to chop that up to it being a new location and the employees figuring out the way things work.

text: Really good sandwiches, always fast, and very cheap! My favorite is the Italian with everything on it. Delicious, and for $5 two people can share it for lunch and it fills us up! I haven't tried anything besides the subs, but the shakes look delicious.

text: I like the place in general, but when I requested extra chicken in Chicken & Chadder sandwich, I had a chance to actually taste a good amount of chicken and I got scared! Try eating the chicken pieces without any sauce on, just plain, it tastes like eating plastic. Seriously. Now I'm not even sure that's a real chicken or something looking like chicken which can actually cause even cancer. I'm seriously anxious about that chicken I ate..

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': True, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': 'None', 'DriveThru': 'True'}
categories: Desserts, Fast Food, Sandwiches, American (New), Food, Restaurants, Salad, Soup, Delis
text:
The Potbelly Sandwich Shop just opened near the UA campus.

It may seem a little overwhelming when you walk in. It's busy. It's fast. It's loud. It's like a spiffy version of Jimmy John's. Lots more action and many more menu items.

This particular location is decked out in University of Arizona memorabilia - block A table tops, University photos and even a  wall of portraits of what looks like Potbelly fans.

I understand that this is a chain restaurant that started in Chicago. And what luck. I have found that it is difficult to find a decent variety of sandwiches, soups and salads in this general location. I mean, I can only have a $7 tossed salad every once in a while. Wait, what am I talking about?! Actually, never.

I am very pleased to see they have so many soups on location. They have broccoli cheddar, chicken noodle, tomato basil, chicken enchilada, garden vegetable and even chili.

The sandwich is a hearty and come in a very broad range. Are done in the style of Which Wich, if you can remember that place on University. 

They have standard sandwiches like the roast beef, meatball on Italian. They also have a pizza sandwich and a grilled cheese and cheddar sandwich, which is what I ordered on my first visit. I thoroughly enjoyed the sandwich and was pleased to see that it cost less than $6.

And it's standard assembly-line style. You choose your bread, regular a multi grain, then your extras and your toppings. Along the way the sandwich goes into the oven. Nice assortment of extras: bacon, mushrooms, all sorts of cheeses an extra meats; onions, tomatoes, hot peppers... and so on.

Salad options are looking nice. You can get a salad with grilled chicken, bacon, hard-boiled eggs, blue cheese, walnuts, cranberries, cucumbers... lots of options there.

They also have shakes and smoothies and also baked goods, like cookies.

The staff is attentive and swift, even though they just had an opening this month. Actually quite surprising for a new restaurant that was built from the ground up. Too often with new openings you will find you're dealing with someone who is still learning how to run the cash register or who's clumsy delivering the order, but none of that here.

Seems like a fitting addition to the University area.

attributes: {'Caters': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'none'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': True, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'NoiseLevel': "'average'", 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'HasTV': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Ambience': 'None', 'DriveThru': 'True'}
categories: Desserts, Fast Food, Sandwiches, American (New), Food, Restaurants, Salad, Soup, Delis
text:
I am so excited that they are opening many new Potbelly locations in Tucson. This one is located near the UofA campus, but pretty central right off Speedway with a decent amount of parking. 

If you haven't been to Potbelly, let me tell you, you are missing out. It is my favorite fast food-ish sandwich joint. Similar to Quiznos, but better than Subway. They have meat and vegetarian sandwich options and your choice of white and wheat bread. If you watching your carbs, order it "skinny" with 1/3 less bread (scooped out). My usual is the turkey on wheat. The turkey is piled high and grilled with swiss cheese. Then comes the fun part, the toppings. The spicy peppers are my favorite (I have purchased take home bottles in the past!!) They also offer salads, soup, cookies and milkshakes. Each sub is about $6, which is reasonable for the quality and taste!

This location has only been open for 3 weeks, but they were on top of it. Fast, friendly service. Also, the location is nicer than most, with newer fixtures/seating etc. 

I won't dock a star, but I do like the breakfast sandwiches that are offered at some of their other locations. So if they could eventually add that, awesome!

text: My husband visited this today with 8 other men. NO ONE WAS IMPRESSED and my husband was completely disappointed. They are a once a week lunch bunch who will never darken this door again.  My husband ordered a salad with chicken.  It turns out there was not more than a tablespoon of chicken salad on a bowl of lettuce with little else to adorn it.  there was not only no blue cheese dressing but the dressing served on the side was likely a tablespoon or so.  The price was not reflective of the sparse lunch fare.  At over $9.  Not only Not a bargain one could consider Potbelly's a thief.  So so sorry to write this true but harsh reveiew.

text:
I had the roast beef sandwich with condiments. It was DELICIOUS. I added a bag of chips and an oatmeal chocolate chip cookie (baked in house) all for under $8. 

They had an assortment of shakes & smoothies. Maybe I'll try one of those in the future since I will definitely be back. 

Prices were right. Good was fantastic! 

The parking can be a little challenging since the lot says reserved for Jack In The Box. Fortunately, I was able to run right in and out without any problems.

I saw previous reviews indicating they were super slow with service. I didn't experience that.

attributes: {'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': True, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': False}", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'"}
categories: Delis, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Fast Food
text:
Potbelly's is a nice little sandwich shop if you're in a pinch. Today we stopped in the City Avenue location for the Big Wreck, my husband's favorite. I opted for the Uptown Salad and a cup of Chili on the side. Granted, they don't have a pretty basic basic menu, what they do have is very tasty. They do have a large variety of extras that you can request be added to your sandwich or salad so you can have your sandwich made to your liking. 

Unfortunately, we don't stop in as much as we used to. Even though we like the sandwiches their pricing is a little high for what you get. 

Pricing aside, the guys at the counter were very friendly, and I do love their chocolate brownie cookies!

Overall, Potbelly is great for a "once in a while" lunch or dinner treat, especially if you don't feel like cooking that night, but if price is an issue for you, you may want to try another sandwich spot.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': True, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': False}", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'"}

text: I went in there hungry so I ordered the meatball sandwich and a bowl of chili and it was a let down.The meatballs were fake and from a box and the chili had that phony sweetness which makes me think its from a canI found it to be expensive too.It bothers me because Mazzoni's deli is only a few minutes away and they have real delicious homemade chili for alot lower price and a far superior meatball sandwich.The staff here was extremely nice and quick I just have a problem with the food itself

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': True, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': False}", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'"}
categories: Delis, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Fast Food
text:
Crazy good sandwiches (I love me some smoked turkey with swiss!) but as far as the atmosphere goes...not so much.

Getting there is a little loopy - you have to walk around the building, down the outside stairs and next to busy, busy City Ave. I was there for lunch and there was an acoustic performance going on, which is cool for sure but just not at lunch. It was so loud (with said music as well as the hustle, bustle and chaos of the noontime crowd) that the people behind the counter couldn't hear me & I couldn't hear them. After repeating my order about 5 times the sandwich was made to order (pretty quickly, too, I might add) but instead of hanging out there as planned I paid, threw it in my purse and scooted out of there for the quiet respite of my car. I'll try again for sure, but I hope they save the musical performances for a later time slot.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': True, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': False}", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'"}
categories: Delis, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Fast Food
text:
Ok, I know it sounds more than a bit strident and maybe I sound more than a bit mental, but I'm extremely accurate and have been eating at places like this for over 40 years.  Here's a copy of what I just sent to Potbelly corporate:

This was my first visit to a Potbelly...and, unless there are drastic changes, my last.

Just reading the "Our story" and "Our food" sections of the web site tells me all I need to know.  In the past, there may have been an original store that was famous for great sandwiches.  Then during the franchise process, a board room meeting where accolades are heaped upon the company about "how wonderful we are" and "how amazing our food is".  No one has the nerve to ask if it';s true.  It isn't.  As soon as I opened my turkey and Swiss sandwich, I could see in an instant and before discovering that they not-at-all-busy sandwich maker was too busy talking to actually include any Swiss cheese, that the turkey was "jelly turkey", which is the lowest quality formed turkey breast available.  It's translucent, watery texture is visible from across a room.  This has absolutely nothing to do with whatever quality sandwiches began the franchise and everything to do with placing price above quality by someone who has zero connection to the food. If you don't think that food quality plays a big part in the restaurant business, then doom is waiting for you. For another $.50, the company could use at least passable turkey.

Also, I was deeply surprised by the dearth of choices on the menu.  I thought that a store specializing in sandwiches would have...special sandwiches.  The options on the menu are so basic, it's a joke.  Mayo or mustard?  What is this, 1952?  Where are different flavored sauces, edgy mustards, horseradish or barbecue sauce, wasabi mayonnaise.  Where are sweet peppers, bacon, grilled onions and mushrooms...nothing!  Is that them, hidden in the "extras" banner?  This is Philadelphia, where we know sandwiches.  Jelly turkey is a tip off that nothing on the menu is prepared with pride, but only an unblinking eye on costs.

Well, that attitude just cost you a customer.

text:
This place is pretty good. The sandwiches are similar to Subway, but made a lot better, in my opinion. And I'm a huge fan of the milkshakes! I'd go here just for those. But the sandwhiches are totally worth it too.

The place is a little tricky to get to, you have to pull around the back, park in the garage, and then walk back around the building and down some stairs. But its not really all that inconvenient.

This is a good place to grab a quick lunch if you don't have a whole lot of time for a sit-down meal.

attributes: {'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': True, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': False}", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'"}

text: This place is essentially Quizno's with slightly better food and a less fast-foody atmosphere. The menu is very limited and consists mostly of about 10 different types of sandwiches, as well as milkshakes and ice cream.  They don't seem to do one thing that Quizno's does that sceezes me out.  Some of the meats at Quizno's get put in a little plastic basket and dipped in what looks like hot, dirty mop water before being put on your sandwich. Didn't observe this at  Potbelly.

text: Eh... It is all I can say. Walked in to a ghost town and it was NOON. Worker sitting on counter when I walked in. No hello from either of the guys there. Felt like I was imposing to order. Worker never even got off the counter when I ordered through when I paid. 15minutes later....he is still there. Sandwich is mediocre...average .  They toasted bread but meat is cold and warm in spots. Kind of a turn off. Girl behind counter was very nice though.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': True, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': False}", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'"}
categories: Delis, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Fast Food
text:
I wasn't really blown away by Potbellys.  To begin with, I felt that there menu was rather basic.  My girlfriend is a vegetarian and there was only one sandwich that didn't include meat.  She ended up getting a chickpea salad and I got a ham and cheese sub.  I was disappointed by the lack of options for topping on the sandwich.  They didn't even have honey mustard or vinegar!  Both the sandwich and the salad were tasty but nothing really spectacular.  I felt that both were overpriced given the quantity and quality of food.

On the plus side, the girl at the front was extremely friendly.  She felt bad that they didn't have the vegetable soup that was advertised so she gave us a free cookie.  She was very kind and polite.  The place itself was clean but kind of randomly decorated.

Overall I don't think I'll be going back to Potbelly.  it's just not worth the money!

text: I got used to potbelly living in the mid-west a few years back and was happy to find this location on city ave.  It was lunch time and the place was not busy so maybe the idea has not taken off but the sandwich was very good just as i remembered it.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': True, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': False}", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'"}
categories: Delis, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Fast Food
text:
This three star rating is pulled up from the one star I want to give it today because of better past experiences.

The lunch I had today was one of the worst meals I've had in a long time. The roast beef in my sandwich was vile. Simply put, it was one big wad of chewy crap. For reasons unbeknownst to me, there were also random pieces of raw carrot in my roll. The only saving grace was that the trash can was in an arm's length of my seat.

The main reason I went to Pobelly today was because I convinced myself the weather mandated milkshake drinking. Even this was disappointing. It was very uneven.

Typically, Potbelly is nothing to write home about. They make decent sandwiches at an affordable price but there are plenty of better option around. After today's experience, I plan to stick to those other options for the foreseeable future.

text: A Chicago original.  The subs are tasty and the service was great.  The potato salad is full of vinegar and has a nice bite.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': True, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': False}", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'"}
categories: Delis, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Fast Food
text:
I don't particularly love Potbellys sandwiches (though I know a lot of people think they're delicious), but I do love their insanely huge cookies/brownie bars and potato chips. That being said, Potbellys is a good addition to the other restaurants in this little strip-mall-ish type place on City Ave.

The employees are friendly and the prices are okay. I personally prefer CPK or Chipotle when I'm in the area, but if you're looking for a quick sandwich Potbellys isn't a bad option.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': True, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'WiFi': "'free'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': False}", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'none'"}
categories: Delis, Restaurants, Sandwiches, Fast Food
text: Just looking at the take-away menu for this shop made me want to try it. When I finally had the chance to stop in, unfortunately i wasn't very hungry so i didn't try a sandwich. I did however get a salad which was very tasty and quite large. As other reviewers noted, the location is tricky. It's not easily noticed just driving around, in fact we had to call to ask where they were. A sign closer to the main shopping center directing people would be likely to draw more business to them. The inside is large and comfy, definitely better then subway or quiznos. staff was friendly. oh and they have 'my little ponies' behind the counter :-) Another yea for smaller businesses!

text:
One block from my hotel was this sandwich shop.  Always a good crowd.   So I stopped in and ordered an Italian Sandwich.    Lots of choices of toppings.   Toasted, which was nice.   About a 6 inch bun, white or whole wheat.      Sandwich was wonderful.   

I also ordered a whole dill pickle, cut into quarters.   Very crisp, tasty and large.    

Service was fast - would give Jimmy Johns a run.   Friendly service, lots of people working.

Some seating inside and out.   

Very pleased.

My wife appreciated the calorie info on the menu, very helpful.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'WiFi': "u'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'HasTV': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'True'}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Salad, Delis, Food, Vegetarian, Ice Cream & Frozen Yogurt, Soup
text:
Thank you Potbelly for bringing fantastic giardiniera (hot peppers) to Indianapolis.  As a long time resident of Chicago, I fell in love with your sandwiches.  But now that I am back home in Indiana it is exciting to see your store in my new-old home.  But please please please open more locations. 

The TKY is such a great concept - less meat/cheese/bread, fully loaded with extra hot peppers and those fantastic pickles.  And of course I balance out the lighter sandwich with an amazing oatmeal chocolate chip cookie!  MMMMMM!

The Mediteranean, A Wreck and the Farmhouse salad are my other go-to favorites. 

Jimmy John's will likely go out of business soon once everyone gets to experience Potbelly's goodness.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'WiFi': "u'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'HasTV': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'True'}

text: I am originally from Chicago and when I learned that there was a pot belly's coming to Indy I was absolutely excited. I think the first week it opened I was there 5 times. I love the sandwiches and the hot peppers on them. I recommend the Pizza Sandwich with extra sauce. My only complaint is that I can't make it there often enough. I love how they do their salads too. One day I went in so that I could grab a salad to take to work the next day. It was packaged so well that the next day I had an amazingly delicious and crisp salad for lunch. I just wish I could get a salad from them everyday too.

text:
It's the bread!  The multigrain bread here makes all the difference.  The taste and texture are just superior to any other sandwich place.  I have had Potbellys in Chicago and I'm glad there is one in Indy.  I suggest the Pizza Sandwich.  It was delicious.   The smoothie tastes more like a shake, very yummy.  Does anyone know if they deliver?


ps
One thing that did NOT make sense was the Payton Manning Sports Illustrated cover on the wall.  It was after Chicago lost to the Colts in the Superbowl.

The sandwiches are awesome...especially the hot peppers!  

The inside is very small, loud, and chaotic during lunch time.  I hope you know exactly what you want before you get in line because you will be rushed.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'WiFi': "u'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'HasTV': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'True'}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Salad, Delis, Food, Vegetarian, Ice Cream & Frozen Yogurt, Soup
text:
Some of the most glorious years of my life were as a sandwich jockey at Potbelly when I was in college. I had never had a Potbelly sandwich before I started working there, I'm chalking that up to not working in the Loop. Potbelly is the King of all of the sandwiches.

So get this, are you watching your weight? Trying to gain weight? Into bold tastes? Into hot and spicy? Into soup? Into big salads? Potbelly has something for everyone. They even have secret underground sandwiches (which I have brought to your attention) that aren't on the menu, but can be made with the multitude of freshly prepared ingredients at their disposal. Potbelly isn't like other sandwich places. Every morning at 7, some wonderful people go in and start slicing meat & cheese. preparing the chicken salad and tuna salad fresh, and readying those beautiful meat monsters, the Italian and A Wreck. 

If it was socially acceptable, and I wouldn't die from an ulcer, I would eat Potbelly hot peppers straight out of the jar. You can buy these flavorful babies by the gallon NO FOOLIN'! Potbelly hot peppers are the boss of some type of secret giardiniera racket that makes all other giardinieras look like something you'd scrape off of your shoe in the subway. 

So what do I get at Potbelly? Chicken Salad sandwich on multi-grain with added cranberries, red peppers, and non-fat vinaigrette, in addition to the topping choices already offered. If there isn't a line, and you're feeling really feisty, ask them to put some roast beef plus extra ounce of meat, hot pepper oil, and hot peppers on a piece of foil and send it through the oven twice. Your mouth with thank you. Don't be afraid of the pizza sandwich. It's worth it. I dare you to go to Potbelly every day for lunch and work through the menu. If you get delivery in Indy, sometimes the sandwich doesn't arrive in the best condition, FYI. 

I'm not a sweets person, but all of the shakes are real and made right in front of you for maximum tastiness. The cookies.......the cookies are addicting. 

There are five decorative items in every Potbelly restaurant. You better start going every time you can so you can figure this out! And bosses, I'm sure everyone would love you more if you got Potbelly catering for your office.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'WiFi': "u'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'HasTV': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'True'}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Salad, Delis, Food, Vegetarian, Ice Cream & Frozen Yogurt, Soup
text:
I was recently in Indianapolis for a conference with a group of hungry teens. I had been to the Potbelly Sandwich in Washington, DC so I knew what kind of food to expect for a cheap price. I tried the meatball sub and the seasonal peppermint milkshake. Both were very delicious. 

Everyone in the group I was with was able to find something that they would enjoy. We also had a gluten free vegetarian in the group and she was very happy with the selection and options that she had to choose from. 

The staff was very welcoming and one of the workers checked in on us throughout the meal to see how every one liked it. Definitely a great place to go for lunch and dinner. It is within walking distance of the convention center and Lucas Oil Stadium.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'WiFi': "u'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'HasTV': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'True'}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Salad, Delis, Food, Vegetarian, Ice Cream & Frozen Yogurt, Soup
text:
I've heard about Potbelly for a while.  Each time I come to Indy for business, it's usually one of the first places people mention for lunch.  For whatever reason, it just never materialized.  On a recent business trip, it came up again and I made sure we tried it out.

While I think the food was good, it wasn't worth the hype.  I had the A Wreck sandwich (Salami, roast beef, turkey & ham with Swiss cheese) with all the trimmings (lettuce, tomatoes, mayo, mustard, hot peppers, onion, oil and italian seasoning) on multigrain wheat bread .  The sandwich itself was really good, but nothing that would knock my socks off (as others have described it).  Don't get me wrong, I thoroughly enjoyed the sandwich, but it wouldn't rank in my top 10 sandwiches.  I also had the broccoli cheddar soup which was pretty decent as well.  I also had a couple bites of the sugar cookie (baked fresh everyday) my friend got.  I must say that was really good.

Service was quick and friendly.  I would certainly visit again to try another sandwich.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'WiFi': "u'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'HasTV': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'True'}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Salad, Delis, Food, Vegetarian, Ice Cream & Frozen Yogurt, Soup
text:
This place is pretty interesting. There is not many places to sit so be prepared to stand. Also the other bad thing is that they do nickel and dime you for all the sides and chips.

The food though was pretty good. I had the MEDITERRANEAN (Zippy Hummus, Feta, Artichoke Hearts, Crispy Cukes and Roasted Red Peppers). I added Mushrooms to this and it was awesome.  The great thing about this place is you do not have to have the entire bread. They will cut it down for you.

I have tried A Wreck® (Salami, Roast Beef, Turkey, Ham & Swiss Cheese). This sandwich was okay.

I will definitely go back and try other sandwiches.

text:
UPDATE: 
The last few times I came here, they have new staff and the service is cold and unenthusiastic. Also, the sandwich maker messed up the grilled cheese sandwich. How could that be possible? 

ORIGINAL REVIEW:
I am so thrilled Potbelly has finally arrived in Indianapolis. Delicious warm toasty bread - the sandwiches are far more superior than other sandwiches from the chain chops. My family is big fan of Potbelly. We rely so much on Potbelly when we travel in the US, we always try to find a Potbelly location whereever we go for quick lunch or quick dinner. My family love this place!!!

About this particular location - this is by far the smallest one that I have been to. However, there are always enough seats available. Located in the Monument Circle, its location is convenient to those who work or have activities in the area. However, it is a little hard to go there if you just want to grab a sandwich. You have to find a street parking (which is very limited) or park at the Mall parking garage and walk about 2.5 blocks. The service is always friendly too. 

Our favorites are turkey and Italian. ALWAYS ask for hot peppers if you like to spice up your sandwich. They have grilled cheese too for those picky eaters. They have vegetarian sandwiches too. Chocolate malt shake is the best . Oatmeal Chocolate Chip cookie is our favorite. If you like Orangina, Root Beer or Cream Soda - you can get it here. I hope that this location start selling the "Big" size.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop

categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Salad, Delis, Food, Vegetarian, Ice Cream & Frozen Yogurt, Soup
text:
My first venture to this sub shop chain.   Parked right on Monument Circle it was nice to just walk in from a visit around the Circle.  The decor is Indy friendly with pictures, banners, signage that's geared towards Nap town. The menu is simple but varied and very straight forward.  Grab a few of the specialty sandwiches or choose your own adventure with time of options. Once the bread is toasted they follow up with you by asking for your toppings again.  Sounds repetitive but I like getting what I ordered and not get lost in translation over the hustle and bustle of a pretty busy joint. 

I got the Turkey BLT. The wife a salad.  The sandwich was toasty and crunchy.  The bacon crisp and the LT was fresh.  Fresh tea washed it down (regular as I did not see a Sweet option).  The wife's salad was huge and filling.  Although after tasting my sandwich she regretted her menu choice. 

All in all a great experience.  I'm sure the cookies and dessert are good but Rocket Fizz next store beacons.

There is this hot pepper mix that can be added to the sandwiches which is a MUST if you like things spicy. The other awesomely bad things are their cookies!!! The oatmeal chocolate chip is dangerous! You should try them :)

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'WiFi': "u'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'HasTV': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'True'}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Salad, Delis, Food, Vegetarian, Ice Cream & Frozen Yogurt, Soup
text:
I LOVE Potbelly. Anytime I'm in Cincinnati for work, I'll make a special trip to their UC location to get one of their yogurt fruit smoothies (I love those little sugar cookies they put on the straw) and the italian sub (can't remember what they call it). I love those hot peppers on anything. The cookies are good, too. So, I was really excited to find out that we had a Potbelly in Indy, finally. 

Sadly, this location is hard to get to, especially for lunch, unless you work within walking distance of the circle. Pretty much the only time I eat here is when I need a quick bite to eat on my way to a Colts game from a friend's parking garage around the corner. They do a good job with the sandwiches, but take a while with the smoothies (don't all Potbelly's take forever making the shakes & smoothies?). 

The main part I can't stand about this location, though, is that they have a restroom, but won't let you use it, even if you are a paying customer. It's really frustrating. Yeah, they have a little antibacterial gel squirter thing by the counter where you place your order, but sometimes people just have to use the restroom or would rather wash their hands in a real sink. I've even been there with kids & a group of 7 people. We all bought something to eat...and STILL they would not let the kids use the restrooms. We had to walk around the corner to use the restroom at a different restaurant that didn't even care if we bought something. It's ridiculous.

name: Potbelly Sandwich Shop
attributes: {'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'WiFi': "u'free'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'HasTV': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'CoatCheck': 'False', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': True, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DriveThru': 'True'}
categories: Fast Food, Sandwiches, Restaurants, Salad, Delis, Food, Vegetarian, Ice Cream & Frozen Yogurt, Soup
text:
I am native to Chicago so to find a Potbelly here made the wife and me really happy.  Unlike the 2 star reviewer, I actually feel as though this lived up to the chicago hype.  I was interested to learn that the reason Indy doesn't have the "bigs" and a few other things is that the upper-ups make sure the location can hack the normal stuff before letting them do all the upgrades.  Well, suffice to say, I totally expect the menu to expand a bit here in indy pretty soon because I feel as though they did a great job.  I pick potbelly over JimmyJohns and Subway any day.  Parking can be a bear, but it is totally worth it.  

The bathroom is through the emergency exit though, which is a little strange.  

If you have yet to go to a Potbelly and you like sandwiches, then you owe it to yourself to swing by the circle and get your Potbelly on.... get a cookie to finish off your meal, its worth it.
